ELIbethwaYO!
Sinabo abadlali abanetalente ebholeni nakweminy' imidlalo - phofu kutheni sibethwa kangaka? Kutheni zingekho iinkqubo zokuphuhlis' abadlali eMzantsi Afrika? Kubhale uForce Khashane, kufote uMolefi Sebatie
BONA XHOSA November 2008
LIHLAZO! Leyo kuphela kwendlela ongachaza ngayo imeko yebhola (neminy' imidlalo) eSoweto. Sabhiyoza kakhulu xa sasinikwa ilungelo lokusingath' imidlalo yeNdebe yeHlabathi ka-2010, kodwa ngathi akukho mtu wazikhathaza ngokuzama ukunyusa umgangatho weqela lelizwe emva koko. ISoweto yeyona ndawo esifanele siqale kuyo ukujonga ukuba uphi undonakele.
Kaloku iSoweto yeyona ndawo ibimel' ukuphala phambili ekuveliseni abadlali abatsha bemidlalo eyohlukeneyo. Kodwa nakule lokishi eyayifudula iphala phambili emzabalazweni wenkululeko ezemidlalo zigubungelwe ngumona nepolitiki.
Umzekelo waloo nto, kutshanje abaphathi bebhola baseSoweto bothuswe kukubona kusakhiwa izindlu kwelinye lamabala ebhola amadala elibizwa ngeSputnik.
Kukweli bala lingaseMeadowlands Hostel apho kwavunjululwa iitalente zabadlali abaphambili bakudala abanjengoNeo "City Late" Lichabe noRhyder Mofokeng.
"Akukho mntu wasazisayo ukuba kuzokwakhiw' izindlu ebaleni lebhola. Sabona nje ngeny' intsasa lisembiwa ibala. Sathi xa sikhalaza kubakhi bezo zindlu basibuza ukuba 'Ingaba sikhetha ukuba nebala lebhola na kunokuba nezindlu zokuhlala'. Oku kutshabalalisa uluntu lwakowethu yaye kuvala amathuba okudlal' ibhola ebantwaneni bethu," utshilo umphathi webhola yabangahlawulwayo, uHenry Mchunu. Sizame iintsuku ezintlanu ukuqhagamshelana neSebe leziNdlu laseGauteng kodwa onke loo malinge awe phantsi.
Inkoliso yethu yacinga ukuba uMzantsi Afrika omtsha uza kuhamba phambili emidlalweni emva kokutshatyalaliswa kwenkqubo yocalulo, kodwa ngathi kuxa litsala nzima eli.
UBONAKALA ngathi urhulumente wocalulo wayezenza iinzame zokuphuhlisa abadlali abanetalente, ingakumbi ezikolweni.
Oko kwakubonakala eSoweto ezikolweni ezinjenge-Altem Secondary ese-Orlando East eyavelisa abadlali abaphambili njengoJomo Sono, uKaizer Motaung, uPercy "Chippa" Moloi no-Ephraim "Shakes" Mashaba.
Ngaloo minyaka amabal' ebhola anjengeSputnik namanye ase-Orlando, eMoroka, eDiepkloof, eSenaoane, eMofolo, eNaledi, eMeadowlands, ePimville naseJabavu kwakudlalelwa kuwo imidlalo yezikolo neyeligi yodidi lwabanga-hlawulwayo.
Ngoku inkoliso yaloo mabala akasekho, ukanti ayisekho nemidlalo yezikolo eyayidlalwa rhoqo ngoLwesithathu nemidlalo yamaqela angahlawulwayo eyayiba ngeempela-veki ayisabukelwa ngabantu abaninzi njengakudala.
Aphela namaqela ayedlala kuloo mabala anjenge-Orlando Preston Brothers, i-Orlando Highlanders,
i-Extension Gunners, iDiepkloof Blue Spurs, iPimville Tiny Rockies, iZola Black Dragons, iMoletsane Young Tigers, iMeadowlands Darkies namany' amaninzi.
La maqela atshabalala kwakungena inkqubo entsha yedemokhrasi eyeza nabantu abafika besithi abaphathi bebhola bakudala babezinika amandla amakhulu.
UKUBANGWA kwezikhundla okwatshabalalisa iSouth African National Football Association eyayikhokelwa nguGeorge Thabe kwaza kwasekwa iSouth African Football Association kwayingcwaba ibhola engahlawulelwayo eSoweto nakweziny' iingingqi zeli lizwe.
Kwatshabalala nemibutho eyayilawul' ibhola njengeJohannesburg Bantu Football Association (JBFA) eyaba negalelo elikhulu ekuveliseni iimbalasane ezinjengoZacharia "Computer" Lamola noGeorge "Brains" Mchunu.
"Ukuthi shwaka ebholeni kwabaphathi bebhola yodidi lwamaqela angahlawulwayo kwayichana kanobom ibhola yethu. Ngoku sizama ukuphuhlis' ulutsha ebholeni yaye sibongoza abazali ukuba basincedise ekuphuhliseni izakhono zabantwana babo," utsho uPhil Mogodi oyintloko yeSAFA-Soweto.
Uvumile ukuba izinto azihambi kakuhle kwibhola yodidi lwabangahlawulwayo. Ukwathe ukohluthwa kwamandla kwabaphathi bamaqela akolu didi ababengabaqeqeshi nabanini bala maqela akuzange kusingathwe ngokufanelekileyo.
"Baninzi abadlali abanesiphiwo eSoweto abalindele ukuvunjululwa, kodwa sichanwa kukungabi namali kuba asifumani nkxaso yamali kwiSAFA."
Nguye ojongene noxanduva lokungen' ephuma efun' abaxhasi.
KUQHUBEKA ntoni kona ezikolweni? "Ibhola neminy' imidlalo ayisadlalwa ngokomgangatho ophezulu ezikolweni kungakudala. Akusekho ukuzimisela. Iititshala zifun' ukuhlawulwa imali yokusebenz' ixesha elongezelelweyo xa zidlalisa abafundi imidlalo, loo nto ke ibabethe abantwana abathand' imidlalo," itshilo eny' inqununu.
Kwiminyaka eyadlulayo iititshala zazikhuthaza abafundi ukuba badlale imidlalo nasemva kweeyure zokufunda, waza umbutho weSouth African Democratic Teachers Union wanyanzelisa ukuba imidlalo mayidlalwe ngexesha lesikolo - yaqala apho ke inkathazo.
"Kudala izikolo zazisakha amaqela omeleleyo emidlalo, kodwa ngoku akusenzeki oko," itshilo eny' inqununu.
"Asisenalo ixesha lokuqulunqa inkqubo yezemidlalo. Sasiba namaqela omeleleyo kuqala kuba iSebe leMfundo neMidlalo lalisenzela imidlalo yonyaka yezikolo, iititshala zifundiswa ngokuqeqesha abadlali yaye sinikwa nabantu ababephatha imidlalo, thina sijongene nokuhlohl' abafundi nokwakha amaqela omeleleyo kwimidlalo eyohlukeneyo."
UPanyaza Lesufi osisithethi seSebe leMfundo eGauteng uthi bubuvuvu obo.
"Ezemidlalo zifakwe phantsi kwezifundo zeLife Orientation. Xa besithi abanako ukumelana nalo msebenzi, kwenzeke kanjani ukuba sibe nesikolo esizibalule kwiDanone Soccer Competition de saya kusimela phesheya?"
Ukuhla komgangatho wemidlalo ezikolweni akwenzi babembalwa kuphela abadlali abaveliswa zizikolo. Kukho nengxaki yokungakwazi kuziphatha...
ULinda Buthelezi owayedlala kwiBafana Bafana uthi ingxaki eyenza iqela lelizwe lingadlali kakuhle kukungakwazi ukuziphatha kwabadlali bale mihla.
"Sasifundiswa ukuba nesimilo nendlela yokuziphatha esikolweni," utsho uLinda.
Uphinde wabagxeka kanobom nabaphathi bebhola. "Bayibulala ibhola yeli ngokuqesh' abaqeqeshi abangekho mgangathweni bamany' amazwe. Iqela lelizwe elaliqeqeshwa nguClive Barker labonisa ukuba abadlali esinabo kweli bangabetha amazwe ehlabathi. Abaphathi bebhola bafanele basebenzise abadlali abadala ekuphuhliseni ibhola. Kaloku bangabona bantu banobuchule bokuphuhlisa isakhono sabadlali abaselula.
"Ingaphumelela njani ibhola ezikolweni ube umbutho olawula ibhola ungengomzekelo omhle kwawona?
"I-SAFA ifanele iphale phambili ekuphuhlisweni kwebhola kwaye yiyo emayifumanele izikolo inkxaso."
Nangona kunjalo kudliwano-ndlebe lwakutshanje kunomathotholo, usekela-mongameli weSAFA, uGqr. Irvin Khoza wathi lo mbutho awunamali yokuphuhlis' ibhola! [x]

Amaqumrhu Abandakanyekayo



Zonke iinkampani nemibutho echaphazelekayo kule nkqubo adweliswe kuluhle olungezantsi apha ze nemisebenzi noxanduva lwayo ichaziwe.

* Amashishini Asakhulayo Naphakathi
* uMququzeleli weThuso Kwimimandla
* Umcebisi
* Inkonzo yeKhula Exhasa Amashishini
* Isiqinisekiso Sokufumana Imali-mboleko kwiKhula
* iBhanki

iCandelo Lamashishini Asakhasayo Naphakathi

* Lithetha neofisi yeThuso ngoncedo lwangaphambi (lwezimali okanye lweengcebiso) okanye emva kwesicelo semali-mboleko
* Ligcwalisa ze lityikitye amaphepha ezicelo
* Liphendula imibuzo ze licacise nezinto okanye imiba ethi ikhankanywe
* Ityikitya izibhambathiso nemiqathango yamaphulo ndawonye noMququzeli noMcebisi weThuso (izibhambathiso nemiqathango zicacisa ekufuneka kwenziwe, ngubani, nini nokuba njani ze ekugqibeleni ziveze ukuba uMcebisi lo uya kubuyekezwa njani na)
* Yamkela izicwangciso zoshishino ezigqityiweyo okanye ingxelo yasemva kwesicelo semali-mboleko esuka kwi-ofisi yabacebisi
* Iqondisisa okanye iqinisekisise ze yamkele ingxam yesicwangciso soshishino okanye ingxelo yasemva kwesicelo semali-mboleko
* Ithetha neebhasnki ukuze ifumane uncedo lwezimali (ukuba kunyanzelekile, umfaki-sicelo uya kucela umcebisi ukuba abe yingxenye yeengxoxo zesicelo semali-mboleko nebhanki)
* Inikezela ngeemali-mboleko ezinikezelwe yibhanki kumashishini ngokwezicwangciso zoshishino nesivumelwano semali-mboleko
* Ikhupha intlawulo yomcebisi ebimele ukuphuma kumfaki-sicelo emva kokuba imali-mboleko iphunyeziwe

UMQUQZELELI WOMMANDLA WETHUSO

* Wamkela ahluze izicelo zamashishini asakhasayo naphakathi ngokwemigaqo ebekiweyo
* Ukhaba izicelo ezingamelaniyo neemfuno ezichaziweyo
* Uqinisekisa ukuba imiqathango yezibhambathiso ityikitywe ngabo bonke ababandakanyekayo
* Uqunusekisa ukuba bonke ababandakanyekayo bayazifumana iikopi zemiqathango yesibhambathiso
* Ujongisisa aqinisekise ukuba isicwangciso soshishino okanye ingxelo yasemva kwesicelo so iyahambelana nemigaqo yomgangatho
* Ubuyisela imisebenzi engekho mgangathweni kumcebisi
* Ubhala phantsi ze athumele kwicandelo Leenkonzo Zenkxaso Kubathengi iziphakamiso zokuba kuhlawulwe umcebisi emva kokuphunyezwa kwesicelo semali-mboleko okanye emva kokufumana ingxelo ekholisayo yasemva kwesicelo semali-mboleko
* Ugcina uqhagamshelwano neogisa lebhanki elinoxanduva lokujongana nee-akhawunti zamashishini asakhasayo naphakathi
* Wabelana ngeengxelo ze abambe neentlanganiso negosa lebhanki apho kuyimfuneko khona
* Wabelana ngeengxelo necandelo Eliqinisekisa Iimali-mboleko
* Ukhuthaza ishishini elisakhasayo neliphakathi ukuba liniker ibhanki ii-akhawunti zesebe lalo labalawuli
* Ujonga intsebenzo yabacebisi ze enze iziphakamiso zokuba bakhutshwe abo bangasebenziyo
* Uthabatha amanyathelo ngezicelo ezibhalwe kwiibhanki ezicela ukuba angenelele kwiintlekele ze aqinisekise futhi ukuba iingxelo zingenisiwe kwiibhanki
* Ubamba iintlanganiso neebhanki, abacebisi nala mashishini eza nezicelo zeemali-mboleko

UMCEBISI

* Uqinisekisaiimfuno zeshishini kwelo shishini
* Ungomnye wabantu abatyikitya imiqathango yesibhambathiso neshishini kwakunye noMququzeleli weThuso
* Wamkela ikopi yemiqathango yesibhambathiso eso
* Uncedisa ekuqulunqweni kwesicangciso soshishino okanye ekucebiseni ishishini emva kwesicelo semali-mboleko njengoko kukhankanyiwe kwimiqathango yesibhambathiso eso
* Ungenisa isicwangciso soshishino okanye ingxelo yasemva kwesicelo semali-mboleko kwi-ofisi yeThuso
* Ushukuxa ingxam yesicwangciso soshishino okanye yengxelo yasemva kwesicelo semali-mboleko
* Wenza iinguqu nezilungiso ezilindelekileyo kwiingxelo ze ke angenise ingxelo yokugqibela
* Wmakela intlawulo yeenkonzo ezinikezelweyo emva kokuphunyezwa kwesicelo semali-mboleko okanye ingxelo ekholisayo yasemva kwesicelo semali-mboleko

ICANDELO LEENKONZO ZENKXASO KUMASHISHINI

* Lithi thaca kwanomkhomba-ndlela wenkqubo Yeengcebiso yeThuso
* Lijongisisa intsebenzo kwakunye nabasebenzi benkqubo Yeengebiso yeThuso
* Liqhuba amabango abacebisi aphakanyiswe yi-ofisi yeThuso
* Liqinisekisa ubukho bobudlelwane obuphilileyo phakathi kwabo bonke ababandakanyekayo kule nkqubo Yeengcebiso yeThuso
* Linika amanqaku ze ibhalise futhi ikhabele ngaphandle abacebisi abangenantsebenzo nabangathobeliyo
* Lamkela izicelo elizibhalelwe ziibhanki ze izithumele kwii-ofisi zabacebisi ezifanelekileyo ukuze zijongisiswe kakuhle
* Liqinisekisa ukuba iibhanki ezibandakanyekayo zifumana imbalelwano eziyidingayo ukuqinisa ubudlelwane nokwenza lula intsebenziswano

ICANDELO LEKHULA ELIQINISEKISA IZICELO ZEEIMALI-MBOLEKOKHULA

* Libonelela ii-ofisi zeThuso ngoluhlu olugqibeleleyo lwawo onke amashishini asakhasayo naphakathi aqinisekisiweyo
* Lihlala lifaka izicelo zokungenelela kwiintleke zeemeko ezingaqhelekanga kwiThuso
* Lamkela iingxelo kwii-ofisi zeThuso
* Ligcina uqhagamshelwano nawo onke amaqumrhu abandakanyekayo

IBHANKI

* Yamkela iphepha elinesicelo senkxaso-mali ndawonye nesicwangciso soshishino kwishishini elisakhasayo okanye eliseza kubakho
* Idlana iindlebe namashishini, lihlole ze liphicothe izicelo zenkxaso-mali ngokwemigaqo yaloo bhanki
* Iphumeza okanye likhabe izicelo zemali-mboleko
* Yazisa ishishini elifake isicelo kuqala ze ilandelise ngomcebisi, igqibelise ngoMququzeleli weThuso ngesi sigqibo ifikelele kuso
* Ifaka isicelo Sokukhulwa Kwesiqinisekiso Semali-mboleko ukuba isicelo eso sithe saphunyezwa
* Ikhupha inkxaso-mali emva kokuphunyezwa kweisiqinisekiso semali-mboleko yiKhula
* Yazisa ishishini ukuba ze lize nimcebisi xa lityikitya iimpepha phambi kokukhululwa kwemali-mboleko leyo
* Ifaka isicelo, ngembalelwano, sokuba ishishini lifumane iingcebiso simahla kumcebisi kwiinyanga ezintathu zokuqala. Ngapha koko, iingcebiso zinganikezelwa ngentlawulo enokuhlalelwa phantsi ithethwe isixhosa.
* Yamkela iingxelo zeengcebiso zokuqala kwii-ofisi zeThuso
* Ifaka isicelo, ngembalelwano, sokungenelela kwiintlekele
* Yamkela iingxelo
* Ibamba iintlanganiso noMququzeleli, umcebisi, kwakunye neshishini elo

Iinyawo ezintle
Intwasa-hlobo sele ifikile, kwaye ngokuya imo yezulu isiba shushu, iya isiba lixesha lokunxiba iimbadada - ngoko ke kuza kufuneka uzinonophele iinyawo zakho uzenze zibe ziinyawo ezibukekayo... Kubhale uCharis Dawson
NANJENGOKO iinyawo zakho bezikhe zazimela ezihlangwini nasezikawusini iinyanga ezintathu zonke, zimelwe ukuba bezingahoyekanga noko, ngoku lixesha lokuzinika ipedicure.
Ipedicure yeyona ndlela ilula abantu ababona ngayo ukuba uyihoyile indlela obukeka ngayo - kwaye ndikholwe xa ndisithi, abantu bayaziqaphela iinyawo!
Zenze ipedicure kabini ngenyanga, usebenzisa la manyathelo alula, ukuba wenza njalo awusokuze uphinde ube nantloni zokuveza iinyawo zakho.
Izinto oza kuzisebenzisa
INail polish remover (Sebenzisa: iCutex, R10,49; iyafumaneka kwaClicks)
ICotton wool (Sebenzisa: iTLC Cotton Wool, R13,99 inephedi ezingama-80; kwaClicks)
INail clipper (Sebenzisa: iBeauty Essentials, R19,99; kwaClicks)
Ipumice stone (Sebenzisa: iFeet First pumice stone, ziyi-R19,99 xa zimbini; kwaClicks)
I-orange stick (Sebenzisa: iDischem orange sticks, ziyi-R6,95 xa zili-11; zifumaneka kwaDischem)
IMoisturising Lotion (Sebenzisa: iDawn, Vitamin E hand and body cream, R11,99; kwaPick n Pay)
Okokugqibela, kufuneka nesitya esinamanzi afudumeleyo anesepha, netawula efumileyo.
Kunye nenail polish yakho oyithandayo. Okanye utshintshe enombala usebenzise engamanzi ukuze iinzipho zibe nombala wendalo...
Omawukwenze
1 Susa yonke ipolishi esezinzitsheni zeenzwane zakho.
2 Sebenzisa ukumila kweenzwane zakho usike iinzipho zakho ngqalileyo uyophumela ekugqibeleni uze iikona uzenze ngqukuva kancinci. Musa ukuzenza mfutshane kakhulu ezikoneni - oku kungazenza zikhulele phakathi enyameni zibebuhlungu.
3 Hlalisa iinyawo zakho emanzini afudumeleyo, anesepha imizuzu engama-15-20. Ngelixa iinyawo zisemanzi, sebenzisa ipumice stone - ukhuhle ngokwenza izangqa, susa ufele olomileyo. Oku kuza kushiya iinyawo zakho zimpuluswa okwesilika kwaye zithambile.
4 Sula iinyawo zakho ngetawuli, uze ke usebenzise icala elitsolo le-orange stick, susa konke ukungcola okuphantsi kweenzipho zakho zeenzwane. Qaphela ungatyhaleli phambili ngamandla. Sebenzisa elinye icala le-orange stick ukutyhalela emva inyama yeenzipho.
5Thambisa ilowushini ezinyaweni nasezinzwaneni, uze usonge iinyawo zakho ngetawuli emanzi imizuzu emi- 5 ukuya kweli-10. Oku kwenzelwa ukuba zithambe ngakumbi iinyawo, okanye xa zome kakhulu okanye zichachamba. Ziwalaze ngamanzi emva kwemizuzu eli-10.
6 Sula uzipho ngalunye ngecotton wool ethiwe nkxu kwinail polish remover ukuze ususe ilowushini eshiyekileyo.
7Hlukanisa iinzwane zakho ngokuhlohla phakathi kwazo nganye intwana yecotton wool. Ziqabe umaleko wokuqala wombala uziyeke zome. Yongeza owesibini ukuze umbala ucace.
8 Ukuba usebenzise ipolishi enombala ezinyaweni zakho, gqibezela ngokuqaba engamanzi ngaphezulu okanye isealer ukuze ihlale ixesha elide. [x]

UJohan Blaauw, ongusekela-sihlalo we-SATI, wenze intetho malunga ne-SATI kwiiNkonzo zeeLwimi zePhondo loMntla-Ntshona kwimibhiyozo ye-ITD ngomhla wama-30 kuSeptemba. I-SATI izimanye ne-PEG (iQela leeNgcali zabaHleli), i-Safrea (Southern African Freelancers Association) kunye ne-WGSA (Writers Guild of SA) ukuze iyile umanyano olungekho ngqingqwa lweengcali zolwimi nezeendaba. Injongo kukuhlanganisa amathambâ entloko ukuze sibe nefuthe kumajelo eendaba, sinyuse umgangatho wethu kuwonke-wonke nokwabelana ngobuchule, ngoxa intlangano nganye izimele. Ukuwongwa ngesiqinisekiso sokutolika ngokulindela kwisithethi (consecutive interpreting)
Sibamba ngazibini kuwo onke amalungu ethu athathe inxaxheba kuphando malunga nokuwonga ngesiqinisekiso sokutolika ngokulindela kwisithethi. Sifumene iimpendulo esingaphaya kwe-100 yaye kubonakala ngathi kukho imfuneko emandla yokusungula olu hlobo lwesiqinisekiso. Inyathelo elilandelayo ke ngoku kukukhangela indlela yokuvavanya abo bazigqatsele olu hlobo lokuwongelwa isiqinisekiso.

Iindaba ezivela kwi-FIT
I-FIT EC iza kubamba intlanganiso yayo elandelayo eMacau ngomhla wesi-4 nowesi-5 kuNovemba 2010. UMarion Boers (umlawuli ophetheyo we-SATI) uza kube ekho apho ekwisikhundla sakhe njengosihlalo we-FIT.
Uhlelo lwamvanje lweleta yeendaba ze-FIT, iTranslatio, iyafumaneka sithethanje kwi-http://www.fit-ift.org/cms/uploads/file/infofit_documents/17921_Translatio_No3_2010_WEB.pdf. Olu hlelo luphethe iingxelo ngeziganeko eziququzelelwe yimibutho engamalungu eNew Zealand, eCuba, eVenezuela nase-Argentina nakubaguquleli boncwadi eFinland. Lukwacacisa ngokufuduka kwesiGqeba sooNobhala be-FIT ukusuka eMontreal ukuya eBasel, eSwitzerland nokubekwa koMlawuli oPhetheyo omtsha we-FIT, uJeannette Ãrsted. 
Ukhuphiswano lwezoBugcisa bokuguqulela nge-ITD: Ingaba usebenzisa inkqubo yekhompyutha yasimahla eyenza umsebenzi wakho ube nemveliso yaye uwunandiphe nangakumbi? Ukuba kunjalo, nceda uthumele ingcaciso ngaloo nkqubo, indlela ekunceda ngayo wena njengomguquleli nendlela abanye abaguquleli abanokuyifumana ngayo ikopi yayo. Igama lakho liya kufakwa phakathi kwamagama aya kuthi abe nethamsanqa lokutsalwa aququzelelwa yiKomiti yokuGuqulela ngezoBugcisa ye-FIT. Inkcazelo efunyenwe kubo bonke abo baye bangenela olu khuphiswano iya kwenziwa ifumaneke kuye wonkâ umntu. Ophumeleleyo uya kuvela kwiwebhusayithi ye-FIT, kunye nengcombolo emfutshane malunga nomsebenzi wakhe. Olu khuphiswano lungenelwa simahla. Abo bangenela olu khuphiswano bafanele babe ngamalungu emibutho engamalungu e-FIT yaye bakwafanele bachaze igama lombutho wabo kunye nenkcazelo ngendlela yokuqhagamshelana nabo. Umhla wokugqibela wokufaka inkcazelo efunekayo nguLwesihlanu, umhla wesi-3 kuDisemba 2010. Le nkcazelo ifanele ithunyelwe nge-imeyili kwi-FITtrantech@gmail.com. Ophumeleleyo uya kwaziswa ngoJanuwari 2011.

Uphando lweBONA
UMzantsi Afrika uzilungiselela ukwaluka onke amadoda kwiphulo lawo lokulwa nobhubhani weHIV/AIDS. Baceba ukwaluka amakhwenkwe emva nje kokuzalwa - ngaba oko ke kuthetha ukuba sisizukulwana sokugqibela esi ukuya esuthwini?
IINTABA zibona amadangatye omlilo elenyeza minyaka le ebusika kutshiswa iingubo namabhoma abakhwetha. Lowo ke ngumbono waminyaka le kubakhwetha abadomboza kooyise nooyis' omncinci becela ukuya esuthwini. Kodwa phantsi kwemithetho emitsha yolwaluko kufuneka ngoku amakhwenkwe aza kuya esuthwini afumane nemvume kagqirha neyenkosi. Isiko lokwaluka libalulekile ebantwini abaninzi kangangokuba abanye bade bazame neendlela zokulivuselela nakwimimandla yoogobi-tyholo.
Iingcali zonyango zithi kungenzeka kufuneke litshintshwe isiko elinenkqayi lokwaluka- kwaye urhulumente uziphula-phule.
Ukwaluka onke amadoda yenye yeenzame ezenziwayo zokulwa nobhubhani kagawulayo kwiphulo elitsha likarhulumente ekuthiwa yiAIDS and STI National Strategic Plan 2007-2011 neliphehlelelwe kwiNkomfa yesithathu yeAIDS eMzantsi Afrika ebiseThekwini kutshanje.
Abathunywa abangaphaya kwama-4 000 ebebeyizimasile bavumelene ekupheleni kwayo ukuba "ukwaluka makufumaneke yaye kuvuleleke kuwo onke amadoda".
Lo mba ubutshis' ibunzi kangangokuba izithethi ezininzi zamadoda zibone kukuhle zithi pahaha ukuba zalukile na nokuba azalukanga. Ikhe yabhala iBONA ngomba wokwaluka ngoFebruwari emva kokuvakala kweendaba zempumelelo yalo ekuthinteleni usulelo lweHIV eKenya naseUganda. Ngoku lubonakala lusebenza naseMzantsi Afrika.
Imibuzo
Ibenkulu impikiswano ngalo mba ngenxa yokuba abantu bebenemibuzo emininzi ngawo.
Abantu bebebuza imibuzo enjengokuthi kuza kwenzeka ntoni kweli siko linenkqayi? Amabhinqa aza kuncedakala njani koku? Inkqubo yethu yezempilo iza kumelana njani nomsebenzi ongaka?
Omnye umbuzo ubungowokuba ngaba kufanele na ukwenziwa oku xa abantu bengafuni ukuzikhusela ngeziny' iindlela?
Nangona ibisiwa ngokuwa imibuzo bukho ubungqina bokuba ukwaluka buwanciphisa de kufikelele kwi-60% amathuba okosulelwa yiHIV.
Ezo ziindaba ezimnandi kwiingcali zonyango, ukanti abanye balubona ulwaluko lungancedi ngokwaneleyo.
Nangona kunjalo iingcali zonyango zehlabathi zalwamkela ulwaluko lwamadoda njengenxalenye yothintelo lweHIV nanjengomgaqo-nkqubo weWorld Health Organisation/United Nations' UNAIDS ebutsheni balo nyaka.
Kaloku ezi ngcali zavumelana ngezinto ezimbini:
Ukwalukwa kwamadoda sesona sixhobo sisenaso okwangoku sisalinde ukufunyanwa kwamachiza okuthintela ugawulayo;
Ukwalukwa kwamadoda kufuneka kusetyenziswe kunye nezinye iindlela zokuzikhusela kwiHIV njengokusebenzisa iikhondom, ukuba neqabane elinye nokuzikhwebula kwisondo.
Iingcali zikholelwa ekubeni ukwaluka kwamadoda kuza kunceda emazweni anjengoMzantsi Afrika anabantu abaninzi abaneHIV kangangokuba neenkqubo zonikezelo ngeeARV azikwazi ukumelana nabo.
Oku kunganceda emazweni aseAfrika akwiSub-Sahara kwiminyaka eli-10 ezayo nalapho kuhlala i-63% yabantu abaphila neHIV/AIDS eAfrika
Kuya kuthintela usulelo lweHIV ebantwini abazizigidi ezibini, kuthintele nokufa kwabantu abangama-300 000.
Kwiminyaka eli-10 elandelayo ulwaluko lwamadoda luya kusinceda nangakumbi isizukulwana esilandelayo: ngokuthintela usulelo olutsha lweHIV kwi-3,7 yezigidi, kuthintele nokusweleka kwe-2,7 yezigidi.
Ngoobani abafanele baluke?
Ngokutsho komphandi weUNAIDS, uNjingalwazi Bertral Auvert, onke amadoda afanele aluke kuquka namadoda amadala angazange aluka. Uthi namabhinqa angancedisa ekukhuthazeni eli phulo ngokwala ukuba nendibano yesondo nendoda engalukanga.
Uyibethelele nento yokuba abantu bafanele bakubone oku njengesinye sezixhobo sokulwa neHIV/AIDS ngoko ukwaluka akuthethi kuthi mazingasetyenziswa eziny' iindlela zokuzikhusela.
Kungoku nje i-30% yamadoda aseMzantsi Afrika alukile, ngoko kuza kuthiwani ngeentlanga ekungelo siko kuzo ukwaluka?
"Abantu bangayenza into nokuba ayilosiko labo xa bechazelwa ngokupheleleyo ngayo," utsho.
Oku sekwenziwe eKorea apho kwakungekho ndoda yalukileyo ngo-1940 kodwa ngoku i-60% yawo yalukile.
Afanele ukwaluka nini amakhwenkwe?
Kubhetele alukwe emva kweentsuku ezimbalwa ezelwe njengakwisiko lamaJuda ukuze angeva iintlungu kakhulu. Izithunywa ebezikule nkomfa zivumelene ngokuba kubhetele amakhwenkwe alukwe engekaqali ukuzibandakanya kwiindibano zesondo.
Zithini iinkokheli zomthonyama ngalo mba njengoko uchaphazela isiko lokungeniswa kwamakhwenkwe ebudodeni nangeentlanga ezingenalo eli siko?
Kuvunyelwene kule nkomfa ukuba abaqulunqi bomgaqo-nkqubo kufuneka bathethane nabantu kuquka neengcibi eziziphilisa ngalo msebenzi.
Bekungafanelanga kubekho iimpikiswano nokuxhathisa kumbandela wokwaluka kwamadoda kuba amanani abonisa ukuba xa umntu omnye eqala ukufumana iiARV, bahlanu abantu abosulelwa yiHIV. Sifanele sincedisane silwe nalo bhubhani.
Ingaba ngenene ukwaluka kuyasebenza?
Amanani abonisa ukuba ukwaluka kwamadoda kunciphisa isichenge sokusulelwa kwawo yiHIV ngaphezulu nje kwesiqingatha. Kodwa akuwakhuseli ekusulelweni zeziny' izifo ezisulelwa ngesondo.
Ikhondom iseyeyona ikukhusela ngokupheleleyo kwizifo. Kwaye xa uthe wanesifo esisulela ngesondo, izilonda ezibangelwa siso zikubeka engozini enkulu yokusulelwa yiHIV.
Ngokunjalo naxa ube nendibano yesondo ungazikhuselanga ungekapholi ncam emva kokwaluka usengozini yokusulelwa yiHIV.
Ngoko yazi ukuba ukwaluka kuncedisana neziny' iindlela zokuzikhusela, akuthabathi indawo yazo - kwaye akuthethi kuthi ufanele ungayi ukuyovavanywa igazi ukuba akunayo na iHIV nekuyinto abambalwa gqitha abantu abayenzayo.
Kuthiwani ke ngamabhinqa?
Ilungu langasese lebhinqa lingenwa lula yiHIV, ngoko yiloo nto amabhinqa amaninzi ehlabathini esosulelwa yiHIV ngokuba nendibano yesondo.
Uphando lubonisa ukuba i-81% yamabhinqa afuna baluke oonyana bawo ukanti i-69% yawo ifuna aluke amaqabane awo ukuze bakhusele oonyana namadoda awathandayo, kwaye angancedisa xa enako ukubakhusela.
Kuza kwenziwa njani ukwalukwa kwamadoda amaninzi?
Uninzi loogqirha luthi ulwaluko malwenzelwe kumaziko empilo ukuze kuncitshiswe iingozi ezinokuhla ezifana nokufela kwabakhwetha emabhomeni nokusasazeka kweHIV okwenziwa kukungalandelwa kwenkqubo yococeko emabhomeni. Bakubona oku kufanele kwenziwe ngamanqanaba amabini:
Amadoda amadala afanele alukele kumaziko empilo ukuze kuncitshiswe iingxaki ezinjengokopha, iintlungu nosulelo.
Iintsana ezingamakhwenkwe ziya kwalukwa emva nje kokuzalwa xa abazali bevuma.
Kuyaqondwa ukuba amaziko empilo ebephantsi koxinzelelo lokumelana nomsebenzi wawo nangaphambi kokuba kubekho ugwayimbo lwabasebenzi oluqhokre kanobom inkonzo yezempilo. Kodwa ngokutsho kukaMark Bletcher weNational Treasury urhulumente uza kufaka imali eninzi kwinkonzo yempilo yeli. Elo nyathelo lifanele liqhwatyelw' izandla kuba ukwaluka kwamadoda kuza konga imali kuba kuza kunciphisa abantu abosulelwa yiHIV baze bafun' unyango.
Oko kuza kuba lithuba lokufundisa amadoda ngemiba yezempilo njengamabhinqa afundiswa rhoqo ngokucwangcisa, ukukhulelwa nokukhulis' abantwana ngokutsho kukaRodney Fortuin weEngenderHealth eseKapa.
Indlela eya phambili
Sifuna ukubona amadoda angalukanga esiba yimizekelo ngokuba ngawokuqala ukuya kwaluka kumaziko empilo. Sifun' ukuva ootata besitsho phandle ukuthi, "Unyana wethu omtsha walukwe esandul' ukuzalwa esibhedlele."
UMzantsi Afrika lilizwe eliwakhuseleyo amasiko alo neliwalwelayo ukuba angabhangiswa.
Kungoku nje kuliwa nokusindisa abantu kowona bhubhani ongxamele ukutshayela bonke abantu emhlabeni.
Phantse abantu abathathu kwabane abaswelekayo eMzantsi Afrika beneminyaka ephakathi kwe-15 nama-49 babulawa ngugawulayo (iAIDS).
Sonke siyaqonda ukuba kuza kubanzima ukuvela nendlela entsha yokubhiyozela ukungena kwenkwenkwe ebudodeni.
Ubuhlungu bokudliwa ngumdlanga kuyeyona nto ibalulekileyo kweli siko - kodwa kusithiwa khetha lona okanye ukusweleka, singabavimba njani oonyana neentombi ithuba lokuphila? [x]

Kunceda njani?
Abaphandi bathi ukwaluka kukhusela indoda ekosulelweni yiHIV ngeendlel' ezimbini. Umphakathi wejwabi uneeseli ezosuleleka lula yiHIV, ngoko ezo seli ziyasuswa. Emva koko umaleko omtsha ekuthiwa yikeratin - eyenziwe ngeprotini efanayo neyeenzipho neenwele - uyakhula ngaphezu kwelungu lobudoda uze ulikhusele kusulelo.

Akho amayeza okugonya?
Maninzi amayeza okugonyelwa iAIDS alingiweyo emazweni angama-20 ehlabathi aquka noMzantsi Afrika kodwa akukabikho lilindeleke ukuba lisetyenziswe kwiminyaka engama-20 ukuya kwengama-25 ezayo. Xa selide lakho elisebenzayo kulindeleke ukuba liya kunceda nabantu asele benayo iHIV ngokunciphisa ulwamvila lwayo kuze oko kuphucule imeko yabo yempilo.

Iintsana ezingamakhwenkwe kufuneka zoluke emva nje kokuzalwa
Azincedi izithinteli zosulelo?
Izithinteli zosulelo liyeza elibulala okanye elithintela ukungena kweentsholongwane ezisasaza usulelo ngokwenkcazo yeGlobal Campaign For Microbicides. Ezinye zenza ukuba intsholongwane inganwenwi nokuba sele ingenile emzimbeni.
Apha ke zisetyenziswa kwizithambiso zelungu langasese lebhinqa ukuze zithintele ukusulelwa yintsholongwane esasaza iHIV neziny' izifo ezisulelwa ngesondo.
Kodwa ebutsheni balo nyaka kumiswe ukusetyenziswa kwezithinteli zosulelo ezibini ngenxa yokungasebenzi kakuhle.
Oko kulubuyisel' umva uphando lwazo kwaye ngoku azikakukulungeli ukusetyenziswa ngabantu iminyaka eli-10 ezayo. Xa sezikulungele ukusetyenziswa ziya kunceda amabhinqa anamaqabane angafuniyo ukusebenzisa ikhondom. Ezinye ziya kukhusela amabhinqa kusulelo kodwa abenako ukukhulelwa ukuze akhusele impilo yawo kodwa abafumane abantwana.
Ezinye izithinteli
Iikhondom zezona kugxiniswa kakhulu kuzo, kodwa zikho "nezikhuseli zamabhinqa" ezinokusebenza. Kwenziwe ikhondom, qha ayifumaneki lula - kwaye kungaba nzima ebhinqeni ukuyisebenzisa. Kusenziwa nophando kweli lokuba indlela endala yokucwangcisa ngediaphragm ingasetyenziswa na ukuthintela ukusulelwa yiHIV.
Oku kubalulekile kuba umlomo wesibeleko ngowona uneeseli ezininzi ezisuleleka lula zizifo.

Ukulwa ulwaphulo-mthetho - ngendlela yaselokishini
Ukuzibandakanya koluntu kwidabi lokulwa ulwaphulo-mthetho kuzigxothile izaphuli-mthetho, atsho ancipha namanani olwaphulo-mthetho.
Kubhale uForce Khashane noSteve Makhanya
BONA XHOSA June 2008
ULWAPHULO-MTHETHO 1
USAKHUMBULA xa
i-Alexandra Township
yayibizwa nge-"Dark City"? Kaloku yayingabizwa kanjalo kuba ingenazibani ezitratweni nje kuphela. I-Alex, iSebokeng nemimandla ethile yaseSoweto enjenge-Orlando neNaledi yayizezona ndawo ziyingozi eMzantsi Afrika.
Apha ulwaphulo-mthetho oluhamba nobundlobongela lwalugquba okwengada emzini ongenazinja.
Ingaba izinto zitshintshile ngoku?
Impendulo yalo mbuzo ngu-"Hayi!" omkhulu xa sijonga izihloko neengxelo zophango, ukubulawa kwabantu nokonakaliswa kwempahla emaphepha-ndabeni.
Qho xa uvul' iTV okanye ireyido uva iindaba zomntu obulewe ngokungenalusini.
Ilizwe lethu lilijaja ligazi labantu kodwa ke imeko ayixhomisi mehlo ngokwendlela evakala ngayo!
Uya kumangaliswa xa ungagqibeli ngokumamela ezo ndaba ubuze izimvo zabantu. Uya kuva ukuba ulwaphulo-mthetho luyancipha nakwiindawo ebezikade zingummandla kafayayo.
Amanani akhutshwe ngurhulumente kutshanje abonisa ukuba zinciphile iziganeko zolwaphulo-mthetho e-Alexandra naseSebokeng.
Singafunda ke kwezi lokishi ukuba kukuzibandakanya koluntu nedabi lokulwa ulwaphulo-mthetho olwenze izaphuli-mthetho zaphelelwa ngamahlathi.
Le yimfihlelo yempumelelo yabo ngokutsho kukaTeddy Martin, ongusihlalo weGreater Orlando Community Policing Forum (CPF), umphathi-sititshi samapolisa sase-Orlando, uNgoako Mashao noCaptain M.H. Mbhense.
"I-Orlando yaphala phambili eGauteng ekutshayeleni izikrelemnqa ezaziphatha imipu neemela ezitratweni, kodwa yiSebokeng eyaphumelela kuqala kwelo dabi," utshilo uMartin.
Ngokutsho kukaChomane Chomane weLesedi FM, neNaledi iyaliphumelela idabi lokulwa nolwaphulo-mthetho.
"Ulwaphulo-mthetho luhle nge-80% kummandla wethu," utshilo lo msasazi waba negalelo elikhulu ekusekweni kweCPF nokwathe impumelelo yeli dabi ibangelwe yintsebenziswano noluntu.
INGABA yintoni le itshintshileyo kule minyaka ili-14 yenkululeko eyenze "zakhuseleka" iindawo ezinjenge-Alex, i-Orlando neSebokeng?
Ukuphathwa gadala kwabantu yimithetho yocalulo kuko okwenza bamanyana ngakumbi. Njengokuba lwaphelayo ucalulo lweentlanga, ubuntu bubuyile kwaye kuko okumanye abantu ekulweni nolwaphulo-mthetho.
"Andizange ndacinga ukuba ngeny' imini ndiya kuze ndiphangele kwisikhululo samapolisa. Kaloku sasizicaphukela izikhululo zamapolisa, kodwa ngoku ndine-ofisi kwesinye sazo," utshilo ehleka uTeddy Martin.
Njengoko esebenzela e-Orlando Police Station ufak' igxalaba ekwenziweni kwamacebo okwenza kubekho ukuthembana nentsebenziswano phakathi kwamapolisa eSAPS noluntu.
Balwa njani ke nolwaphulo-mthetho?
UMartin uthe: "Siyekile ngoku ukunyanzelisa imithetho yamapolisa eluntwini. Ngoku sihlala phantsi noluntu sicwangcise yaye sisebenzisane. "Siba neentlanganiso rhoqo ngenyanga ukuze sive izikhalazo zoluntu, sixoxe nangeendlela esingaqinisa ngazo apho sisilela khona, sizame nokulungisa iimpazamo zethu. Abahlali basezilokishini bazinikele ekulusiphuleni neengcambu ulwaphulo-mthetho.
"Sinamadoda namabhinqa azinikeleyo ukuba aza kuvuka ngentsimbi yesithathu kusasa azula-zule ezitratweni, akhaphe abasebenzi ukuya kwiirenki zeeteksi nezeebhasi nakwizikhululo zikaloliwe. Abahlawulwa ngaloo nto, balwa nolwaphulo-mthetho simahla."
Aba bantu banikwa uqeqesho olulodwa kwaye bayakwazi ukubamba umrhanelwa bamse emapolisa akufutshane.
Noluntu alusonganga izandla lonwabele ukhuseleko olulunikwa ngaba bantu.
Banikela nge-R10 umzi ukuze kuthengelwe ukutya neziselo abantu abenza lo msebenzi.
"Intsebenziswano yoluntu yenze sazazi zonke iikona ezizimela kuzo izikrelemnqa," utshilo uMartin.
Kungoku nje sekuyinto enqabileyo ukuva kusithiwa kuxhwilwe imoto e-Orlando. "Izikrelemnqa azisenandawo zithengisa kuzo ezo moto kuba sivale iindawo ezininzi ebezithengisa iintsimbi zeemoto.
"Abantu bakruqukile lulwaphulo-mthetho olunobundlobongela kwaye bafun' ukuncedisa ekulutshayeleni kwiindawo abahlala kuzo. Izaphuli-mthetho ngoku azisenandawo ezilokishini."
Uphinde wayibethelela into yokuba impumelelo yabo ibangelwa yintsebenziswano yoluntu nokuselwa kwamaqumrhu oluntu okulwa ulwaphulo-mthetho asebenzisana namapolisa.
NGOKUTSHO kukaCaptain Mbhense olona lwaphulo-mthetho luyinkathazo ngoku ludushe lwasekhaya nodlwengulo. Ubuhlwempu buba negalelo kudlwengulo kuba maxa wambi amaxhoba athenjiswa imali zizidlwengu abazaziyo, aze loo matyala angaxelwa emapoliseni.
UPortia Tshepe ongumphathi weDonaldson Community Centre (DOCC) e-Orlando uthi kunqabile ukuva ngeziganeko zolwaphulo-mthetho kule lokishi.
"Kaloku apha bekunzima nokunxiba amacici nezihombo zexabiso kuba ziza kuphangwa, ukanti ukuxhwilwa kweemoto bekuyinto yamihla le. Ngoku sezinqabile iziganeko ezinjalo," utsho uPortia.
"Iinkqubo esizenzayo siyiDOCC zokufundisa abantu zenza ulutsha lube neqhayiya ngokuhlala kwiindawo ezinenzolo nezinenkqubela kuluntu olumanyeneyo."
Kusenjalo, amahlumela-dolophu amatsha akufutshane neelokishi ezindala okanye kufutshane nemimandla yamatyotyombe ibazizisulu zezaphuli-mthetho.
"Kaloku izaphuli-mthetho ziyazenzela kwiindawo ezingenabo abantu abazula-zulayo bagade izitrato," utsho u-Oupa Thobejane oyinkumanda yeqela labagadi bezitrato eVosloorus eMpuma Randi.
Uthi kuqhekezwe imizi engama-30 kwisithuba esingaphantsi kwenyanga eVosloorus Extension 28 engummandla onemizi emitsha. Sabamba abarhanelwa abathandathu safumana neeTV ezili-14 ezazibiwe," utshilo. Ingaba amapolisa oluntu athabathel' umthetho ezandleni zawo? Bathi akunjalo ooMartin, uCommissioner Mashao noCaptain Mbhense.
"Asiyikhuthazi loo nto ezintlanganisweni esiba nazo noluntu," utsho uMashao. Ngoku abantu ababaleka ulwaphulo-mthetho ezilokishini bafun' ukubuyela.
"Ndagxothwa kukuqhekezelwa nokuxhwilwa kwebhegi zabantu, ndaya kuhlala eDiepkloof. Kodwa oko ndabuyayo andikakhathazwa bubundlobongela," utsho uMamokgethi Segoathle ongusomashishinikazi owafudukela eSunnyside ePitoli. [x]
UTeddy Martin ongusihlalo weGreater Orlando Community Policing Forum.
Ngeminyaka yocalulo lweentlanga uluntu lwalumanyene ekulweni nalo. Ngoku badibene kwakhona ukulwanolwaphulo-mthetho olunobungozi. Uluntu luthe gqi nohlobo olutsha "lokuzikhusela" ngokudibana lube ngamaqela agxotha izikrelemnqa ezitratweni esebenzisana namapolisa. Kweli phulo abathabathelanga umthetho ezandleni zabo. La madoda namabhinqa azinikeleyo ekulweni nolwaphulo-mthetho afanele abe ngumzekelo omhle kuthi sonke.
UMphathi-sititshi uNgoako Mashao, ekwinkqubo yokuya kwamapolisa eluntwini.

Abantu abazula-zula ezitratweni besilwa ulwaphulo-mthetho banikwa ijakhethi, ibhlukhwe, ikepsi neebhutsi. Banikwa nethotshi, incwadana yokubhala ixesha, indawo nolwaphulo-mthetho olwenzekileyo xa bebamba umrhanelwa, banikwa no-ova ababiza ngawo amapolisa xa bezibona besengozini.

INDLELA YOKUQALISA
Yiya kuva kwisikhululo samapolisa esikufutshane nawe ukuba sinayo na le mibutho (ukuze ungachith' ixesha useka into esele ikhona kakade). Xa sel' ikhona, cela iinombolo zabantu ongaqhagamshelana nabo ukuze ufake igxalaba.
Qalani ngokwenza iCommunity Safety Forum nize nilandelise ngeCPF nemibutho yokugadelana ningabamelwane, ngaloo ndlela niya kufumana inkxaso yomphathi wamapolisa eSAPS wengingqi yenu neSebe lezeKhaya namany' amasebe karhulumente. UMphathiswa uNqakula wathembisa nokuba iza kubakho imali yokwakha ii-ofisi nokujongana neziny' iindleko zeeCommunity Safety Forum. Buza ngaloo nto, ulwele nokuba ibekho imali yezo zinto xa ingekho.
Lumkelani ukufaka abantu abafanelekileyo kwizikhundla ezibafaneleyo. Sebenzisani izakhono abanazo abantu endaweni yokuba niqeqeshe abantu abangenazo ezo zakhono. Xa nifuna ipolisa eniza kusebenzisana nalo, fumanani elisesikhundleni esiphezulu nelizimiseleyo ukusebenzisana nani.
Nakuqala ukusebenza ningatyhafi. Kaloku abantu bayazimisela xa usaqala umsebenzi, baze baphelelwe ngumdla xa benganconywa ngomsebenzi abawenzayo.
Xa ungafumani ntsebenziswano kwisikhululo samapolisa esikufutshane nawe - qhagamshelana neSebe loKhuseleko noNxibelelwano loLuntu eliya kukunceda.
Bhalela abaphathi benkonzo yamapolisa eSAPS, uye kupapasha nengxaki yakho kumajelo eendaba xa ungalufumani uncedo. Kweliny' icala, wancome amapolisa "akho" xa esenz' umsebenzi omhle.
AMACEBISO
Eseyinkwenkwana uTolbart Ngobese nabahlobo bakhe basesikolweni babephanga abantu ezitratweni zase-Orlando. "Sasibalinda kwizikhululo zikaloliwe abantu xa bebuy' emsebenzini, sibaphange imali yabo siyotheng' utywala necuba ngayo," utshilo.
Ngoku nguye ophambili ekulweni ulwaphulo-mthetho. "Ndabona ukuba alunambuyiselo ulwaphulo-mthetho emva kokugwetywa iminyaka
emininzi entolongweni nabahlobo bam." Njengoko ngoku engutata nosomashishini, "ulwazi" lwakhe uNgobese luyamnceda ekwazini amaqhinga ezikrelemnqa neendawo eziyingozi.
Nanga amacebiso awanik' abantu ukuze bangabi ngamaxhosa abaphangi:
Amabhinqa aphuma kade emsebenzini nahamba ngezithuthi zikawonke-wonke makabe nomntu owakhaphayo xa egoduka.
Ungahambi wedwa kwizitrato ezingenabantu okanye emaphandleni elokishi.
Xelela ummelwane omthembileyo xa ungazukubakho iintsuku eziliqela ekhaya.
Lumka ngakumbi xa ukhe wakrob' ebhekileni kuba ungalixhoba elilula kubaphambi.
NAKO LULWAPHULO-MTHETHO
Abazali abakhathazwa ngabantwana okanya abazukulwana abasoloko befun' imali bafanele babaxele emapoliseni. Kaloku nako oku kululwaphulo-mthetho kwaye kuxhaphakile ezilokishini nakweziny' iindawo.
AMAGAMA ABALULEKILEYO
Ukugadelana imizi ningabamelwane, ukuba namapolisa oluntu nemibutho yokhuseleko yoluntu ingasebenzisana ekulweni ulwaphulo-mthetho, iphinde ijonge yaye ikhuthaze amapolisa afanele akhusele abantu.
Ukugadelana imizi ningabamelwane:
Apha abamelwane bayavuma ukugadelana imizi kulwaphulo-mthetho.
Bayaqhagamshelana bodwa kunye namapolisa, abanye bazinikela ekuzula-zuleni izitrato ebusuku begade izaphuli-mthetho.
ICommunity Policing Forum:
I-CPF efanele ibekho kuzo zonke izikhululo zamapolisa yikomiti eyenziwe ngabahlali, amaqela eenkonzo, ulutsha, amaqela emidlalo, imibutho yoonoteksi, ooceba noosomashishini namagosa aphezulu esikhululo samapolisa, kwindawo esisebenza kuyo isikhululo samapolisa.
I-CPF idla ngokumela bonke abamelwane abagadelanayo imizi kuloo mmandla.
ICommunity Safety Forum:
Yona ijongana nomnmandla othe kratya ngobukhulu kuneCPF - yona ingasebenza kummandla onezikhululo zamapolisa ezihlanu okanye ezithandathu - kwaye yona ayigqibeli nje ngokulwa nolwaphulo-mthetho.
NgoMeyi wanyakente uCharles Nqakula onguMphathiswa woKhuselo noKhuseleko wathi le mibutho iza kuba namandla athe kratya kunemibutho yokugadelana kwabamelwane neeCPF.
Ii-CSF zona ziza kusebenzisana namany' amasebe karhulumente afana neleMicimbi yeKhaya ekubambeni abantu abangena kweli ngokukho mthethweni, ziphinde zincede iSebe loLuleko ekubuyiseleni amabanjwa aphuma entolongweni eluntwini, zincede neSebe loBulungisa ukuqinisekisa ukuba abantu bayawazi amalungelo abo.
- GAVIN FOSTER

Ingaba ingxolo ininzi egumbini lokufundela" Okanye kushushu" Okanye liyabanda" Ungoyiswa zezi meko. Wena jolisa amehlo akho ekubeni uphumelele ugqibe uphume apho!
#4 BAMBA IXESHA ULUNGELE UKUSEBENZA
Iintsuku zakho ziza kubantle xa ufika ngexesha esikolweni. Ukufika sele ubaleka kuyakhathaza. Endaweni yoko, ukuba kuyakoyisa ukuvuka kusasa okanye esikolweni kukude, qinisekisa ukuba unewotshi ene-alam eza kukuvusa phambi kwexesha kusasa.
Lungisa yonk' into ebusuku ukuze kusasa ungalibali izinto ezibalulekileyo.
#5 LUNGISA IZINTO EZISISESEKO
Yiba nebhegi yesikolo eyomeleleyo enazo zonke izixhobo eziyimfuneko eklasini njengosiba lokubhala, ipeni yomsizi, irula, umatshini wokulola, iprotraktha, ikhampasi nezinye. Uzigade zingophuki okanye zilahleke!
Kwakhona, qwalasela ukuziphatha egumbini lokufundela:
Musa ukukhwaza uphazamise. Phakamisa isandla ukuze utitshala akubone, uze ulinde ubizwe;
Musa ukwenza intshukumo ephazamisayo;
Hlala endaweni yakho, ngaphandle kokuba uyasuswa;
Hlonela abanye abantu kunye nezinto zabo;
Gcina igumbi lokufundela licocekile;
Landela yonke imithetho yokuziphatha yesikolo.
Ezi zinto zingajongeka ngathi zincinci njengokufika ngexesha - kodwa ke nenkqayi ingena ngeentlontlo.
Ukungazinakani izinto ezincinci kungakubuyisela umva, ngoko ke zithabathel' ingqalelo ukuze uqhubele phambili!
#6 PHULA- PHULA
Kubalulekile ukuphulaphula egumbini lokufundela.
Ukuphulaphula kufuna umise ingqondo wetyise okuthethwayo.
Sebenzisa ingqondo yakho ukukhetha into eza kusenza isifundo sibaluleke kwaye sibenomdla. Khumbula, nokuba awuqondi ukuba isifundo eso sibaluleke ngantoni ebomini bakho, kodwa "sisabalulekile" kuba kufuneka usazi ukuze uphumelele.
Eso sizathu sisodwa nje simele ukukwenza uphulaphule xa ufundiswa.
Phulaphula iititshala zakho, ulandele imiyalelo yazo kakuhle ucele uncedo xa kukho ongakuqondiyo...
#7 JONGANA NEMICELI-MNGENI
... ukuba awukayiqondisisi into ethile, sukuncama! Phula-phula ngakumbi, usebenzele ukuba uyive into ethethwayo. Cela nokuba ngumhlobo ovileyo akucacisele.
#8 HLALA ULUNGILE
Mlisela nomthinjana, gqibani imisebenzi neeprojekthi zesikolo phambi kwexesha, ubomi buya kubalula ngolo hlobo.
Akukho nto imnandi njengokubukela abanye besihla benyuka begqibezela iprojekti ngobusuku obuphambi kokuba ingeniswe ube wena uhleli ungenzi nto.
#9 WENZE UMSEBENZI WASEKHAYA
Umsebenzi wasekhaya uyimfuneko. Wenze ungakhalazi uza kubona ukuba unethuba elininzi lokwenza nezakho izinto.
Gqibani kwixesha lokuwenza nabazali bakho. Oko kuza kuthintela ingxoxo ezingeymfuneko.
Umzekelo, ukuba ubona kungakunceda ukuba uthathe isiqingatha seyure uphumle phambi kokuqala umsebenzi wesikolo, xa bekwazi oku abazali abanakukungxolisa ungena nje emnyango.
Kuhle nokumana uthatha amakhefu amafutshanana xa usenza umsebenzi wesikolo ukuphumza ingqondo. Kwiyure nganye ungaphumla imizuzu eli-15 ngokutsho kweengcaphephe. La makhefu wabhale kwisicwangciso sakho somsebenzi wasekhaya ukuze abazali bakho bazi ukuba awudlalisi xa ungekho kwindawo ofundela kuyo.
Baza kutsho bakuncede ngokuthulisa ingxolo yabantakwenu bafudusele nemisebenzi yakho yekhaya engakuphazamisa kwimpela-veki.
Khumbula nokuhamba ngokwesicwangciso osibhalileyo. Le yenye indlela obonakalisa ngayo ebazalini ukuba unenkathalo. Loo nto ke iya kubathambisa nakwezinye izinto zobomi bakho!
#10 UMSEBENZI OCOCEKILEYO
Umsebenzi wakho mawucwangciseke ucoceke, uyiqwalasele imbonakalo yawo. Jonga upelo lwamagama, iimpawu negramma.
Xa umsebenzi wakho ucocekile ubonakalisa ukuba uzimisele nokuba awuyoncutshe kweso sifundo. Ungawongwa ngamanqaku angaphezulu kunokuba ubufanele.
#11 UNGOYIKI UKUTHETHA
Ukufunda kumabanga aphezulu kuyachwayitisa, kodwa kuphinde kube nzima. Ingaba unoloyiko lwento ethile" Ukuba kunjalo, kuza kufuneka ujongane ngqo nonobangela woko.
Ukuba kukho into ongayithandiyo ethethwa kuwe ngabanye, kungayingozi ukuyigcina, mhlwawumbi lixesha lokuba uthethe nomntu omdala. Abazali bakho, umcebisi wasesikolweni, utitshala wakho - nawuphi na umntu omthembileyo!
OKOKUGQIBELA...

Uyifunda njani inoveli
Ukubhala ingxelo ngenoveli akuyondlwan' iyanetha, nokuba uyakuthanda ukufunda. Kodwa, kungalula noko ukuba uyayiqonda indlela ababhali abayisebenzisayo xa bebhala ibali okanye inoveli eyahlulahlulwe
ka-6...
Abadlali: Into yokuqala omawuyikhangele xa ufunda inoveli. Umdlali ophambili ngoyena unendima enkulu kwaye kuqalwa kwaziswe yena. Amaxesha amaninzi ibali silibona emehlweni akhe. Abalandelayo abadlali bona bavela ngokuvela ngokuya ibali liqhuba.
Indawo: Lenzeke phi ibali. Ibali lingenzekela ekhaya, emaphandleni, edolophini, esikolweni, nayiphi na indawo ekhethwe ngumdlalo. Amaxesha amaninzi indawo ikhawuleza ivele ebalini.
Ixesha: Ibali lingenzeka kwixesha elisandula kudlula okanye kwiminyaka yakudala. Ngokunjalo nexesha likhawuleza livezwe ebalini.
Ingxaki: Amaxesha amaninzi ingxaki isukela kwingxabano phakathi komdlali ophambili nomnye umdlali apha ebalini. Kodwa ingxaki ingaquka iimeko njengenkanyamba, imfazwe okanye ezinye iimeko ezidala ingxwaba-ngxwaba ebomini.
Iziganeko: Isiganeko ebalini ziinzame zokusombulula ingxaki. Kuqhelekile ukuba kube ziinzame eziliqela zokusombulula ingxaki zize ke ibe zezona ziganeko zakha ibali.
Isisombululo: Ingxaki isombululwe kanjani. Ixesh' elininzi ingxaki isonjululwa xa sele liza kuphela ibali. Maxa wambi isisombululo asivezwa de kube likhasi lokugqibela okanye kumhlathi wokugqibela.
Xa ukwazi ukuwabona la malungu mane enza ibali, uya kuliqonda bhetele kwaye ukonwabele ukulifunda, ukhumbule okwenzekileyo ebalini, kwaye ubone iindlela ezahlukeneyo zokubhala ezisetyenziswa ngababhali.

Lala ngokwaneleyo!
Ngokwengxelo ekhutshwe yiNational Center On Sleep Disorders yaseMelika, abantwana kufuneka balale iiyure ezilithoba ebusuku rhoqo benze ukhuseleko lwempilo yabo ukuze baqhube kakuhle esikolweni nakwezinye izinto.
Ukungalali ngokwaneleyo kungakhokelela ekubeni kubenzima ukumamela emntwaneni, akhawuleze ukuxakaniseka yaye abenobunzima bokulawula umsindo wakhe.
"Ukulala ngokwaneleyo kubaluleke ngokufanayo nokutya okusempilweni nokolula umzimba ukuze umntwana akhule kakuhle. Xa uqala unyaka omtsha esikolweni lilona xesha lilungele ukuba uqale ukuziqhelisa ukulala ngokwaneleyo," utsho uGqr. Claude Lenfant
Nina ke bantwana niselula ukuba ningaqonda ukubaluleka kokulala ngokwaneleyo, kodwa ke qinisekani ukuba oku niyakwenza.

kubhale uGRACE KHUZWAYO
SINEEMVAKALELO ezohlukeneyo ngabantwana abahlal' ezitratweni. Abanye bababona beyinkathazo, abanye bababona bengabantwana abanentlondi ukanti abanye bayavelana nabo. Amaxesha amaninzi siyiphosa kwelokulibala le miphefumlo kuba singafuni nokucinga ngayo.
Inyaniso ekrakra ke yeyokuba ukungabahoyi ixesha elide kuza kwenza bande, baze babeyingozi naseluntwini ngokubanzi.
ULucia Shange oligosa loncedo embuthweni waKwaZulu-Natal ekuthiwa yiI Care nojongene neemfuno zabantwana abahlal' ezitratweni uyazi ukuba bavelaphi aba bantwana.
Kaloku naye uLucia walahlwa ngabazali eselula wakhulela ezitratweni wayiva intlungu yokuphila obu bomi ngaphambi kokuba enze isigqibo sokutshintsha ubomi bakhe.
Usenyongweni kuye umsebenzi wokujongana nentlalo-ntle yabantwana basezitratweni kwaye uzinikele ekubakhokeleni kwingomso eliqaqambileyo.
"Ndancedwa ngabantu ababekhathazekile yimeko yabantwana basezitratweni ngoko nam ndibone ndifanele ndibancede.
"Ndaqala ngokuba livolontiya kwindawo yokubagcina eseThekwini. Kuthe ngo-2002 ndaqeshwa njengomncedi wabo yi-I Care," utshilo uLucia.
Linyukile inani labo
Ukususela ngoko linyuke kakhulu inani laba bantwana.
"Zininzi izizathu zaloo nto kwaye ziquka ukwanda kweenkedama zeAIDS, ukuphathwa gadalala emakhaya nobuhlwempu.
"Noluntu kufuneka lufundiswe ukungabaphi ukutya nemali aba bantwana," utsho uShange.
Oku kungavakala kungenabuntu kodwa ukufumana imali lula ngokungqiba sesinye sezizathu ezenza abantwana bakhethe ukuhlal' ezitratweni kunokuhlala kumaziko okubagcina okanye emakhayeni abo.
"Xa ephiwa isonka esomileyo ekhaya umntwana aze aphiwe inyama yenkuku eqhotsiweyo neetshipsi esitratweni loo nto imenza akhethe ukuyohlal' esitratweni!
"Abacingi ngengomso ukanti bayafa ezitratweni.
"Iingozi abajongana nazo ezitratweni ziquka ukubethwa, ulwaphulo-mthetho, ukuba ngamakhoboka eziyobisi, ukuxhatshazwa kumzimba ongezantsi nokuthengisa ngemizimba. Bakuba ngamakhoboka eziyobisi bahlabana ngeemela bebanga ibhotile yeglu.
"Njengomama womntwana one-13 leminyaka, ndiba buhlungu xa ndigoduka ndisiya kulala ebhedini efudumeleyo kube kukho abantwana abalele ezitratweni.
"Ndifun' ukubaqokelela ndibase kwindawo efudumeleyo nekhuselekileyo."
Olunye uncedo
Umthetho awuyivumeli imibutho enceda abantwana abahlal' ezitratweni ukuba ibasuse ezitratweni nokuba bayazenzakalisa - ukanti namapolisa angabasusa xa besenza ulwaphulo-mthetho kuphela.
"Nokuba bangasuswa ngetshova, uninzi lungabuyela ezitratweni ngemin' elandelayo. Ngoko yimibutho enjengeI Care enganceda," utsho.
UShange uya kwiindawo eziyingozi eThekwini ayokuthetha naba bantwana azame ukuba bamthembe kwabaxelela kona. Sele engumhlobo kuninzi lwabo kangangokuba bambona njengegorha labo.
"Kufuneka kulungiswe nengxaki yabanye oomama baba bantwana ababathuma ukuba bayongqiba ezitratweni.
"Amanye amabhinqa athatha abantwana abagcinayo aye kungqiba nabo ezitratweni. Abanye bade babeleke iingubo ezenziwe ngathi ngumntwana xa bengqiba ezitratweni!
"Umbutho wethu uzama ukuyisiphula neengcambu eluntwini le ngxaki," utshilo.
Iindabano zolwazi
Umbutho weI Care usebenzisana neFAMSA (iFamily And Marriage Society Of South Africa) neSebe lezoBulungisa ukwenza iindibano zokuncazelana ngolwazi ngeendlela zokususa abantwana ezitratweni babuyele eluntwini.
Lo mbutho uphumelele ukunceda amakhulu abantwana ebebehlala ezitratweni baba nengomso eliqaqambileyo.
Abanye basiwa kumakhaya abahlala kuwo bafunde de baye kufikelela eyunivesithi.
Abanye bayahlala bancedise kulo mbutho njengoSthembiso Ngcobo naye owayehlal' esitratweni.
Ngoku ungutata kwelinye lamakhaya aphantsi kweI Care.
"Andiyifihli into yokuba ndandihlala esitratweni nam kwaye abantwana bayandihlonipha kuba bayazi ukuba ndithetha ngento endiyaziyo. Inkoliso yabo bafun' ukuguqula ubomi babo bohlukane nokuhlal' ezitratweni," utsho uSthembiso. [x]

ABAFOTIWEYO BAYALINGANISA
NDINEMINYAKA engama-30 yaye ndenza umsebenzi omhle. Ndingumntu onobubele, kodwa ndiyacinga kukho umntu owenza iyelenqe elithile ukuze imali ingahlali epokothweni yam. Ndithi ndifun' ukusebenzis' imali, ndibe ndingasenayo nepeni emdaka. Oku kungavakala kuyintsomi kodwa yinyaniso. Mhlawumbi kukho umntu owathakatha imali yam. Andinamali yokutheng' imoto okanye umzi, kodwa bendifanele ndibenazo ngokomvuzo wam.
ngu-Esther J, eSoweto
Bhota Esther
Awuthakathwanga tu. Ingxaki yakho kukuba imali uyayidyakaza.
Imeko yakho yemali ungayilungisa kuphela ngokwazi ukuba isenti nesenti uyenze ntoni. Ndikucebisa ukuba wakwamkela uyibhale phantsi yonke into oyenza ngemali. Bhala yonk' into ukususela kwirenti kuye kwiitshipsi ozithenga emsebenzini.
Wakuyazi ukuba uyenze ntoni imali yakho, bhala izinto oza kuzenza ngomvuzo wakho olandelayo.
Ukwenza oko ke kukubhajetha (ukwenza uqingqo-mali). Wakuyenza ibhajethi, yilandele. Zibekele izinto ofun' ukuzenza njengokutheng' imoto okanye umzi, oko kuya kukukhuthaza ungaphambuki kwibhajethi yakho.
Yintoni ingxaki?
Ndineminyaka engama-25 ubudala. Utata wasweleka umama eneenyang' ezintathu endikhulelwe. Watshata neny' indoda, saza ke sabiza ifani yotata womtshato omtsha.
Ndaya kufunda eyunivesithi ngo-2001, kodwa ndaba neengxaki ezifundweni zam de ndathweswa isidanga ngo-2008. Ngoku ndiphangela kwinkampani yabaphicothi-zincwadi zemali kwaye ndamkela umvuzo ophantsi.
Andinathamsanqa nakwezothando. Abafana bayafika bahambe emva kwethutyana sithandana.
Ingaba kukho undonakele kum? Ingaba ndenzelwa isimnyama zizinyanya zikatata, njengokuba abany' abantu besitsho?
Akazitshongo
Bhota mfundi
Ndiyavuyisana nawe! Ungomnye wabantu abambalwa abasikeleleke ngokuba nemfundo enomsila nabaphangelayo.
Unemiceli-mngeni ekufuneka ugqithe kuyo njengomntu wonke. Funda ke kuloo miceli-mngeni. Mhlawumbi ufanele ufunde ukuba nomonde njengokuba kungathi izinto zikuhambela kade.
Ingomso lakho alilawulwa yimvelaphi yakho. Zama ukuziphucula emsebenzini wakho nokuzithemba kwakho.
Uthand' iilokhwe!
Umfana endincuma naye uzithanda kakhulu iilokhwe. Ndiyamthanda kakhulu. Ndingamyekisa kanjani ukuxoka ukuze athembeke kum?
nguThandi, eKapa
Bhota Thandi
Qala ngokuzijonga wena sisi! Zithande yaye uzihloniphe. Yenz' isigqibo ngokufunayo ebomini. Jonga ke ukuba ukufanele na ukudlalwa ngomnye umntu. Cinga ngokuba ukufanele na ukuzibeka esichengeni sokusulelwa yiHIV.
Azibalulekanga izinto ezenziwa ngamadoda kuwe. Okubalulekileyo kukuba uThandi uyakufuna na ukuzamkela ezo zinto!
Ndincede! Amabele am mancinci kakhulu
Ndineminyak' engama-23 yaye ndinengxaki yokuba namabele amancinane. Ndinqwenel' ukuba namabel' amakhulu, kodwa andazi ukuba ndingawakhulisa njani. Ndicel' uncedo.
nguMaria L, ePolokwane
Bhota Maria
Zimbini iindlela zokuphendul' umbuzo wakho. Eyokuqala nelula yeyokuba uye kucel' uncedo lukagqirha. Uya kukuchazela indlela yokukhulisa amabele akho.
Olo tyando luza kukudla epokothweni. Oko kundizisa kwindlela yesibini yokuphendul' ingxaki yakho - nekukuba ufanele ucingisise kuqala.
Wonk' umntu unendawo angayithandiyo emzimbeni wakhe. Imizimba yethu ayakhiwanga kakuhle yonke njengokuyibona kwethu. Siyigxeka kakhulu imizimba yethu xa sisebatsha okanye singena ebudaleni. Uyazamkela uyinto oyiyo ngokuya ukhula okanye usiba namava ngobomi.
Nabantu ke bayakwamkela uyinto oyiyo xa sele nawe uzamkele.
Kusenokuba awuwathandi amabele akho kuba kukho umntu owahlekisa ngawo okanye owakwenza wawabona engakulingananga. Kusenokuba oko kwatshiwo ngumhlobo okanye umfana oncuma naye.
Unako ukutshintsha indlela owabona ngayo, yiba nombulelo ngokuba namabele aphilileyo.
Kwakhona: funda ukubonisa izinto ezintle onazo - usenokuba umile kakuhle okanye unolusu oluhle.
Yazi noku Maria: umhle kuba wenziwe ngomfuziselo kaThixo!
Andinakuphila ngaphandle kwakhe
Ndingumfana onama-29 eminyaka yaye ndincuma nentombi enama-21. Sihlala kwidolophu enye, kodwa qelele omnye komnye. Ngoku andilali kuba indalile kwiinyanga ezimbalwa ezidlulileyo. Andinakuphila ngaphandle kwale ntombi - ndingayibuyisa njani?
Akazitshongo, eKroonstad
Bhota mfundi
Ndibuhlungu kukuva ngokwaliwa kwakho. Ukwaliwa kwenzeka kumntu wonke - kodwa xa kwenzeke kuwe kubangathi kuphela kwakho oke waliwa.
Qala ngokwamkela ukuba uthando lwenu luphelile - usayifowunela le ntombi, kodwa wena ayikufowuneli.
Yamkela ukuba uza kuba buhlungu: kuza kubakho amathuba okunqwenela ukuyifowunela, kuza kubakho amaxesha okuziva ulilolo - oko kuseyinxalenye yentlungu yokwaliwa.
Ungangxami ngokufumana omnye umntu, kodwa ncokola nabantu abaza kukunceda uyilibale intlungu yakho.
Ukungakwazi "ukuphila ngaphandle" komntu othile kuko okwenza abantu bahambele kude kunathi. Iza kuphela intlungu yakho ethubeni. [x]

UFortune waya kudlalel' iqela labadlali abaselula leTottenham Hotspur eNgilani eneminyak' eli-11. Italente yakhe ebholeni yamenza wathengwa yiManchester United. Uqale ukudlalel' iBafana Bafana ngo-1996 kwaye kungoku nje udlalel' i-AFC Tubize e-Italy.

Uza kuziva usemoyeni wothando, nto leyo iziindaba ezimnandi kwiqabane lakho. Ukusebenzisa amathuba kungakwenza uzifumanele isithandwa xa ungatshatanga. Imihla yothando: 20, 21.
Ngoku iqabane lakho alinangxaki ngokuthetha ngengomso, ungoyiki ukuqalisa ingxoxo. Ungaxhalabi xa ungenalo kuba eli asiloxesha lihle lokuthanda umntu. Imihla yothando: 22, 23.
Xa kukho umntu omthandayo, mxelele ngokuphandle ukuze niqalise uthando lwenu ngothethwano. Imihla yothando: 24, 25.
Nakuluphi na uthando kukho izifundo ezifundwayo, ngoko bonis' umntu wakho ukuba unenkathalo. Xa ungenaye, sabela isimemo esingakwenza umfumane. Imihla yothando: 26, 27.
Eli lixesh' elihle lokuzama ukubuyisel' umoya wothando eluthandweni lwenu. Nguwe ofanele uhambe phambili ekuthetheni xa ungenamntu. Imihla yothando: 1, 29.
Bonisa umoya wothando xa unomntu wakho xa ufuna lusoloko luvutha uthando lwenu. Xa ungenamntu, ungakhathazeki, uza kumfumana. Imihla yothando: 3, 31.
Xa ufun' iqabane elitsha, jonga iimpawu kumntu omaziyo. Xa unaye umntu oncuma naye, ungavumeli ukuthatyathwa nje nakanjani na. Imihla yothando: 5, 7.
Uthando olungenamiqathango nokwamkelana zizinto eninazo nomntu othandana naye. Ukuthembeka nokubonisa uthando kuza kuninceda. Imihla yothando: 8, 9.
Yiba nomonde kuba zonk' izinto ziza kulunga eluthandweni lwakho. Bonk' abantu baba neengxaki ngamaxesha athile. Izinto azimbanga njengokuba ucinga. Imihla yothando: 10, 11.
Ungumntu onothando kwaye uza kubonwa nangumntu othile omfunayo. Ungabi neentloni! Xa engakufuni, nguye oza kulahlekelwa! Imihla yothando: 13, 14.
Yiba nobubele nenzondelelo ukuze umntu okuthandayo azithembe eluthandweni lwenu. Xa ungenamntu, lindel' umyalezo ovela kumntu omthandayo. Imihla yothando: 15, 17.
Ulonwabo yinto yakho ngoko lonwabele ngeli xesha. Ulumkele ukuba ububele bakho busetyenziswe kakubi xa ungenamntu. Maxa wambi kuhle ukungabi namntu. Imihla yothando: 18, 19.

INgxowa-mali Yeengozi Zendlela (eyayisakwaziwa njengeNgxowa-mali Yeengozi Zeenqwelo-mafutha)



INgxowa-mali Yeengozi Zendlela yasekelwa ukuhlawula imbuyekezo kubantu abonzakele okanye abasutywe kukufa kwiingozi zeendlela ngenxa yokuqhutywa ngokungenankathalo kweenqwelo-mafutha eMzantsi Afrika. Le ngxowa-mali yasekwa kuba indlela yangaphambili eyayinyanzelisa abaqhubi ukuba babe ne-insurance xa kufakwa izimangalo zamabango embuyekezo ngabantu ababonzakalise ngenxa yokuqhuba kwabo ngendlela engenankathalo, yayingasebenzi kuba iinkampani ze-insurance zazingabi nakho ukuwahlawula onke amabango.

Le ndlela yatshintshwa ukuze endaweni yale insurance isisinyanzeliso, kubekho ingxowa-mali, efumana imali yayo kwirhafu yeentengiso zamafutha ezithuthi. Abantu bangawenza amabango embuyekezo kule ngxowa-mali ukuba bonzakele kwingozi yenqwelo-mafutha ngenxa yokuqhuba ngokungakhathali. Oku ke kuthetha ukuba awusenakho ukumangalela umqhubi wenqwelo-mafutha ongenankathalo ngokwenzakala kwakho, endaweni yoko, ufaka ibango kule ngxowa-mali ngokungathali kwakhe .

Ukuba ubandakanyeka kwingozi yenqwelo-mafutha usemsebenzini oko ke kuthethe ukuba unebango kwiNgxowa-mali Yembuyekezo Kwiingozi Zasemsebenzini, kufuneka uqale wenze elo bango ubone ukuba liyakhatywa na phambi kokuba wenze ibango kwiNgxowa-mali Yeengozi Zendlela ukuba ihlawule nantoni na engahlawulwanga yiNgxowa-mali Yembuyekezo. Nayiphi na imbuyekezo ehlawulwe yiNgxowa-mali Yeengozi Zendlela iya kuthathela ingqalelo naziphi na iintlawulo owazenza kwi-UIF, xa ibala ingeniso ekupheleleyo ngenxa yale ngozi.

Kufuneka wenze isicelo sakho kwiNgxowa-mali Yeengozi Zendlela kwiminyaka nje emibini emva kosuku lwengozi owonzakala kuyo. Ungalenza ngokwakho ibango ngokuthi ugcwalise iphetshana lesicelo uForm 1 ze ungenise nazo zonke iimpepha ezifunekayo; okanye ungacela igqwetha ukuba likuncede kwelo bango. Khumbula ke kodwa ukuba igqwetha liya kufuna intlawulo ngeenkonzo zalo, ntlawulo leyo iya kuphuma kwisixa sembuyekezo oya kuyifumana kwiNgxowa-mali Yeengozi Zendlela. Oku kuthetha ukuba akudingeki ukuba ulihlawule ngoko nangoko igqwetha, kodwa ke isixa semali oyifumanayo siya kucuthwa yintlawulo yegqwetha elo.

Isixa-mali esiqingqiweyo esihlawulwa kwibango lengozi yendlela yiNgxowa-mali Yeengozi Zendlela sixhomekeke kwiindleko zakho zonyango, ukuphelelwa kwakho yingeniso (ngaphambi kwengozi nakwixesha elisezayo) ukukhubazeka kwakho kwaneentlungu nokusokola kwakho. Isixa esasihlawulwa ngo-2001 kwibango ngalinye yayingama-R28 318,00; khumbula ukuba esi sisixa sebango elikhulu namanye amabango amancinci amaninzi; isixa esihlawulwe kwityala lakho siya kuxhomekeka ngokupheleleyo ekubeni wonzakele kangakanani na nokuba yingeniso engakanani othe waphulukana nayo ngenxa yaloo ngozi.

SIKHE sive ngabantu baseMiddle East ababa nethamsanqa kwafunyanwa i-oli emhlabeni wabo - kwaye ngoku bazezi zingawothiyo umlilo izinhanha.
Ukanti abantu abanamashishini athengisa ukutya okuphekiweyo baza kuba zizinhanha ze-oli nabo kuba anecooking oil eninzi esebenzileyo.
Icooking oil esele isetyenzisiwe ingaba ngamafutha ezithuthi kwixa elizayo...
"Sele ndiqhube imoto yam eyiMercedes-Benz 300D ka-1980 umgama oziikhilomitha
ezili-100 000 ngaphandle kwamagingxi-gingxi," utsho uRoy Dibley waseKapa.
"Icooking oil ithambisa bhetele kunedizile eqhelekileyo yaye yenza iinjector pump ingangxoli," utshilo.
"Icocekile kunjalonje - ungayisela xa uthanda!"
Akukho lula ukugalela la mafutha kwisithuthi sakho kuba awuwathathi epanini yokuqhotsa uwagalele kwisithuthi sakho.
Kufuneka uwasefe kuphume konk' ukutya ukuze acoceke. La mafutha wona atyebile kunedizile eqhelekileyo ngoko kufuneka enziwe alungele ukugqitha kwimibhobho nee-injector akwazi ukufikelela kwinjini.
Zimbini iindlela zokwenza le nto; ungawafudumeza amafutha ukuze abe lula ngaphambi kokuwagalela kwinjini, kungenjalo ungagalela ezinye izinto eziza kuwenza lula uwaxube nazo.
UDIBLEY usebenzisa le ndlela yokuqala yena. Uthengisa ikit exabisa i-R5 000 yaye inetanki encinci yokugalela amafutha eligcina idizile eqhelekileyo yokudumisa imoto, isifudumezi esifudumeza amafutha xa esiya kwinjini esuka kwitanki enkulu kunye neqhosha lokutshintsha la mafutha mabini xa usendleleni.
"Xa udumisa imoto kusasa sebenzisa idizile eqhelekileyo. Usakuhamba umgama oziimitha ezingamakhulu ambalwa utshintshele kwitanki enkulu yamafutha aza kuba sele efudumele ngokwaneleyo," kuchaza uDibley.
Xa uyipaka imoto yakho ngokuhlwa yibuyisele kwidizile eqhelekileyo imizuzu embalwa ngaphambi kokuba uyipake ngokupheleleyo ukuze icoceke imibhobho ukulungiselela intsasa elandelayo.
UDibley uyiqhube imoto yakhe esuka eKapa esiya eNamibia naseMozambique waphinda wabuya esebenzisa amafutha amadala yaye uthi uhambo lwakhe alubanga namagingxi-gingxi. La mafutha uwaqokelela kwiindawo ezithengisa ukutya okuphekiweyo aze awasefe ngobunono ngaphambi kokuzalisa ngawo itanki yemoto yakhe yamafutha. Akukho msebenzi ungako uwenzayo usakuyifaka emotweni yakho ikit.
UDRIES Joubert ongumfama yena uthanda ukuzenza ngoluny' uhlobo yena izinto - utshintsha amafutha ukuze alungele imoto yakhe, akatshintshi imoto ukuze ilungele la mafutha.
Nangona inzima le ndlela enza ngayo kodwa xa sele ukwazi ukuyenza ngokukuko inkqubo yakhona iyakhawuleza.
"Ndiqala ndiwasefe la mafutha ndize ndiwenze lula," utsho uJoubert.
Zininzi iindlela zokuyenza le nto kodwa abantu abaninzi abenza ibiodiesel kwihlabathi benza umlinganiselo othile wemethanol necaustic soda oza kubumbanisa ukukhabana kweekhemikhali xa zidityaniswa.
Emva koko amafutha ayohlulwa kulo mxube aze athi esakuyondelelana agalelwe kwitanki yemoto yaye emva koko ungawasebenzisa ngaphandle kokuwafudumeza.
"Ndisebenzisa la mafutha amadala emotweni yam yaye andinangxaki," utsho uJoubert. Uwasebenzisa nakwiBMW 320 diesel sedan yakhe.
Abakhi beemoto abafuni kusetyenziswe amany' amafutha kwezi moto kodwa uJoubert akanaxhala.
"Yimoto yam le. Ndim oyisebenzisayo ndilinge la mafutha yaye andiboni mahluko kwindlela esebenza ngayo," utshilo.
UNGAYISEBENZISA icooking oil engazange isetyenziswe uze uyixube nezinye iikhemikhali okanye usebenzise le ndlela kaDibley yokuyifudumeza. Kodwa ungagqibela sele uchith' imali eninzi xa usebenzisa amafutha angekasetyenziswa kuba iyi-R5,50 ibhotile uphinde uthenge neekhemikhali zokuwalungiselela ukuba angene kwinjini.
Ikhuseleke kangakanani imoto yakho kula mafutha"
IBONA iqhagamshelane noNjingalwazi Kevin Bennett, oyingqonyela yeEnergy Research Institute eUniversity Of Cape Town.
"Luninzi uphando olwenziwa ngoo-1970 ngokusetyenziswa kwamafutha okupheka kwiinjini zeemoto. Ingxaki ngala mafutha kukuba kungakho icarbon kwii-injector zenjini yakho.
"Xa imoto yakho inengxaki umvelisi wayo akanakukunceda - akukho inshorensi ingakunceda.
"Ndicebisa ukuba xa ufuna ukusebenzisa la mafutha uwadibanise nedizile ungawasebenzisi wodwa.
"Qala ngokusebenzisa i-25 phesenti yamafutha okupheka ubone ukuba ayiphatha njani. Xa eyiphatha kakuhle yinyuse ibe yi-50 phesenti.
"Andiqondi ukuba ukho umonakalo ongenzeka kwinjini yakho ngaphandle kokwakheka kwecarbon kwiiinjector.
"Kodwa kwezi njini zintsha ezifakelwe ielectronic injection systems ndingaba nexhala lomonakalo ongenziwa ngala mafutha. Xa ufuna ukusebenzisa icooking oil ndikucebisa ukuba uhlale unento yokubulala ivumba kuba imoto yakho ingagqibela sele inuka ngathi yivenkile ethengisa intlanzi neetshipsi!" [x]

Kutheni ndingakwazi ukusebenzisa amafutha xa ndinenjini yepetroli"
Iinjini zepetroli zinoxinzelelo oluncinane kuneenjini zedizile ngoko ke zifuna umbane ukuze zikhuphe iintlantsi kwiispark plug zize zilayite umxube wepetroli nomoya.
Idizile inamandla ngaphezu kwepetroli kodwa iinjini ezilungiselelwe idizile zinoxinzelelo olumandla.
Ukutsha kwenzeka xa amafutha okanye umxube we-oksijini unoxinzelelo olukhulu uze utshise uvuthe ngaphandle kweespark plug okanye umbane. Xa wakhe wayisebenzisa ngamandla impompo yebhayisikile uza kubazi ubudlelwane phakathi koxinzelelo nobushushu.
Iinjini zedizile zisebenzisa nawaphi na amafutha atshisayo yaye eyokuqala eyakhiwa nguRudolf Diesel ngo-1895 yayihamba nge-oyile yamando-ngomane.
Ezale mihla iinjini zedizile kwihlabathi jikelele zihamba ngamafutha athatyathwe kwirape seed oil, isunflower seed oil, ipeanut oil, ipalm oil, iparafini ne-oli endala yenjini.
Ngenxa yokunyuka kwenkxalabo yokufumaneka kwamafutha ayesetyenziswa mandulo afumaneka phantsi komhlaba sele kulinywa izityalo zokwenza ibiodiesel - la ngamafutha ezithuthi enziwa ngamafutha emifuno.

UDan Ewell (ongasentla) wathenga umhlobo wakhe, uJoel Radovcich (osekhohlo) ukuba abulale abazali bakhe nodadewabo.
UDALE EWELL wayesisinhanha esasizenzel' imali ngokuthengis' iinqwelo-moya. Ngo-1992 uDale nowakwakhe, uGlee, nentombi yabo uTiffany (31), bachith' impela-veki yePasika emzini wabo ongaselwandle. Ngobusuku bangeCawe babuyela eFresno, eCalifornia. Unyana wabo, uDan (21) wayeseyunivesithi.
Kwafika umncedisi wabo ngemini elandelayo. Wabiza amapolisa akungavulelwa kuba ekrokra ukuba kukho undonakele.
Afika amapolisa awuvula umzi afika ngaphakathi itshoba lilel' umbethe kuDale, uGlee noTiffany benamanxeba okudutyulwa.
Impahla yasendlwini yayibubugeqe nezihombo zabo zibiwe, ibiwe yonke imali espajini sikaDale Ewell - kodwa kwakungekho zimpawu zokungena komntu ngetshova kuloo mzi.
Wayengene njani ke umbulali, wacima ne-alam ukuze ingakhali ilumkise inkampani yoonogada"
Zaba ngundaba-mlonyeni iindaba zokubulawa kosapho lwakwa-Ewell eFresno.
Amapolisa akrokrela ukuba babulewe ngobusuku bangeCawe emva kokubuya kwabo emzini wabo ongaselwandle.
UGlee noTiffany babebuye kuqala bodwa, uDale Ewell wabuya kwisithuba esisiqingatha seyure befikile.
"Kuyacaca ukuba umntu owabulala uGlee noTiffany walinda uDale isiqingatha seyure emva kokubabulala," utsho uMcuphi uChris Curtis owayephanda elo tyala.
Ukuba iinjongo zombulali yayikukuphanga, yintoni eyamenza wafuna ukubulala wonk' umntu kolo sapho"
"Abo bantu babegwintiwe nje qha, kungekho ndlela yimbi ongakuchaza ngayo ukubulawa kwabo," utsho uMcuphi uCurtis.
Xa amapolisa ayephonononga imizimba yabafi abona imisonto yerhali neengceba zerabha.
Kwakukho nebhokisana yeembumbulu kwitafile esecaleni kwebhedi. Kwafunyanwa ukuba ezo mbumbulu zasetyenziswa ekubulaleni abo bantu.
Ezo mbumbulu nokungakhali kwe-alam kwenza kwarheneleka ukuba babulewe ngumntu "obaziyo".
"Inokuba kwakungumntu owayeyazi inombolo yokucima
i-alam nowayenolwazi ngolu sapho ukuba angade azi ukuba lunebhokisi yeembumbulu," utsho uMcuphi uCurtis.
Ngubani ke owayengafun' ukubulala uDale Ewell" Wayenazo yena iintshaba kuba wayesisinhanha esingusomashishini onempumelelo. Amapolisa aqalisa ukuphanda nzulu ngezo zinto.
Umntu owayeshiyeke ephila ngunyana wosapho, uDan. Ngobusuku bokubulawa kosapho lwakowabo wayeye kutya isidlo sangokuhlwa nomhlobo wakhe okumgama oyi-200km ukusuka apho.
"Asizange sirhanele nto ngokungabikho kwakhe ekhaya ngemini ababulawa ngayo," utsho uMcuphi uCurtis.
Kodwa into eyawabhidayo amapolisa kukuba uDan wayesenza izinto ezingaqhelekanga. Wazifunela igqwetha - wathi amapolisa makathethe nalo kuqala xa efuna iinkcukacha ngosapho.
"Oko kwabonakala kuyindlela yokwenza kubenzima ukufumana ababulali bosapho lwakhe," utsho uCurtis.
Kwakhona uDan Ewell wayenayo into eyayingamenza abulale usapho lwakowabo.
"Kaloku wayeza kudla ilifa elixabisa i-R64 million. Wayeza kufumana malunga ne-R32 million ukuba wayengabulawanga udadewabo," utsho uCurtis.
Amapolisa afumana nokuba uDan wakhe wabanjwa ekopa eluviweni kwaye wayeyinkomo edla yodwa. Eneneni ke wayenaye umhlobo osenyongweni - uJoel Radovcich.
Mhla amapolisa aya kuthetha noJoel, wawabuza wathi: "Niza kundivalela""
"Kwaba ngumbuzo ongaqhelekanga lowo," utsho uCurtis.
Oko kwenza amapolisa ambeka elisweni ubusuku nemini uJoel.
Into yokuqala ayiqaphelayo kuye kukuba wayengayisebenzisi ifowuni eseflethini yakhe, esebenzisa ekawonke-wonke engaphandle. Ingaba wayecinga ukuba amapolisa ayamamela xa ethetha emnxebeni" Xa kungenjalo, wayefuna ukufihla ntoni ke"
Amapolisa aqaphela nokuba xa uJoel eza kufowuna wayeqale ajonge kwipheyija esesinqeni sakhe.
Ngeny' imini ipolisa elalizifihlile leva okwakuthethwa nguJoel efowunini.
Wayefuna i-R2 million kuloo mntu, efuna neengcebiso zokuyityala loo mali.
"UJoel wayechulumancile ethetha naloo mntu ngendlela abaza kutyala ngayo imali," utsho uCurtis.
Amapolisa afumana kwinkampani yeefowuni ukuba uJoel wayethetha noDan.
Afumanisa nokuba uJoel wayesebenzisa imali eninzi nangona wayengaphangeli.
"Wayefundela ukuqhuba ihelikhoptha ehlawula i-R4 000 ngeyure. Wayengayithathaphi imali engako engaphangeli"" utsho uCurtis.
Kuphando lwawo amapolisa afumana nokuba uJoel watheng' incwadi ekufundisa ukwenza umpu ungangxoli. Emva koko loo ncwadi wayithumela kumhlobo wakhe onguJack Ponce (23).
Afumana amapolisa nokuba uJack unompu ofana nalowo kwabulawa ngawo usapho lwakwa-Ewell. Kodwa wathi xa ebuzwa ngawo, wathi ubiwe.
Kwasekugqithe iminyak' emithathu senzekile eso siganeko. Amapolisa ayemamela iminxeba kaDan athi ayemva esithi amapolisa amathile.
"Wayesithi soyisiwe kukufumana umpu kwindawo ebewubeke kuyo. Saqonda ukuba asinakwenziwa intlekisa ngumntwana," utsho uCurtis.
Ngoku amapolisa ayenabarhanelwa abathathu: uDan, umhlobo wakhe uJoel Radovcich, nomhlobo kaJoel, uJack Ponce.
Emva kokugqogqa iflethi kaJoel, amapolisa afumana iibhola zentenetya ezinemingxuma.
Imisonto nerabha yazo yayifana naleyo yafunyanwa kumaxhoba okudutyulwa; nto leyo yayibonisa ukuba zasetyenziswa ekwenzeni into eyogquma ingxolo yompu.
Babanjwa ngamapolisa uJack Ponce noJoel Radovcich, kodwa uDan akazange afumaneke.
UJoel Radovcich waziphika izityholo, kodwa uJack Ponce wayesoyika isigwebo sentambo waza wasebenzisana namapolisa kuphando lwawo. Wayethe uJack umpu wakhe walahleka - kodwa ngoku wayevuma ukuba wawuthengisela uJoel.
Watsho nokuba uxelelwe nguJoel ukuba nguye owabulala usapho lwakwa-Ewell. Wachaza ukuba kunjani ngaphakathi endlwini nokuba babulawa kanjani.
UJoel waxelela uJack ukuba uwuqhaqhile umpu walahla iingceba zawo kwindawo ezohlukeneyo. Ngethamsanqa wafunyanwa umbhobho wompu apho wayewulahle khona!
Kwacaca ukuba unetyala uDan Ewell. Amapolisa aqonda ukuba wayefun' imali yabazali bakhe, ngoko wayengafuni ukulinda basweleke ngokwendalo. Wayengafuni nokwabelana nodadewabo ngaloo mali babeza kuyishiya, ngoko waqesha umhlobo wakhe uJoel Radovcich ukuba ababulale.
UJack Ponce wakhululwa kuba enike ubungqina obanceda ekuthethweni kwetyala.
UDan Ewell wazinikezela emapoliseni, waza ngo-1995 wagwetywa ubomi entolongweni noJoel Radovcich.
Ethetha ngoDan Ewell, uMcuphi uCurtis uthe: "Wayengumfana onekratshi, ozixelela ukuba
ukrele-krele yedwa.
"Asikuko ukuba asiwenzi kakuhle umsebenzi wethu. Kwasithabatha ixesha ukugqiba uphando lwethu ukuze sifumane ubungqina esiza kubandlelel' inkundla" uhambise watsho uMcuphi kaCurtis. [x]
Umbhali: Marissa Charles/Splash News

kubhale uDOUG GORDON
BONA XHOSA - August 2006
Kudala edlala iindawo zezikrelemnqa emidlalweni yeTV, kodwa ukudlala kwiYizo Yizo okanye iTsotsi akukhange uZola kumlungiselele ukuthandwa kwenkqubo yakhe ethi Zola 7...
XA ufun' ukuncedwa nguZola akukho mfuneko yokuba ude umgrogrise ngompu okanye ngemela. Zombini ezo zinto zenzekile kuZola. Ngaphandle kwamakhulu-khulu eminxeba neeSMS ezivela ebantwini angabaziyo abafuna ukuncedwa yiZola 7, ukhe wahlatywa ngemela ngabalandeli bakhe abafuna imisebenzi okanye imali.
UBonginkosi Dlamini (29) ukhe wacul' eqongeni noSnoop Dogg oyimvumi yerephu ephambili ehlabathini ukanti ukhe wadlala nendawo yomgulukudu onguPapa Action kwiTV - kodwa yena ungathi wazalelwa ukusasaza iZola 7!
Le nkqubo yaqala kwiminyaka emithathu edlulileyo injongo yayo ikukunceda iinkedama nabantu abangenamakhaya bazalisekise amaphupha abo.
UNthabiseng Mokoena oyiprodyusa yayo uthi xa befota le nkqubo kuzala abantu abaninzi.
"UZola uyimvumi eyonwabis' abantu ngomculo wayo kodwa kwiZola 7 ufikelela nasebantwini abangengobalandeli bomculo neefilim adlala kuzo," utshilo.
"Asinako ukusabela kuzo zonke iileta esizifumanayo zabantu abalufaneleyo uncedo, ngoko siqalise iZola 'Dream Team' eyenziwa ngabantu abazenzela ngokwabo izinto abafun' ukuncedwa ngazo."
B AFANELE ke nokwenza ngolo hlobo kuba ngoku umsebenzi kaZola sele ufikelela nasemazweni ehlabathi uqhutywa kukuthandwa kwefilim adlala kuyo ethi Tsotsi nezuze imbasa yeOscar kutshanje.
Le filim ungathi yividiyo yomculo kaZola kuba udlal' indawo ephambili kuyo ukanti igwijo layo lenziwe ngeengoma ezintandathu zakhe.
NgoJulayi ukhenkethe eSpain, eFrance naseGermany kwaye uza kucula kwiikhonsathi ezingama-20 eUnited States kunyaka ozayo.
Ingoma yakhe ethandwayo ethi Don't Cry iza kukhutshwa eJamani ngoOktobha nalapho kuza kuba kuqaliswa iphulo lokuqokelel' imali yokunced' abantwana baseAfrika.
"Kunzima ukwanelisa zonke iimfuno zabantu. Kulula ukumelana nabalandeli bakaZola oyimvumi kuba okuninzi okutshiwo ngamajelo eendaba ngam kububuvuvu nje. Uninzi lweentombi endithetha nazo zifuna nje ukuwolwa, ukuncanyiswa nokusayinelwa izinto zazo," utshilo uZola.
"Abubuvuvu nje bodwa amanqaku abhalwa ngam okuba ndineentombi ezingaphi, nawokuba zingaphi ezikhulelweyo nangeepati endiza kuzenza zokuthembisa iintombi umtshato."
Nangona kunjalo ababukeli beZola 7 balindel' izinto ezinkulu kuye!
UTHI abany' abantu bafika kwakhe bethwel' iimpahla zabo. "Bafika besithi abanangxaki baza kuhlala ngaphandle komzi wam de ndibancede. Ndibaxelela ukuba mababhalele kwinkqubo yam kodwa bangandihoyi.
"Abany' abantu bade bandigrogrise ngompu, abanye bandihlabe ngemela kuba befuna uncedo lwam.
"Ngemini ndifowunelwa ngamakhulu ngamakhulu abantu - ndifumana namakhulu eeSMS zabantu abafuna ndibafowunele.
"Ndiyazi baninzi abantu abakufaneleyo ukuncedwa yiZola 7 - ndingabona njani ke ukuba abantu balufuna nyhani uncedo xa kukho nabafuna ndibathengele ibhiya necuba""
Eyona nto imcaphukisa kakhulu uZola ngabantu abafuna ukusebenzisa ukwazi kwabo ukuba naye wakhuliswa ngunina kuphela.
"Kukho amadoda afika kum esithi angutata. Acinga ukuba ndiza kuyamkela nje lula loo nto kuba ndifun' ukuba notata. Kanti bayaphazama.
"Kaloku abantu badla ngokundiva ndisithi andinatata, kodwa andizange nditsho ukuba andimazi!
"Ndiyazi ukuba andifanelanga ndibe nomsindo ebantwini abafun' uncedo - kodwa andinako ukuvuma ukudlal' abantu abafuna ukuphiwa izinto."
UZOLA uzibona ephala phambili ekuthandweni komculo neefilim zeli lizwekazi ehlabathini liphela.
Emva kokuba umculo wakhe wenziwe igwijo leTsotsi, uza kuphinda ube ligwijo lefilim engeAfrika ethi The Blood Diamond ekudlala kuyo intandane yaseHollywood uLeonardo di Caprio.
UZola wayenikwa ithuba lokudlala indawo ephambili kule filim kodwa akazange avume ngenxa yokuxakeka kwinkqubo yeZola 7.
"Ukudlala kwam kwiifilim zehlabathi kuza kuxhomekeka emsebenzini wam weZola 7," utshilo uZola.
Igalelo likaZola kwimpumelelo yeTsotsi ehlabathini ingaphezulu kweyomlinganiswa onguFela adlala indawo yakhe.
Iprodyusa yaseBritane uPeter Fudowski waqal' ukuva ngomculo wakhe wekwaito ngo-2003 xa wayeze eJoburg ukuza kuphanda ngeli bali. Wazithanda iingoma zikaZola ezinjengeGhetto Fabulous, kangangokuba ngoko nangoko wathi makenze igwijo leTsotsi.
Njengoko sele ethengise iiCD eziphantse zibe ngama-500 000 kweli, uZola ubona le filim nokukhutshwa kwengoma yakhe eJamani kuza kwenza umculo wakhe wekwaito waziwe kumazwe ngamazwe ehlabathi.
"Ukusoloko ndisezindabeni kweli nakwamany' amazwe ehlabathi kwenza izinto zam zenzeke ngokukhawuleza," utshilo uZola. [x]
"Iintombi endithetha nazo zifuna nje ukuncanyiswa nokusayinelwa izinto zazo," utsho uZola.
