Umphandle > Ushicilelo > IiNkcukacha Zoluntu > K > Imibuzo Ebuzwa Rhoqo Ngentsholongwane kaGawulayo noGawulayo buqu &gt Kutheni Nje Amanina Amnyama aseMzantsi Afrika Kukhangeleka Ngathi Akowona Mngcipheko Wokuhlaselwa Yintsholongwane kaGawulayo Kunaye Wonke Omnye Umntu?

Kutheni Nje Amanina Amnyama aseMzantsi Afrika Kukhangeleka Ngathi Akowona Mngcipheko Wokuhlaselwa Yintsholongwane kaGawulayo Kunaye Wonke Omnye Umntu?



Umbuzo: Kutheni Nje Amanina Amnyama aseMzantsi Afrika Kukhangeleka Ngathi Akowona Mngcipheko Wokuhlaselwa Yintsholongwane kaGawulayo Kunaye Wonke Omnye Umntu?

Impendulo: Iinkcukacha-manani zidiza ukuba abantu abamnyama bakwelona zinga liphakamileyo lomngcipheko wokuhlaselwa yintsholongwane kaGawulayo noGawulayo buqu. I-Afrika ekumazantsi eSahara inawona mazinga aphakamileyo ehlabathini. Abona bantu bahlaselekayo nabakowona mngcipheko ngabo bakwiingingqi ezineentshukumo ezinkulu zoqoqosho. Kusenokubonakala futhi ukuba amanina amnyama aphakathi kweshumi elinesihlanu namashumi amane anethoba eminyaka ubudala nabakwinqanaba lokufumana abantwana, bakowona mngcipheko wokuhlaselwa yile ntsholongwane. Oku kuza nombuzo wokuba ingaba kutheni abantu abamnyama bekowona mngcipheko umkhulu wokuhlaselwa futhi njengoko iinkcukacha-manani zidiza, bengabona baphila nale ntsholongwane kuzo zonke izizwe.

Imbali yokungabiwa ngokulingana kobutyebi eMzantsi Afrika, ngamaxesha enkqubo yobandlululo ngokobuhlanga eyayivimba abantu abamnyama amalungelo oluntu angundoqo, malungelo lawo afana nemfundo, izindlu, izithuba zemisebenzi kwanokufikelela kwiinkonzo zempilo, inokwayanyaniswa nokugquba kwentshjolongwane kaGawulayo noGawulayo buqu kwabo babe vinjwe la mathuba.

Isimo sabantu abamnyama kuqoqosho loluntu sebenza babe semngciphekweni wokuhlaselwa lula zizifo ezifana nesifo sephepha, izifo ezingumvuka wokwabelana ngesondo ngendlela engakhuselekanga nentsholongwane kaGawulayo noGawulayo buqu. Abona bakowona mngcipheko ungakumbi bahlala ematyotyombeni njengoko kukho beba ngabantu abahluphekileyo nabangaphangeliyo. Baphila kwiimeko ekugquba kuzo iinkonzo ezikumgangatho ophantsi, oko ke kukuthi, apho kungekho lucoceko khona, kungekho manzi acocekileyo okanye kungekho mbane khona. Ukuxinana ze kwezinye iingingqi, ukungabikho zikroba zokungena moya upholileyo kuza nezifo.

Kwalapha kwiindawo zabantu abamnyama, isimo sabantu basetyhini sikumgangatho osezantsi kakhulu, nto leyo ibenza babe semngciphekweni wokuhlaselwa zizifo ezingumvuka wokwanbelana ngesondo ngedlela engakhuselekanga, njengoko besoloko bengenawo amandla okuncokola ngokwabelana ngesondo ngendlela ekhuselekileyo (ukusetyenziswa kweentsilathi) namaqabane abo, ngenxa yenkolelo yenkcubeko eluqilima yokuba indoda nguye ophetheyo kwimiba yokwabelana ngesondo. Ngapha koko, ukuxhomekeka kwamanina emadodeni kwandisa ukuba semngciphekweni kwawo.

Amanina ahlala kwiingingqi ezisemaphandleni nalawo asebenza ezifama nabo bakowona mngcipheko wokuhlaselwa zizifo ezingumvuka wokwabelana ngesondo ngendlela engakhuselekanga eziquka nentsholongwane kaGawulayo noGawulayo buqu, njengoko ukufikelela kwiinkonzo zononophelo lwempilo kunzima kakhulu kubo ngenxa yokuba iinkonzo apho zimbalwa. Kwezi ye iimeko ezi nkonzo azikho kwa ukubakho. Ngaphezu kwezi meko, amanina ayawavinjwa amathuba okufukelela kumandla oqoqosho.

Kanti ke kwezinye iimeko uloyiko lokwayanyaniswa lunokukhokelela ekubeni amanina angazivezi ukuba aphila nentsholongwane kaGawulayo. Ngaphezu koko futhi, imiba yendalo iyakongeza ukuba semngciphekweni kwamanina ngenxa yokungafumaniseki kwezifo ezingumvuka wokwabelana ngesondo ngendlela engakhuselekanga kwanokuba iincindi zesondo zisala emzimbeni welo nenekazi iintsuku zibe mbini okanye zibe ntathu yaye zingangena egazini lakhe ukuba kukho ukukrweleka okanye izilonda ngenxa yezifo ezingumvuka wokwabelana ngesondo okanye ukungenwa ngetshova.

Ukuhamba kwabantu befuna impilo engcono, ukusuka kwenye ingingqi ukuya kwenye (eyimbangi yokufuna imisebenzi kwezinye iingingqi okanye kwamanye amazwe) kubenza abo bsntu babe semngciphekweni wokuhlaselwa yintsholongwane kaGawulayo njengoko beba kude nentsapho zabo amaxesha amade kakhulu. Kwimeko yamadoda apho athi, ngenxa yeemeko zawo zempangelo, ahlale kude namakhosikazi/neentsapho zawo amaxesha amade kakhulu, anokuthi aqale ezinye iimanyano namanye amakhosikazi apho anokuthi amaxesha amaninzi athi azibandakanye nokwabelana ngesondo ngendlela engakhuselekanga. Oku ke kokunye okubeka bobabini indoda nenkosikazi emngciphekweni wokuhlaselwa yintsholongwane kaGawulayo noGawulayo buqu.

1. Ukufuman'iingcebiso ngamatyala
Ngokomthetho iNational Credit Act, kwakumele ube nabacebisi ngamatyala ukuze bakuncede ukwazi ukulungisa iingxaki zakho zamatyala. Ungaziyela nje ngokwakho kubo okanye uthunyelwe kubo yinkundla kamantyi. Umcebisi ngamatyala uneentsuku ezingama-60 zokuba akwenzele isicwangciso sokuhlawula amatyala akho ebonisana nawe aze asise enkundleni ukuze samkelwe okanye athetha-thethane egameni lakho kunye nabo bantu ubatyalayo.
Nangona nje isigaba sokuqala somthetho lo saqala ngoJuni ka2006, inkqubo le yokufumana iingcebiso isabhidisa kuba iSebe Lezorhwebo Noshishino alikazimiseli iintlawulo zenkonzo le.
Kaloku le nkonzo iyahlawulelwa.
Uvavanyo luxabisa ama-R50. Xa sele zizonke iintlawulo ziza kuba phakathi kwama-R500 kunye ne-R1 500, kanti zingade ziye kuthi ga kuma-R3 000 xa utyala iindawo ezininzi.
Ngeentlawulo ezingako, imali oyityalayo xa iphelele, kunye nenzala ekumele uyihlawule, akukho bani unokusola xa unokucinga ukuba akuzukunceda nganto ukuya kumcebisi.
Ingaba baza kuba luncedo aba bacebisi ngamatyala" Amaziko akwicandelo lezamatyala anoloyiko lokuba ngenxa yokuba abacebisi ngamatyala kufuneka babe namava eminyaka emibini, oomatshonisa baza kungena kule nkonzo ngobuninzi bazenze abasemthethweni baqhitse abathengi.
Namatshantliziyo kwimiba yabathengi iyawaxhalabisa into yokuba abacebisi ngamatyala akufuneki bade babe bawuqeqeshelwe lo msebenzi.
2. Inkundla Yabathengi Kazwelonke
Ukukhusela ukubolekisa okungenankathalo ngumba obaluleke kakhulu kwiNational Credit Act. Xa ukwazi ukubonisa ukuba amatyala owenzileyo ukusukela ngowoku-1 kuJuni walo nyaka ayakongamela, ungakwazi ukumangalela umntu okuboleke imali ngokungenankathalo - nto leyo engenza ukuba umbolekisi lowo ngemali alicime ityala elo. Ngethuba sishicilela eli nqaku iNkundla Yabathengi Kazwelonke nekumele ukuba ibeyiyo ebek' iliso kwizinto ezinjalo ibingekanikwa amagunya apheleleyo
Ingxaki kukuba akukho mithetho sele iphunyeziweyo, ngoko ke inkundla le ayinakukwazi ukusebenza, utsho usihlalo wale nkundla uDiane Terblanche - nto leyo yenza ukuba abathengi abakholelwa ukuba babe ngamaxhoba okubolekwa ngendlela engenankathalo bangakwazi ukuzikhusela ngesi sixhobo.
3. Yiya kumntu owamkel' izikhalazo zabantu
Ukhuseleko lwabathengi eMzantsi Afrika lunamakhwiniba, kanti ke amaziko amiselwe ukuba ajongane nezikhalazo awasetyenziswa ngokukuko. Kodwa ke mhlawumbi loo nto yenziwa kukuba abathengi abawazi okanye awafikeleleki.
Kumhlala-phantsi, izibonelelo zezempilo kunye neenkonzo zezimali, urhulumente umisele abalawuli ukuba baphande baze bathath' izigqibo malunga nezikhalazo. Kwiindawo ezinezikhalazo ezininzi le nkqubo iyafadalala.
KwiBhodi Yeenkonzo Zezimali kulo nyaka uphelileyo, iminxeba emininzi engenayo ibingananzwa.
Amaziko aneenkcukacha zabathengi, elokubhanka nele-inshorensi umzekelo - inkonzo le yoshishino ithe ngokuzithandela ngokwayo yahlawulela inkonzo yomntu owamkel' izikhalazo zabantu. Lo mntu usebenza ngokuzimeleyo ukulamla nokuthatha izigqibo ngezikhalazo zabathengi. Amanye amaqela abathengi angathanda ukubona aba bantu bezimele ngokupheleleyo.
Kukho imibutho ekolu shishino engenaye kwamntu lowo uzimeleyo nowamkela izikhalazo zabantu kodwa ekwaziyo ukusombulula izikhalazo zabathengi. Le mibutho iquka iMicro Finance South Africa, iMaster Builders' Association kunye neFurniture Traders' Association.
I-FTA yamkela malunga nezikhalazo ezili-1 200 ngonyaka, itsho iFinmark - kanti ligcuntswana elo xa ucinga ukuba banamasebe angama-4 000 angamalungu abo.
Kodwa ke oku kubhetele kunakwiindawo apho abathengi bangenamntu bakhalaza kuye - ingakumbi kwiindawo apho iivenkile ezinkulu, ababolekisi ngemali ngokwamkela isibambiso nabaqeshi baboleka khona abasebenzi.
Iinkonzo ezinikezwa ngaba balawuli kunye nabantu abamkela izikhalazo zisimahla, kodwa ukutsal' umnxeba nokufeksa kuyahlawulelwa. Abantu abafuna ukubonana ubuso ngobuso naba bantu bahlangabezana nobunzima kuba i-ofisi ejongene nelizwe lonke inye.
4. Ii-ofisi zabathengi zamaphondo
Kufanele ukuba yeyona ndawo uqala kuyo le xa ufuna ukwazi ukuba ungasifaka phi na isikhalazo sakho. Ezinye zezi ofisi sisebenza kakuhle kunezinye futhi uphando olwenziwe kutshanje yiFinMark Trust inye kuphela i-ofisi abangaphendulwanga kuyo xa betsal' umnxeba.
Lo ngumzekelo wenkonzo enamakhwiniba abahlangabezana nayo abathengi baseMzantsi Afrika.
5. Tsalela umhlobo
Amaxesha amaninzi uncedo olululo ulufumana kwimibutho yabahlali, imibutho engekho ngaphantsi kukarhulumente nakwii-ofisi zoncedo ngezomthetho, ifumanise oko iFinmark. Kwezi ndawo ufumana abantu abakulungeleyo ukukunceda. I-Finmark ithi abanye babo bangamosha amathuba akho okufumana isivumelwano esihle ngenxa yokuwuthathela phezulu umcimbi wakho ngoko kufuneka bayilumkele loo nto.
6. Abantu abalawula amatyala
Kulula ukubabona kuba iintengiso zabo zigcwele yonk' indawoa, besenza iintengiso kwindawo yonke zokuba bangakunceda "wehlise iintlawulo zakho zamatyala" okanye "ukwazi ukumelana ngokulula neentlawulo zakho zamatyala", Nangona kunjalo ke, amaxesha amaninzi ukuya kubantu abakulawulela amatyala kubiza imali eninzi kunokuba wena uzenzele ezakho izicwangciso kunye nabantu obatyalayo.
Into eye yenzeke kukuba abantu abakulawulela amatyala bathatha iintlawulo ezinkulu kwisixa semali oyihlawula nyanga zonke kubo baze bahlawule encinci kwabo bantu ubatyalayo. Into ebuhlungu, kukusilela komthetho wethu njengoko kungekho kulawulwa kolu shishino lokulawulela abantu amatyala kanti kananjalo akukho mfundo ithile kudingeka ukuba babe nayo.
Ukuba ngaba umntu okulawulela amatyala akho uthe akayiphatha ngendlela eyiyo i-akhawunti yakho, ungakwazi ukuya kwinkundla kamantyi ufake isicelo sokuba unikwe omnye.
Nangona kunjalo ke akuhlali kusenzeka oku, njengoko bebambalwa kakhulu abathengi abaziyo ukuba banokwenza oku, kanti ke abanye kufuneka bafumane uncedo lomntu oqeqeshiweyo ukuze bakwazi ukungenisa ityala okanye isikhalazo sabo.
7. Yiba ngoyena mkhuseli wakho
Eyona nto iyinyani enzima kukuba kulula kakhulu ukungena ematyaleni kunokuphuma kuwo. Zikhona iinkqubo kunye neenkampani ezingakunceda, kodwa kufuneka ube nenzondelelo kunye namandla ukuze ukwazi ukufikelela nkqu kwezo sele zikho futhi zisebenza.
Kodwa ke, ungakwazi ukuba ube ngoyena mkhuseli wakho.
"Umthengi oxhobe ngolwazi nozikhusele ngokukuko ubalulekile," itsho iFinmark. "Bayakwazi ukuthatha izigqibo ezisekelwe kulwazi futhi bayakwazi ukuzakhela ingxoxo yempikiswano esemthethweni neyamkelekileyo." [x]

Kulula ukungena ematyaleni kodwa kunzima ukuphuma
Umthetho iNational Credit Act uqale ukusebenza ngokupheleleyo ukusukela ngoJuni, kodwa kuba imimiselo yawo imane ivela manqaphanqapha - eminye ngomzuzu wokugqibela - kunganzima ukufumana umfanekiso onguwo malunga nokuba iyitshintshe njani indlela yokufumana amatyala eMzantsi Afrika.
Nazi ezona njongo zawo ziphambili:
UKUKHUSELA umboleki - hayi umbolekisi, ingakumbi ukuba umbolekisi uyazi ukuba uya kusokola ukuhlawula imali-mboleko leyo ("ukubolekisa ngokungenankathalo"). Iindaba ezimnandi kukuba kufanele ngoku zibe ninzi iindlela ongafumana ubulungisa obunxulumene namatyala ngazo kunangaphambili. Ezimbi iindaba zezokuba azikasebenzi zonke ngokwangoku.
UKUVULA imakethe yamatyala. Isicelo sakho setyala sisenokungamkelwa, kodwa kumele uxelelwe ukuba kungani singamkelwanga.
UKUNCIPHISA iindlela ezichazwa ngayo iimveliso zezimali kwiintengiso nakwizaziso zentengiso.
UKUKWAZI UKUKHETHA - phambi kokuba ugcwalise isivumelwano setyala kufuneka ukuba unikwe intelekelelo yamaxabiso ebhalwe phantsi nekumele ukuba ibe yebhalwe ngendlela emiselweyo. Le ntelekelelo iyambophelela umbolekisi iintsuku ezintlanu, nto leyo eyenza ukuba ukwazi ukuya kwezinye iindawo okanye ukutshintsha ingqondo yakho.
UKONGAMELA izivumelwano zamatyala. Ezinye iinkcukacha kufanele ukuba zifakwe kanti ke imihlathi engalunganga ayivumelekanga.
UKUKWAZI UKUPHUMA KWIZIVUMELWANO - uyakwazi ngoku ukuhlawula yonke imali oyityalayo ngokwesivumelwano setyala ungakhange ube unike isaziso - ngaphandle kwezivumelwano ezikhulu ezifana nesokuthenga indlu apho kufuneka ufake isaziso esiyinyanga.
UKUNIKEZELA NGEENKCUKACHA - umthetho ulawula amaziko agcina iinkcukacha ngokuhlawulwa kwamatyala kanti wenza ukuba ukwazi ukufumana ingxelo enye ngamatyala akho kanye ngonyaka ngaphandle kwentlawulo khon' ukuze ukwazi ukukhangela ukuba iinkcukacha ezikuyo ziyinene na.

Iindlela zokubeleka
ubuzali
LIBALULEKILE ixesha lokuzalwa kosana. Kaloku eli lixesha apho ulubona okokuqala emva kokuluthwala iinyanga ezilithoba. Zininzi iindlela olungazalwa ngazo usana. Amabhinqa ayazikhethela kwiindidi eziliqela yaye zixhomekeka kwimpilo yosana nonina, indlela olume ngayo usana nexabiso...
Ukubelekela esibhedlele
Uninzi lweentsana zeli zizalwa ngolu hlobo. Uqala ngokuhlolwa ngumbelekisi uze ugqithiselwe kwigumbi lokubelekela apho ufika ulaliswe ebhedini ukuze ulubeleke kakuhle usana lwakho.
Kweloo gumbi kubakho oogqirha bamabhinqa neengcali zababelekisi ukulungiselela xa kunokwenzeka ube neengxaki xa ubeleka kuze kufuneke ukuba ubeleke ngoqhaqho olungxamisekileyo.
Ukubelekela ekhaya
Mandulo kwakusetyenziswa le ndlela yokubeleka yaye umdlezana wayencediswa ngababelekisi.
Ukubelekela ekhaya kubuye ngamandla ngoku kuba oomama bakholelwa ekubeni kwenza izinto zibe lula.
Kufuneka ufumane umbelekisi onamava noqeqeshiweyo xa uza kubelekela ekhaya. Ukunceda umelane nokulunywa, akubelekise, asike inkaba aze axilonge usana lwakho okokuqala ngokwasempilweni.
Uyakwazi ukubon' iimpawu ezintama iingxaki kwangoko aze akubalekise esibhedlele.
Ukubelekela emanzini
Ukubelekela emanzini yindlela yendalo yokubeleka kodwa ubelekela emanzini. Umama uhlala kwichibi lokubelekela (ungaliqesha) aze alubelekele emanzini usana lwakhe. Le ndlela yokubeleka inciphisa iintlungu zokulunywa namathuba okukrazuka.
Ubelekela ekhaya ngale ndlela yaye kufuneka uqeshe umbelekisi onamava noqeqeshiweyo.
Ukubeleka ngoqhaqho
Xa ubeleka ngoqhaqho usikwa apha esiswini emazantsi. Yenziwa kwimeko yongxamiseko xa usana lungahlalanga kakuhle.
Iyenziwa le ndlela naxa usana luzalwa ngaphambi kwexesha, luzelwe luluncinci kakhulu, lulukhulu kakhulu okanye xa luxwesile.
Ungazikhethela ukubeleka ngoqhaqho xa isibonelelo sakho sonyango sikuvumela. Kwizibhedlele zikarhulumente ubelekiswa ngoqhaqho xa uneengxaki okanye kwiimeko zongxamiseko kuphela.
Ukuzibelekela
Le yindlela yokuzibelekela yaye umama uyavunyelwa ukuba enze izinto xa ebeleka.
Uyavunyelwa ukuba abeleke ngendlela ayithandayo.
Xa ubeleka ngale ndlela uyalutyhala ngamandla usana ukanti xa ubeleka ulele ebhedini awuwasebenzisi la mandla xa utyhala.
Izibhedlele zabucala ziyabelekisa ngale ndlela ngoncedo lwababelekisi. Qhagamshelana nesibhedlele esikufuphi nawe ujonge ukuba sinayo na le nkonzo.

I-Omega-3, -6, -9 nengqondo
I-Omega-3, -6, -9 ziifatty acid ezifumaneka kwiindidi zokutya ezahlukeneyo yaye zigcina imizimba yethu isempilweni. Umzimba awuzivelisi ngoko kufuneka sitye ukutya okunezi zakha-mzimba.
I-Omega-3, -6, -9 ziyasithintela isifo sentliziyo, ziphucula ulusu, zinceda udandatheko yaye ziphucula ukusebenza kwengqondo namajoni omzimba.
Uninzi lwabantu bafumana iOmega- 6 ne-9 baze bangayifumani iOmega-3 eyaneleyo yona efumaneka kwintlanzi nakwilinseed.
Ukutya intlanzi kanye okanye kabini ngeveki xa ukhulelwe kuphucula ukukhula kwengqondo yosana lwakho oluthweleyo.
Uphando olwenziwe eAustralia kubantwana abaneminyaka emibini bezelwe nabazelwe ngoomama abebesitya amafutha entlanzi xa bekhulelwe lubonise ukuphucuka kokuhambisana kwezandla zabo namehlo kwanendlela abathetha ngayo.
Zifake ekutyeni
Pheka nge-olive oil okanye isoya oil. Ziyafumaneka kwiisuphamakethe ezininzi. Luphekele intlanzi usapho lwakho ubuncinane kabini ngeveki.
Iifatty acids zifumaneka kwisalmon, itrout, isardines, ipilchards nakwituna.
Zininzi izongezi zamafutha entlanzi ezikhoyo zabantwana nezabantu abadala.
Ukusebenza kwengqondo
Iingcali zithi abantwana abatya ukutya okunamafutha entlanzi baba krele-krele engqondweni. Bayayimilisela ingqondo yaye baqhuba kakuhle esikolweni.
Noxa ezi zakha-mzimba zikuphucul' ukusebenza kwengqondo kodwa azikunyangi ukungakwazi ukufunda komntwana. Xa urhana ngathi umntwana wakho unengxaki yokungakwazi ukufunda nokubhala okanye akakwazi ukuhlala phantsi eklasini aphulaphule (iAttention Deficit Disorder) mse kugqirha oza kukugqithisela kwingcali yogqirha.

Usana luthambise ngeemveliso ezenzelwe ulusu losana kuba ezolusu lwabantu abadala ziyalonakalisa ulusu losana.

Ulusu olurhawuzelayo
Ulusu olurhawuzelayo luxhaphake kumabhinqa akhulelweyo ingakumbi aph' esiswini emazantsi. Zininzi iimveliso ongazisebenzisa. Gcina ulusu lwakho luthanjiswe kakuhle ukuze lungomi lurhawuzele.
Yiya kugqirha xa lurhawuzelela ngamandla ulusu lwakho kuba oko kwayanyaniswa nesifo sesibindi esinqabileyo.
Ulusu lweentsana lurhawuzela xa zinerhashalala okanye kukho into ezingavaniyo nayo. Buza kugqirha unobangela nohlobo lwerhashalala ephethe usana lwakho. Ugqirha uza kukunika amayeza neekhrim ekufanele uluthambise zona usana lwakho.
Iminyama
Ukutyeba nokubhitya xa ukhulelwe kwenza iminyama. Kunzima ukuphelisa iminyama ekudala wabanayo. Kodwa ungayithintela ingaveli kwakhona. Xa usazi ukuba ukhulelwe thambisa itissue oil kwiindawo ezinwebekayo emzimbeni wakho.
Sela amanzi kakhulu ukuze ulusu lwakho luhlale lunamanzi.

Iintlawulo Zesikolo



Isikolo siya kukucela ukuba ukhuphe iintlawulo zesikolo neendleko zokufunda. Isixa saloo ntlawulo kuvunyelwana ngaso kwintlangano yoluntu yequmrhu elilawula eso sikolo, ntlanganiso leyo kufuneka ibanjwe minyaka le, futhi apho abazali bavotela isixa seentlawulo zesikolo ekufuneka sikhutshiwe. Kodwa ke, ukuba akukwazi kumelana naloo ntlawulo ifunekayo okanye ke mhlawumbi ungahlawula isixa esithile kuphela, ungabhalela iqumrhu elilawula eso sikolo incwadana yembalelwano apho ucela ukuvunyelwa ungazikhuphi iintlawulo zesikolo, okanye ke uvunyelwe uhlawule isixa esithile esisezantsi kweso sibekiweyo. Eli qumrhu ke liya kwazisa ngesigqibo salo ngesi sicelo. Ikopi yemimiselo elawula iintlawulo zesikolo iyafumaneka kwisikolo eso. Isikolo eso kufuneka sinkuncedise ukuba udinga uncedo ngesicelo sakho sokuvunyelwa ungazihlawuli iintlawulo ongenakumelana nazo.


* Ndingasifaka njani isibheno kwisigqibo sequmrhu elilawula isikolo?
* Ukuba ndivunyelwe ukuba ndingazikhuphi iintlawulo zesikolo, ingaba umntwana wam angalelwa ukuba ukuba angene esikolweni?
* Ukuba ndivunyelwe ukuba ndingazikhuphi intlawulo zesikolo, ingaba umntwana wam uangalelwa ukuba athabathe inxaxheba kuzo naziphi na iintshukumo zesikolo, okanye abanjelwe iziphumo zezifundo zakhe?
* Ingaba ndingalufumana uncedo-mali olunokundinceda ekuhlawuleni iintlawulo zesikolo?
* Ndingazifaka izicelo zokufumana iinkxaso-mali endinelungelo lokuzifumana?


Ndingasifaka njani isibheno kwisigqibo sequmrhu elilawula isikolo?

Ungasifaka isibheno sakho kwiNtloko yePhondo yeSebe Lemfundo. Intloko iya kuthi ikucacisele izizathu ngembalelwano ukuba isicelo sakhe sithe sakhatywa.

Ukuba kufikelelwe kwisigqibo sokuba ungamelana nokukhupha iintlawulo zesikolo, ze wena ungazikhuphi, ungathatyathelwa amanyathelo omthetho ukuqinisekisa ukuba uyazihlawula naziphi na iintlawulo osemva ngazo.

Ukuba ndivunyelwe ukuba ndingazihlawuli iitlawulo zesikolo, ingaba umntwana wam angalelwa ukuba angene esikolweni?

Hayi. Akukho mntwana unokwalelwa ukungena esikolweni ngenxa yokuba abazali bengenakumelana nokukhupha iintlawulo.

Ukuba ndivunyelwe ukuba ndingazikhuphi iintlawulo zesikolo, ingaba umntwana wam angalelwa ukuba athabathe inxaxheba kuzo naziphi na iintshukumo zesikolo okanye ke abanjelwe iziphumo zezifundo zakhe?

Hayi. Isikolo asinakuzibamba iziphumo zomntwana wakho okanye simkhuphe kuzo naziphi iintshukumo zesikolo kuba ungenakuzihlawula iintlawulo zesikolo.

Ndingayifumana inkxaso-mali ndihlawule iintlawulo zesikolo?

Ungavunyelwa ukuba uhlawule isixa esithile kuphela okanye ungayihlawuli yonke intlawulo yesikolo ngokuthi kujongwe umvuzo wakho.

Ungawongeza umvuzo wakho ngokufaka ibango leenkxaso-mali onokuzifumana. Nazi iinkxaso-mali ezimbini onokuzifumana:

* Inkxaso-mali yesondlo somntwana: le nkxaso-mali inikwa umntu okhathalela umntwana/abantwana abangaphantsi kwesixhenxe seminyaka ubudala. Umntu ojongene naba bantwana angangunina, uyise, umzali womzali, isizalwane, isihlobo okanye umntakawabo/udad' wabo omdala.
* Inkxaso-mali yomntwana oselugcinweni lomnye umzali: Le nkxaso-mali yeyabantwana abaselugcinweni lomntu ongenguye umzali wabo, mhlawumbi uninamkhulu/uyisemkhulu. Yinkundla eyalela ukusekwa kolu hlobo lobudlelwane.

Ndingazifaka njani izicelo zeenkxaso-mali endinelungelo lokuzifumana?

Kufuneka ufake isicelo sakho kwi-Ofisi Yentlalo-ntle okanye ke kweyona Ofisi kaMantyi ikufutshane nawe. Amagosa alapho aya kukubuza imibuzo ze bagcwalise iphetshana lesicelo esebenzisa iimpendulo zakho.

IBONA IYAPHANDA
NGELIXA abanye abantu bekugxeka ukusetyenziswa kwamayeza esintu, izikrelemnqa zona zikholelwa kakhulu emagqirheni nasemandleni eyeza. Kwizikrelemnqa ezininzi amayeza abaluleke ngokufanayo nemipu neemela ezizisebenzisayo ukuhlasela abantu.
Amapolisa nawo athi, izaphuli-mthetho ezininzi ziquqa emagqirheni. Kuqala kubakho uloyiko lokubanjwa, into ezizama kangangoko ukuyiphepha ezi ntsizana ezisoloko zithathwa njengabantu ababi, kuba kaloku loo nto ithetha ukuba baza kukhe bathi xha ekudlwenguleni nasekuphangeni okwethutyana.
Ngoko ke kuyiwa kumagqirha "anobubele" ukuze agxothe "utshaba," amapolisa ke ukutsho.
Indlela eqhelekileyo ke xa "unyangwa" iquka "ukuhlanjwa" uthenge nentambo yesihlahla eneyeza. Emva koko uba ngumoya, ungabonakali emehlweni amapolisa.
Ingaba oku kuyenzeka?
Kuya ngokuba ubuza kubani.
Kwixesha nje elingephi elidlulileyo, amapolisa abamb' iqela labaphangi abali-19 ebebexhobe befohlele, bengekafumani nethuba lokuphefumla eWhite City eSoweto.
Kodwa kwiintsuku ezimbalwa emva kweso siganeko elinye iqela laphang' ibhanki yaseNorthcliff eJoburg, labaleka neengxowa ezizele imali.
Ngubani obesebenzisa iyeza, ingubani obengalisebenzisi kwaba? Athini amagqirha xa abanye babantu babo bebanjwa?
"Lithamsanqa nje lamapolisa okanye ukungakhathali kwabaphangi," litsho elinye igqirha.
Yima ke, akumelanga ibe lilo iyeza elinqanda kanye izinto ezinjalo zingenzeki, lisuse ithamsanqa elo?
Uthini ngoorhunta abaphanga inqwelo yemali e-East Rand? Ababexhobe ngemipu befake neebhengile ezineyeza nabo...
... Kwaye bonke babanjwa kwiintsukwana ezimbalwa, emva kophango.
"Likhona lingekho iyeza sakwazi ukubabamba," utshilo owayesisithethi samapolisa ngelo xesha, uSuperintendent Eugene Opperman.
Kanti ngo-2006 abaphangi bahlasela kakubi ivenkile yakwaPick n Pay eHoneydew, entshona yeRhawuti. Apho lasebenza iyeza - okanye ke izigebenga zazicinga njalo, kuba zakhawuleza ukuya kuhlawula egqirheni. Kodwa amapolisa ayesele ewufumene umkhondo zaze zabanjwa ezo zigebenga emva kodubulwano.
Amapolisa eva njani ngeli gqirha mhlawumbi nawo ahamba awawo amagqirha...
Akunjalo. Kancinci kancinci amapolisa eli aqalisa ukusebenzisa abahlali abanomsindo, abadiniweyo kukuphila ubomi bentshontsho.
"Bangamehlo neendlebe zethu kwaye uncedo abasinika lona lukhulu," litshilo elinye lamapolisa aphezulu.
Izaphuli-mthetho ezininzi zibanjwa zineebhengile, kodwa akukhangeleki exhalabile amagqirha yile nto.
Ame ngelithi ziimpimpi ezibabambisayo, akuloyeza elingasebenziyo!
Eliny' ixhwele lisiqinisekisile ukuba xa singaziyeka iziganeko apho omnye wemigulukudu wajikela abanye okanye intombi yomnye wabo, amayeza alo asebenzile "malunga ne-95%" yabantu balo ibenze baphumelela kumayelenkqe abo.
"Abanye bayabuya bazokundongeza imali bebulela izinyanya ngomsebenzi omhle," litsho eli gqirha elinama-69 ubudala.
Ukwathi yena namanye amagqirha - abazizaphuli-mthetho nabo ngenxa yokunceda izikrelemnqa - bakwiphulo lokwenza amayeza okutshabalalisa "uphazamiseko" olubangelwa ziimpimpi.
"Abantu bam baye bafumane ibheyile baze babuye baze kulungisa iimpazamo zabo."
Ubanceda njani ababulali?
"Abaphangi bayeza kum ndibancede," liyavum' igqirha. "Aba bantu balambile kwaye bondla iintsapho zabo. Andinakungazihoyi izicelo zabo."
Ingaba ubucinga amagqirha akrele-krele? Awunakude uthethelele aba bantu ngaloo nto! Ewe indlala iyaluchaphazela ulwaphulo-mthetho kodwa ayisosizathu esiphathekayo eso.

Kwaye inokuba isisenyeliso kumawaka abantu abondla iintsapho zabo ngaphandle kokwaphula umthetho?

UNhlangwini wathwasa ngo-1991 kwaye ngoku nguye ophethe umbutho wamagqirha iGreater Tzaneen Traditional Healers Association, enamalungu angama-500 nekuyeyawo le projekthi.

"Sizibona njengabacebisi nabaphilisi, kwaye amayeza ethu avela kwizinto zendalo nakwizinyanya."
Eli ziko livulwe ngokusesikweni nguMphathiswa wezeNdlela nezoThutho, uJustice Pitso ngoJuni kwaye inayo nemyuziyam, igadi yamayeza, urontabile wokuxilongela negumbi lokuphumla.
UNhlangwini uthi bazimisele ukonwabisa abakhenkethi behlabathi abaza kuza kwiNdebe yeHlabathi ka-2010.
"Siwulungele lo msitho kwaye silindele abatyeleli abaninzi abaza kuza kweli ziko," utshilo ngoncumo.

Ndiza kuyithengisela bani imveliso yam?
Ndiza kulima nini ndize ndithengise nini?
Zeziphi iindleko endinokukwazi ukuzithwala kwaye ileliphi ixabiso endiza kulamkela?
Imveliso yam iza kuba kowuphi umgangatho okanye udidi?
Kwakhona abalimi mabenze isigqibo ngokuba bafuna ukuthengisa phi kwaye baza kuyithengisa njani imveliso yabo:
Ingaba ndiza kuthengisa kumanyano lwamashishini lwendawo endihlala kuyo?
Ingaba ndiza kuthengisa ngokobhambathisa olugqithiselwayo?
Ingaba ndiza kuyigcina imveliso yam ndize ndiyithengise mva xa imfuno ebangwayo seyiphezulu okanye xa ummandla wentengiso ungasaxinenanga?
Ingaba ndiza kuwusila umbona wam okanye ndiza kuwunika iinkomo zam?
Kufuneka ndiwuthengise msinyane kangakanani ngokunjalo ungakanani umngcipheko endinokukwazi ukuwuthatha?
Iimpendulo ezinikwa ngumlimi zale mibuzo kufuneka zonke zinxulumane nemiba esisiseko yoqoqosho echazwe ngentla malunga nemfuno ebangwayo kunye nokusebenziseka! Abalimi bathundezwa ekubeni bavule amehlo abo malunga nokuthengisa xa besenza izicwangciso zemveliso yabo yexesha lonyaka. 
Yiba nolwazi!
Nangona esanda amanani abalimi ayiphawulayo le mithetho-siseko yoqoqosho malunga nokuthengisa, kusekho abaninzi ababona ukuthengisa njengesenzo esenzeka emva kokuqalisa kwexesha lonyaka lokulima kwaye bacinga ukuba mabaqale ngokuzikisa ingqondo kundoqo womsebenzi ekukulima nokuvelisa izityalo! 
Ewe, ukuvelisa isityalo esisemgangathweni obalaseleyo nako kuyimfuneko, kodwa ngenxa yefuthe lokhutshiswano lwehlabathi kwimimandla yentengiso kunye namathuba avezwa ngamandla anokubakho okuthenga nokuthengisa kuTshintshiselwano lweKamva lwaseMzantsi Afrika (South African Futures Exchange â SAFEX) ekuTshintshiselwano lweMpahla lwaseGoli (Johannesburg Stock Exchange â JSE), kubaluleke ngakumbi namhla ngaphezu kwalo naliphi ixesha langaphambili ukuba umlimi abe nolwazi ngamathuba avela entengisweni ngokunjalo nangezicwangciso-buqili zokubekwa kwamaxabiso anokuzifumana.
Iqonga le-SAFEX laziwa ngokuba ngummandla wentengiso yemveliso yorhwebo kwaye ibonwa njengesixhobo esincomekayo sabalimi sokulawula amathuba avelayo kummandla wentengiso kunye nemingcipheko ekubekweni kwamaxabiso phakathi kwemimandla yezolimo eMzantsi Afrika. Abalimi banako ukukhusela izityalo zabo eziziinkozo kwi-SAFEX ukuze baqiniseke ngexabiso elinqwenelekayo ngemveliso yabo kwaye ngomhla abawunqwenelayo kwixesha elizayo. Lo msebenzi unokunciphisa ithuba lokuba zizisulu kwabo kwimimandla yentengiso eguqu-guqukayo ngokunjalo ibakhusele kumaxabiso abekiweyo anokusuka ehle ngexesha lokuvuna xa ummandla wentengiso uxinene okanye unemveliso eninzi kakhulu.
Lumka!
Imveliso yokutya okuziinkozo eMzantsi Afrika iphantsi koxinzelelo. Iindleko zokufaka igalelo ziphezulu, imingcipheko iphezulu, imveliso ethengiswayo ininzi kunemfuno ebangwayo ukuze njengesiphumo sako oko amaxabiso ahlawulwa ngumthengi abe phantsi koxinzelelo ukuze angakwazi ukubuyisela umlimi iindleko zakhe zegalelo nemingcipheko ethathiweyo. Ekugqibeleni abalimi abakwazi kukhupha imveliso enenzuzo phantsi kwemeko enje! 
Umlimi ngamnye makahlalutye imeko yakhe ukuze athathe izigqibo ezibalulekileyo ngentengiso kwaye abambe ixesha malunga neshishini lakhe. Abanye basenokuba bakhethe ukutyala izityalo eziziinkozo ezincinci okwexesha langoku ide ithembeke imimandla yentengiso. Abanye banokukhetha ukujolisa kweminye imisebenzi eyahlukileyo yemveliso ngenjongo yokwandisa isakhono sokukhupha imveliso baphinde bakwazi ukugcina iindleko zegalelo ziphantsi. Kanti abanye abalimi benze uphando ngezenzo zokulima zokuhlakula okukona kuncinci okanye zokungahlakuli, zenzo ezo ezithoba iindleko zegalelo. 
Elokugqibela
Ngelishwa umlimi wezityalo eziziinkozo uyinxalenye kamatshini wehlabathi obeka ixabiso ngoko ke, umlimi omnye kuphela akanakukwazi ukuphembelela ukuguquka kwexabiso. Yiloo nto abalimi bekholisa ukubonwa njengabamkeli bamaxabiso kunababeki bamaxabiso ngokunjalo kungenxa yoko isicwangciso-buqili ngommandla wentengiso esikhethwa ngumlimi kufuneka isisigqibo esiqwalaselwe ngokuqaphela, esixhotyiswe ngemfundo nesenziwa ithuba liselihle phambi kwexesha lonyaka lokutyala!

Ingaba Kuyenzeka Ukuba Wosuleleke yiNtsholongwane kaGawulayo Xa Usabelana Ngesondo Usebenzisa Nomlomo?



Umbuzo: Ingaba Kuyenzeka Ukuba Wosuleleke yiNtsholongwane kaGawulayo Xa Usabelana Ngesondo Usebenzisa Nomlomo?

Impendulo: Ewe, kuyenzeka ukuba wosuleleke yintsholongwane kaGawulayo xa usabelana ngesondo usebenzisa nomlomo. Ngokomngcipheko, ngokwaziwa kwawo, akukabikho luphando lwenziweyo ukuza nawona manqanaba achanekileyo okosuleleka yintsholongwane kaGawulayo xa usebenzisa umlomo. Ezinye izimvo zithi ukwabelana ngesondo kusetyenziswa nomlomo kuza nomngcipheko osezantsi ukuya kokwinqanaba eliphakathi, ze kubekho nezo ke zithi kuza nomngcipheko okwinqanaba eliphakathi ukuya kweliphakamileyo.

Kufuneka kukhunjulwe ke ukuba kungenxa yokuhlangana neencindi ezibeka emngciphekweni okwinqanaba eliphezulu zomntu ophila nentsholongwane kaGawulayo kwanokuthi ezi ncindi zomzimba zingene emzimbeni womntu othile, loo mntu naye unokosuleleka yintsholongwane kaGawulayo.

Inwebu yangaphakathi iqala emlomyeni ze yambathise onke amalungu ethu omzimba angaphakathi. Umntu angathi osuleleke xa le nwebu yangaphakathi inokuthi yonzakale. Ukuba uqweqwe lwale nwebu yangaphakathi luhlangene, oko ke kukuthi alonakelanga, intsholongwane kaGawulayo ayinakungena. Olu qweqwe luthambe kakhulu futhi lungonakaliswa ngokukhawuleza. Umzekelo ophilayo wendlela ethambe ngayo le nwebu nantsi: ukuba umntu ebenokuth agcwalise umlomo wakhe ngekofu eshushu kakhulu, inwebu esemlonyeni ibiya kukrazuka, ithambe, ze itshe. Oku konzakala kungayindlela yokungena keintsholongweane kaGawulayo iye egazini, futhi ukuba umntu othile ebenokuthi azibandakanye ekwabelaneni ngesondo ngendlela engakhuselekanga esebenzisa nomlomo, ekwenza oku neqabane eliphila nale ntsholongwane, ngokungathandabuzekiyo, lowo ebeye kosuleleka.

Kuyinyaniso eyaziwayo ukuba ubuncinci bangamashumi amathandathu anesibhozo eepesenti abantu kulo naliphi na ilizwe abazibandakanya nokwabelana ngesondo besebenzisa imilomo yabo ngaoo ndlela yabo. Izifo zemilomo, ezifana nokubola kwamazinyo, izilonda zomlomo, ukutyabuka kweentsini, njalo-njalo zidala ukonzakala kwale nwebu isemlonyeni. Ngoko ke, nabani na oyonakalisileyo inwebu eselmlonyeni wakhe angaba semngciphekweni wokosuleleka yintsholonwane kaGawulayo, ukuba ebenokuthi azifumane ehlangana neencindi ezinomngcipheko ophakamileyo zomntu ophila nale ntsholongwane ngexesha lokwabelana ngesondo kusetyenziswa nemilomo.

Ngokweenjongo zokwabelana ngesondo kusetyenziswa nemilomo, iincindi ezibeka umntu emngciphekweni omkhulu zezi: Igazi, incindi kabhuti kwakunye neencindi eziphuma kusisi.

IGAZI: Ngenxa yokuba okunye ukonzakala kwamalebe omntu asoloko engabonakali ngeliso lenyama (uksikeka okungephi kwakunye nezilonda) akukho lula ukuba asoloko esazi ukuba amalebe eqabane lakhe abelana nalo ngesondo asempilweni na. Ngoko ke umntu angathi kanti ungenisa izixa ezincinci zegazi emlonyeni wakhe yena engakuqwalaselanga oko.

Ukuba elinye iqabane linesifo esingumvuka wokwabelana ngesondo ngendlela engakhuselekanga emalebeni apho kuphuma incindi okanye kukho isilonda, umntu angazifumana engenwa ligazi, ubovu, njalo-njalo, ezinokuba kanti ziqulethe intsholongwane kaGawulayo. Nezinye izifo ezingumvuka wokwabelana ngesondo zingadluliselwa kwelinye iqabane ngomlomo ngale ndlela, umzekeo: Izilonda zomlomo, igcushuwa okanye intsumpa. Izilonda zomlomo ezibangwa ngumkhuhlane nazo zingadluliselwa kumalebe elinye iqabane ngexesha besabelana ngesondo ngendlela engakhuselekanga.

INCINDI KABHUTI: Kuba intsholongwane kaGawulayo ifumaneka kwincindi yendoda ephila nale ntsholongwane, ukuba loo ndoda ibinokuthi ichithele emlonyeni weqabane layo, intsholongwane kaGawulayo equlethwe yile ncindi yale ndoda ingosulela elinye iqabane.

INCINDI KASISI: Intsholongwane kaGawulayo yaziwa njengefumaneka futhi ihlale kwiincindi zikasisi, ngoko ke, ukuba umntu ebenokuthi azibandakanye nokwabelana ngesondo esebenzisa umlomo wakhe futhi kukho ukonzakala elulwimini okanye kuloo mlomo wakhe (imilebe eqhekekileyo umzekelo), intsholongwane kaGawulayo ekwincindi kasisi ingadluliseleka ngale ndawo umlomo wonzakele kuyo, emilebeni okanye elulwimini lweqabane elisebenzisa umlomo walo kumntu wasetyhini ophila nale ntsholongwane.

Kwiingcebiso esizinikezelayo safumanisa ukuba inani labantu ababelana ngesondo besebenzisa imilomo yabo liyanda.

UNOMATHOTHOLO
Bangumceph' ucandiwe. Sicinga ukuba uHlelo ngosekhohlo, uNtando ngosekunene.
Sincokole ne-
UHLELO wazalwa emva komzuzu ezelwe uNtando Ekurhuleni kwiminyaka engama-25 edlulielyo kwaye uthi kumnandi kubo ukuba ngamawele.
"Sisafunda sasingazi nokuba ukuba ngamawele kusenza abantu abakhethekileyo," utshilo uNtando.
Bathi ngo-1990 babe ngundaba-mlonyeni ngokuba yimidaka yokuqala ukufunda kwisikolo soonongendi, iSt Dominic.
Ngoku ezi nzwakazi zisukileyo egadeni zizama ukuzenzel' igama kwezolonwabo njengamawele azizinhanha akwa-Olsen aseHollywood.
Kungoku nje bangabona bantu batsha abangundaba-mlonyeni kwiTV, emculweni nakwifashoni.
Ngathi baza kuba ziindumasi ngokukhawuleza xa ujonga inani lembalelwano abayifumana kwinkqubo abayisasazayo ethi Double Up engena ngo-6-9pm.
"Yintoni eyenza abafana basoloko benqwenela ukuzibona belele namawele ebhedini"" ubuze watsho uNtando.
"Isiqingatha sabantu abasibhalelayo bathetha ngaloo nto. Esinye isiqingatha sithetha ngomculo ekuyeyona nto nathi siyithandayo."
Umculo uyathandwa kusapho lwakowabo. Umntakwabo uQuinton ubizwa ngoDJ Naked yaye uyenye yeeDJ ezithandwayo eJozi.
Wanceda oodadewabo bashicilela iCD eyidemo eyabenza baqeshwa yi-Yfm ngo-Aprili wonyaka ophelileyo.
"Siyancedisana njengosapho nakwintoni na esiyenzayo. Thina singoontondo kodwa bonke abantakwethu - uQuinton, uFortune noRamesh bangamanxila omculo," utshilo uHlelo.
Kuloo CD la mawele ayethetha ephikisana ngomculo, abafana, iimpahla nangokuba ngubani ohlamba kuqala nangokuba ngubani oza kuqhuba xa bebuya epatini.
Bayithanda abaphathi beYfm baza babanika inkqubo yangempela-veki.
Ngokutsho kukaNtando kuninzi abathetha ngako kule nkqubo ukususela ekubeni ngubani omhle, ngubani otyebileyo nokuba ngubani okrele-krele.
"Emva koko ndithi, 'Khawuthule, udlal' ingoma.' Abaphulaphuli bayasithanda xa siphikisana ngezo zinto," utsho uHlelo.
Ngokutsho kukaNtando, uHlelo ngoyena uphumelelayo kwezothando kuba unexesha elide ethandana nomntu wakhe.
UNtando uthi akangxamanga kwezothando kuba kunzima emadodeni ukuthand' iwele elinye kumawele amabini amahle.
"Oko kubangela nobukhwele kuba inkoliso yabantu abakwazi ukusohlula. Ngoko xa kusiza indoda kum epatini, indibuze ukuba kutheni ndingayifowuneli, umfana endincuma naye uyacaphuka xa ndisithi andiyazi loo ndoda," utsho uHlelo.
Umfana oncuma noNtando usenengxaki yokunga uthandana nawo omabini amawele.
"Emva kwenyanga sithandana wathi uzibona ngathi akathembekanga kum xa ebonana noHlelo.
"Ngethamsanqa ke asizange sazifumana sibanga umfana omnye. Ngabafana abazifumana benaloo ngxaki," utsho uNtando.
Xa babeqala ukusasaza kwiYfm abaphulaphuli babecinga ukuba iDa Twinz licebo nje lesi sikhululo lokusebenzisa ilizwi lomntu omnye bavakale ngathi babini.
Yaphela loo ngcingane emva kokuba beqale ukubonwa kwimisitho ethile behamba kunye.
"Xa sisethekweni elithile, omnye wethu akazenzi njengomnye izinto. Xa ndisela mna, uNtando usela amanzi yena ukuze aqhube xa sigoduka," utsho uHlelo.
Bakwathe abantu abafuna ukuhamba ekhondweni labo nguBasetsane Khumalo noConnie Ferguson ukuze basebenzise impumelelo yabo yezolonwabo ukuze babe ngoosomashishinikazi. [x]
Umbhali: Doug Gordon
Abantu basi-thanda xa siphi-kisana
UHlelo noNtando Masina ngamawele amahle asoloko exambulisana nafumana iincwadi ezinogezo kubathandi bawo kwishishini lomculo...
ABAFANI NGENTO YONKE
Nangona bengumceph' ucandiwe, kodwa abathandi izinto ezifanayo. UNtando uthand' ukubukel' imidlalo yeTV nokufunda, ukanti uHlelo uthand' imidlalo nezinto ezenzelwa phandle.
Baneeflethi kwisakhiwo esinye esiseKurhuleni, kodwa bazonwabisa kwiindawo ezohlukeneyo xa bengaphangeli.
"Xa singenzi umsebenzi weDa Twinz, senza izinto ezahlukeneyo. UNtando ufuna ukuba nebhari - kanti mna ndifuna ukuba nesikolo sokufundisa ukuziphatha," utsho uHlelo.
Nangona kunjalo baya kusoloko besondelelene...
"Xa ndiye ezivenkileni ndihamba ndedwa, abantu abandiqapheli. Kodwa bayasiqaphela xa sihamba sobabini. Yiloo nto esenza sikhetheke."

Siyintoni?

Senziwa yintoni?
Ixesha elininzi isisu esihambisayo senziwa yingxaki esemathunjini. Kodwa ukuba ukuhambisa akukho kangako kungathi kanti kwenziwa kukutya okuthile, nezinye ke iingxaki ezisemathunjini.

UNCEDO LOMPHEFUMLO
UMfundisi George unika iingcebiso kwiingxaki zakho zomphefumlo
Ongakunxiba ecaweni
Ndisemtsha, anditshatanga kwaye ndiqale ukuhamba kwinkonzo entsha ezinyangeni ezintandathu ezidlulileyo. Kutshanje kubekho abadala becawe abathe kukho abantu abakhalazayo ngendlela endinxiba ngayo.
Bathi izkeyiti ezifutshane neetophu ezimfutshane endizinxibayo ziwuveza kakhulu umzimba wam. Amanye amabhinqa akhala nangokuba amadoda awo athanda ukundijonga. Ndiyithini le ngxaki?
Ingaba uThixo uyikhathalele into esiyinxibayo?
nguMaria, eKapa
Bhota Maria: UThixo akanangxaki nokuba unxiba ntoni. Nangona kunjalo kaloku amadoda ayachukumiseka kwakubonayo. Xa unxibe iimpahla ezivelisa umzimba wakho kakhulu ubangela iingxaki, uphazamise namadoda ingakumbi ecaweni. UThixo uthi masingazicingeli thina kuphela, koko kufuneka sincame izinto esizithandayo ngenxa yabany' abantu (AbaseFiliphi 2: 3-4).
Olo ke luthando lokwenene.
Idimon kaSatan
Ndinengxaki yokungazithembi okwenza ihambe kancinane inkqubela yam ebomini, kuqka nokukhula ngokomoya.
Ndizibona ndingento yanto ndicinga nokuba abantu bacinga ntoni ngam. Oku akundincedi tu ekukhuleni kwam. Xa kukho umntu oke wathetha into embi okanye oke wandijonga kakubi ecaweni wona imini yam yeCawe yonke neveki elandelayo.
Ndikulwa njani oku? Ingaba uSatana uzama ukundidodobalisa ngeedimoni!
nguCG, eThekwini
Bhota CG: Oku ndikubona ikukuzidodobalisa ngokwakho. Sebenzisa iingcinga uThixo anazo ngawe (uJeremiya 29:11, iNdumiso 139:14-18).
UThixo uyakuthanda (uJeremiya 31:3) kwaye ukubona uxabisekile (uMateyu 10:31). Ukwamkela nokuba unjani (Abase-Efese 1:6) kwaye ukuthanda njengokuba ethanda uYesu
(1 Yohane 4:16; Yohane 17:23).
Utshabalalisa ubomi bakhe
Intombi yam iyonqena ukwenz' umsebenzi wayo wesikolo. Inomfana encuma naye omdala kunayo kwaye ndinexhala lokuba uza kukhulelwa, angasigqibi isikolo aze atshabalalise ubomi bakhe.
Okhathazekileyo, e-mail
Bhota Mfundi okhathazekileyo: Ufanele ukukhathazeka. Thetha naye kakuhle umchazele ngenkxalabo yakho.
Uninzi lolutsha luyafuna ukuthetha ngemiba ebalulekileyo yobomi nabazali kodwa luyoyika. Menze akhululeke, ungasuki nje umyalele ngokuthile okanye umgrogrise - zama ukumbonisa iziphumo zezenzo zakhe. Ungalibali nokumthandazela.
Ingaba kusisono?
Ukucamngca yindlela yaseMpuma yokuphumza ingqondo ukuze unxulumane noThixo. Abany' abantu bathi njengoko kuyinto eyenziwa "eMpuma" inxamnye nobukrestu. Ingaba yinyaniso leyo? Ingaba ukucamngca kukusondeza kuThixo kwaye kundincede ndive iimpendulo zikaThixo kwimibuzo yam?
nguKM, eSoweto
Bhota KM: IBhayibhile isifundisa ukucamngca ngeLizwi nangeMisebenzi kaThixo (uJoshua 1:8; Iindumiso 77:12).
Ukucamngca kukuzalisa ingqondo neengcinga zakho ngoThixo nendlela ojongana ngayo nezinto zobomi.
Ukucamngca kwaseMpuma kunomahluko. Kukwenza ufikelelwe "yimimoya" engeyiyo engcwele. [x]
NDISINDISIWE, UMNTU WAM AKASINDISWANGA - NDIMLAHLE?
NdingumKrestu owazalwa ngokutsha ethandana nendoda engazalwanga ngokutsha yona. Ndifun' ukuqhubeka nokuthandana nale ndoda nangona yona ingenguye umntu wecawe. Lungaqhubeka uthando lwethu ndibe nethemba lokuba ukholo nemithandazo yam iza kumnceda naye akholwe?
Okhathazekileyo, eRustenburg
Bhota mfundi: Asinako ukumtshintsha omnye umntu. Kungenzeka umfana oncuma naye amamkele uThixo, kanti kungenzeka angamamkeli. IBhayibhile ithi abantu abangakholwayo mabangacalulwa

Iinzipho
EZINTLE!
BUKEKA
SELE kuyinto exhaphakileyo ukufakela iinzipho ezithengwayo nokulungisa iinzipho zakho zendalo zibukeke kweli lizwe eliyibeka phambili inkangeleko yomntu yangaphandle.
Zintathu iindlela ingcaphephe yeenzipho engalungisa ngayo iinzipho zakho - igel, i-acrylic, okanye isilk. Zonke zenziwa ngeendlela ezingafaniyo, kwaye inye isetyenziselwa uhlobo oluthile lweenzipho.
I-Gel system
"Le indlela yeyona isondele kwindalo. Ayinavumba, ilungele nabani na ongasebenziyo ngamachiza. Yeyona ithandwayo kwezi zintathu, kwaye ke ayifane izonakalise iinzipho zakho zendalo," utsho uMariette de Vaal weBlue Earth Salon eseDurban North.
Igel uyiqaba ngokufanayo nenail polish kwaye ke ukhetha iFrench polish okanye igel enombala ize iqatywe ezinzipheni.
"Singafakela amaceba ekupheleni kweenzipho ukongeza ubude, afika emade kakhulu kodwa uyakwazi ukuwanciphisa ngokuwacheba, wenze ubude obuthandayo," utsho uMariette.
Le gel ihlala iiveki ezintathu ukuya kwezine, kuye nangokuba uziphethe kakuhle na okanye kuye nangokukhula kweenzipho zakho.
I-Acrylic system
Noxa ingeyiyo eyendalo njengegel system, i-acrylic yona yomelele. Kusetyenziswa umgubo namanzi athile kunxuzwa ibrashi enkulu kula manzi kuqala, ize ifakwe emgubeni ibunjwe ibe ligaqa phambi kokuba yakhelwe eluziphweni. Ilungele kakhulu abantu abathanda ukutya iinzipho okanye abasebenza ngezandla.
Yeyona inobuchule. "Ungenza okuninzi nge-acrylic kuba ifumaneka ngemibala emininzi kwaye yomeleza iinzipho ezibhetye-bhetye, ngoko ikulungele ukuhombisa iinzipho," utsho Mariette. Ihlala iiveki ezi-3 ukuya kwezi-4 kuye nangokukhula kwazo.
I-Silk system
Le indlela ayixhaphakanga. "Kulula ukuyenza. Ufakela nje icwecwe lesilika elibekwa phezu kozipho.
Kodwa okubi ngayo kukuba isebenzela abantu abazihoyileyo iinzipho zabo, kodwa iyahlala," utsho uMariette. Le kuphela kwendlela engaphumi nemibala, ingcaphephe eyenza iinzipho iwuqaba ngokwayo umbala xa umntu ewufuna.
Lithini ixabiso?
Iinzipho ezinamaceba ziyi-R300. "Kuxhomekeke nakwimeko yeenzipho zakho: Ukuba uyazinonophela kwaye zinde ngokwaneleyo, akukho mfuneko yamaceba," utsho uMariette.

Okwenza uGordon aphumelele!
BONA XHOSA - July 2007
UGordon Igesund sele ezuze indebe yePremier Soccer League kane namaqel' ohlukeneyo kwiminyaka elishumi edlulileyo, kwaye oko kumenze wangoyena mqeqeshi unempumelelo kwimbali yebhola yeli.
kubhale uMARK GLEESON
kufote uGALLO IMAGES
AKUKHO mntu ungaphikisa ukuba uGordon Igesund ungoyena mqeqeshi unempumelelo kwimbali yebhola yaseMzantsi Afrika. Ukuzuza kwakhe indebe yeligi neSundowns kutshanje kuyibethelele nangakumbi loo mpumelelo. Nangona kunjalo kubathabathe ithuba abantu ukuyibona impumelelo yakhe.
Nangona ibibonakala impumelelo yakhe, akukho nzuzo ayifumeneyo ngayo kwaye kufuneke abile esoma ezama ukuzibonakalisa.
Oku kumel' ukuba kuyamkhathaza lo mqeqeshi agxekwa ngabantu abaninzi ngendlela adlala ngayo amaqela awaqeqeshayo.
Nangona kunjalo imbali yempumelelo yakhe ibaval' umlomo abagxeki bakhe.
Wayengenabo abadlali abaphambili uIgesund xa wayezuza indebe yeligi eqeqesha iManning Rangers yaseThekwini neSantos yaseKapa.
Wasebenzisa amaqhinga akhe ukwenza abadlali abangekho phambili bazuze ezo ndebe.
Impumelelo yeRangers ngo-1997 yabonisa ukuba akenzanga ngamlingo njengempumelelo yeSundowns kule sizini ezuze indebe yeligi isashiyekelwe yimidlalo eliqela.
Wazuza indebe yeligi eqeqesha iManning Rangers eyayingenabadlali banamagama, wayizuza neOrlando Pirates ngo-2001, waphinda wayizuza eqeqesha iSantos kunyaka olandelayo.
Ngethuba eqeqesh' iPirates yayinabo abadlali abaphambili, qha kuyo wayejongene noxinzelelo lwangaphandle kwebala. Wafika wayizuzela indebe eyayineminyaka emithandathu yagqibela ukuyizuza.
Iqela eliphambili
Kulo nyaka ubeqeqesha iqela leSundowns ekulelona lomeleleyo kwakhe wawaqeqesha kwaye ubonisile ukuba angabenza badlale kakuhle.
Kwisizini edlulileyo amaBrazilians ebedlal' ibhola emnandi ehlaselayo. Bebebaninzi ababukeli abeza bazoyibukela kwaye uIgesund ubavale umlomo abagxeki bakhe.
Ufike eli qela liyiqale kakubi isizini kwaye oko kwenza kwagxothwa uMiguel Gamondi waseArgentina noNiel Tovey ebebengabaqeqeshi bayo nangona babeyincede yazuza indebe yeligi kwisizini engaphambili.
"Xa unabadlali abaphambili, banento yokuzixelela ukuba badlala kakuhle," utshilo uIgesund ethetha ngokudlala kwabo imidlalo eli-11 yePSL bewina kuyo yonke.
"Ndifike kwiqela elomeleleyo ebelifuna ukulungiswa nje phaya naphaya. Mna ke ndifike ndazama ukuphelisa ukuzixelela kwabadlali, ndatshintsha nendlela ebebedlala ngayo.
"ISundowns ibiyithunga kakuhle ibhola kodwa ingahlaseli ngokukhawuleza. Mna ndithanda ibhola ekhawulezayo. Kufuneka abadlali bangayilahli nje ibhola, babe nomonde, balinde ukuvela kwethuba baze balisebenzise ngokukuko."
Ukuzimisela
U-Igesund uthi uyakwazi ukuzibona iingxaki zeqela lakhe ebaleni aze azilungise, kodwa uthi ubukhulu becala liphumelela ngenxa yokusebenza nzima.
Ngaphezulu koko kukho imeko yengqondo ekuyeyona ibalulekileyo.
"Ndisebenzisa ubuchule bengqondo kakhulu ebadlalini bam. Ndiyathetha nabo. Ndibenza bakholelwe kubo, ndibenza bafune ukudlala nokulwela impumelelo," utsho uIgesund.
"Kufuneka bakunike intlonipho njengomqeqeshi, ungabanyanzeli ukuba bakuhloniphe. Andifiki nje ndithi: 'ndinguGordon Igesund, umqeqeshi owina iindebe, niza kudlala ngendlela yam.'
"Andingxami xa abadlali ndibafundisa oko ndifuna bakwenze ngokuzimisela."
Uthe uyayibethelela into yokuba abadlali badlale ngokwemiyalelo.
"Xa umdlali enikwe umsebenzi othile emdlalweni, kufuneka awenze ngendlela."
Ukwenza umthambo
U-Igesund uthi mninzi umsebenzi owenziwayo xa iqela liziqeqesha.
"Ndiyathanda ukwenzis' abadlali into endifuna bayenze emdlalweni ukuze ndibone ukuba bayayilandela na." Uthi abadlali ubenzisa nje imithambo emihlanu nemithandathu ngemini xa ebaqeqesha.
Unawo amaxesha okubangxolisa abadlali kumagumbi okunxibela xa bengakwenzi akufunayo, kodwa unethamsanqa lokuba basoloko beyilandela imiyalelo yakhe.
Ukwathe ukuba nabadlali abaphambili kweSundowns kwenza kubenzima ukubenza bakhuphe sonke isakhono sabo.
Abanye banetalente entle kangangokuba izinto ziyazenzekela kubo ebaleni - maxa wambi ezo zinto zibe zingaliphumelelisi iqela.
U-Igesund uthi xa ungumqeqeshi owaziyo umsebenzi wakhe ufuna inyanga enye ukufund' abadlali. "Kufuneka wazi ukuba uya kuphumelela okanye woyiswe ngezigqibo zakho. Ngoko ufanele ukwazi okwenzayo."
Ukuzuza iindebe namaqela ohlukeneyo kuyabonisa ukuba uyawazi umsebenzi wakhe. [x]

Ekugqibeleni ulandele intliziyo yakhe wathenga esakhe isiqwengana somhlaba. Naxa engafundanga ukwazile ukujika ifama yaba lishishini lempumelelo kwiminyaka elishumi elinesine. âNdingomnye wabo bantu bahloniphekileyo kuba benikwe uthando lokuvelisela abanye ukutya. Olu thando olusentliziyweni yam lwafakwa kuyo nguThixo.â 



âIsiqalo somsebenzi woqeqesho wam saba lula ngenxa yamava endandisele ndinawo,â utshilo uLepati, ngoku selenomhlaba oziihektare ezingama-506 aze aphinde aqeshe omnye oziihetare ezingama-200 kumvelisi kummandla waseKestell. Ishishini likaLepati linamacala amabini; zizityalo eziziinkozo kwicala elinye ukuze kwelinye icala ibe sisolulo sedlelo lemfuyo elibonisa impumelelo. 



Njengenxalenye yeqela lofundonzulu lwaBavelisi abasaPhuhlayo bakwaGrain SA, uLepati usebenza kufutshane noJohan Kriel, umququzeleli wephondo wenkqubo yaBavelisi abasaPhuhlayo bakwaGrain SA eFree State. âULepati yindoda enesidima. Uyathandeka kwaye uhlonitshwa nguye wonke umntu omaziyo. Ubaphatha ngobubele abanye abantu kwaye uthanda abazukulwana bakhe ngentliziyo yakhe yonke,â utshilo uJohan. 



ULepati unomhlaba weehektare ezingama-320 wezityalo kwaye ulandela isixokelelwano sokujikelezisa phakathi kombona, ingqolowa nee-sugar beans. Uhlalutyo lweentwana zomhlaba lwenziwa qho emva kweminyaka emibini ukuqinisekisa ukuba umdibaniso wesichumiso somhlaba ulungelelene ngokuchanekileyo. Ukhula lulawulwa ngemichiza nangoomatshini. Kwixesha lonyaka elidlulileyo uLepati ulime umbona we-GM okokuqala. âNdiza kuqhuba ngokulima umbona we-GM kwixesha elizayo, ngenxa yohlobo olulula lokulawula izitshabalalisi zezityalo xa kuthelekiswa nenye imbewu,â watsho uLepati. 



Ngenxa yokukwazi ukuphatha oomatshini kakuhle, iitrektara nezixhobo zikaLepati zonke zikwisimo esincomekayo kakhulu. Ngowe-1974, xa uLepati wayeqalisa umsebenzi wokufama, umvelisi orhwebayo wamnika iFord 5000. Le trektara isekwisimo sokusebenza esincomeka ngokubalaseleyo nangoku, akukho nakuvuza kungako kweoyile. Lithe ngokuya likhula ishishini likaLepati, wafakela iMassey 188, iFord 66, iFord 7610 kunye neNew Holland 6640 emandleni akhe okusebenza. Ezi trektara zihlolwa isimo sazo rhoqo kanti ukugcinwa kwamaphepha eengxelo okufanelekileyo kuyinxalenye yenkqubo.

 

Oonyana bakaLepatiâs ababini banenxaxheba nabo kwishishini, baqhuba iitrektara. Kukho abasebenzi ababini abasisigxina efama kodwa, xa kukho imfuneko kuqeshwa abasebenzi bethutyana.



Akukho shishini lokufama lingenamiceli-mngeni yalo kanti malunga noLepati; kukho unqongophalo lombane olubanga ubunzima. Ufake isicelo kwaEskom sokuba afumane umbane kwifama yakhe, nto leyo eya kunceda ukuba aphathe iitrektara zakhe nezixhobo zokusebenza phucukileyo nangaphezulu. 



Imfuyo kaLepati ziinkomo neegusha. Iinkomo zakhe ubukhulu becala yimihlanganisela yeBonsmara kanti iinkomo zakhe zimalunga nama-85 ukuze iigusha zibe malunga nekhulu. NgokukaLepati, ishishini lakhe lemfuyo linegalelo kwikota yengeniso yakhe iphelele â uthengisa amathole alunyulweyo eKwindla xa seliza kuphela eli xesha lonyaka kubathengisi kwiintengiso zendawo yakhe zefandesi, Amathole akhe ngawodidi oluphezulu kwaye selephumelele naselugqatsweni lamathole abalaseleyo eqela elilunyulweyo. Ugqatso lwalubanjwe kwenye yeefandesi zendawo leyo kanti uLepati ude wangenela ugqatso nabavelisi borhwebo. Iihektare ezingama-386 zentsimi yakhe zisetyenziswa njengamadlelo ayindalo. 



IPhuthaditjhaba yindawo yomsebenzi kaLepati ekhethiweyo apho ahlala khona nenkosikazi yakhe, uNooi, noonyana bakhe ababini. Malunga nemali esesandleni ayizuze elugqatsweni kumnyhadala wonyaka we-2007 waBavelisi abasaPhuhlayo beziTyalo eziZiinkozo wakwaGrain SA/Absa, uthethe okulandelayo kuJohan Kriel: âUyazi Johan, ngoku ndinako ukuthenga imbewu ethe chatha ukuze ndilime kwesinye iqwenga somhlaba wam.â Lawo ngamazwi anokuthethwa ngumvelisi wenene kuphela!

BONA XHOSA - April 2008
ANGALIGUQULA amayeza ishishini elizikayo liphumelele" Usomashishinikazi waseSaldanha eNtshona Koloni uthetha ngamahlandenyuka emeko yakhe kwezezimali. "Ndibhala le ncwadi nje ndikwiphulo lokuzama ukuzonyula ematyaleni," utsho.
Uyibona le meko njengenye yeengxaki kwezininzi ezibangelwa "yimimoya" emdaka, achithe ubomi bakhe bonke ejongene nayo.
Uthi naxa wayesebenzela omnye umntu kwakubakho iingxaki.
"Ndandisoloko ndilixhoba lentlebendwane nezityholo ezingenamva namphambili."
Kanti ke nasekuziqesheni kwam akubangakho nto intle.
"Ndiyasokola ukwenza imali nokuba sele ndizama kangakanani ukulithengisa nokulazisa ebantwini ishishini lam."
Ukholelwa ekubeni unobangela wale meko lishologu.
Uthi oosiyazi sele bemxelele amatyeli amaninzi ukuba litsalela emva nje ishishini lakhe kungenxa yesi silo esasisaya kuba sesomama othile owayesisihlobo sakhe, owabhubha kwiminyaka emininzi eyadlulayo.
Abaninzi bathi izilo ezifana neshologu okanye impundulu, ezivela ziyimo yentaka, zizisa ubutyebi xa umnini weshishini emana ukuzenzela imisebenzi rhoqo azixhelele iibhokhwe, iinkuku neenkomo.
Ngamanye amazwi ke le "nkqubo" ifanele ilandelwe ngobunjalo bayo ngumnini wesilo omtsha. Kuba ukungonwabi kwayo le mimoya kungakuphathela amashwa okanye ubenezothe emsebenzini, ekuhlaleni nasebantwini bakowenu.
Ingakumbi impundulu ingumthwalo kuba yona ifuna umniniyo axhele kaninzi ngenyanga, kungenjalo izakubakhona ingxaki.
"Ndiza kuyithathaphi imali yokuthenga iibhokhwe, iinkuku kunye nenkomo ukuze ndixhelele ishologu"" ubuza atsho umfundi waseNtshona Koloni.
Akukho qwili elinokutshabalalisa eli shologu, mhlawumbi ke likwazi nokukhulisa ingeniso yeshishini lakhe litsho liphumelele"
Ukunyoluka
Ngelishwa akululanga ngolo hlobo.
Eli nenekazi lifuna ukugxotha ishologu, kodwa alinakho ukukwenza oku xa lingenalwazi lupheleleyo ngesi silo, nokuba kwenzeka njani ukuze sibe yinxalenye yosapho lwakowalo.
Ishologu okanye impundulu akusosinyanya, kodwa ngumoya omdaka, okanye isilo esenzelwa abantu abanyolukileyo abafuna ubutyebi obukhawulezileyo.
Mna andinakukhuthaza ukuba samkelwe okanye "sithengwe" esi silo sinobusathana ngenjongo yokuzuza ubutyebi kuba obo butyebi butshabalala ngephanyazo njengokubufumana kwakho.
Ngaphezulu, abanye bathi impundulu okanye ishologu lingabeka amalungu osapho lwakho engozini ukuba alondliwa ngokwaneleyo.
Inokukhangela amaxhoba ayo kubantu abamsulwa xa iibhokhwe, iinkuku neenkomo zingekho.
Ziyingozi kumashishini, kunyango lwesintu nakuluntu ngokubanzi.
Bonana namagqirha
Amayeza esintu azisa ithamsanqa ukuze ubani aphumelele angasebenza.
Kodwa ke la mayeza ethamsanqa afumaneka phantse kuzo zonke iivenkile zamayeza esintu akancedi xa kukho impundulu ezinzileyo ekhayeni kungenjalo eshishinini lomntu.
Ndiyalikhuthaza eli nenekazi laseSaldanha ukuba lihambele amagqirha anamandla okuyitshabalalisa le mimoya.

Yiba yincutshe ekubhakeni, yonwabisa usapho lwakho ngeebhiskithi ezinambithekayo
A KUNGUYE wonke umntu okwaziyo ukubhaka, kodwa ukuba uyazifundisa ungayincutshe. Ukukunceda kwiphulo lakho, sikunike uluhlu lwezona ngxaki ziqhelekileyo zokubhaka, nezisombululo:
Ikeyiki yam iyakekela
Iikeyiki zakho uzibhaka ngobushushu obungalinganiyo, kwaye iipani zakho zisondelelana zide zithi nca enye kwenye okanye zinamathele kumacala e-onti.
Umphezulu wekeyiki yam utshona ngaphakathi
Kungabangelwa zizizathu ezithathu:
Usebenzisa iswekile eninzi.
Ithina obhaka ngayo incinci kakhulu.
Ubushushu be-onti buphantsi kakhulu.
Iikeyiki zam azinyuki
Yingxaki eqhelekileyo le kwaye isenokuba akugalelwanga ibaking powder (okanye ibicarbonate of soda) eyaneleyo kwaye/okanye i-onti ibingekafudumali ukufakwa kwekeyiki.
Xa ndibhaka iimafini okanye iikeyiki, isikhoko sibamanzi okanye sibencangathi
Zine izizathu ezingenza ukuba kubenje:
Usebenzise iswekile eninzi.
Ikeyiki ibhakwe yedlulisa okanye ayivuthwanga.
Kusetyenziswe ibhotolo okanye imargarina eninzi.
Ufake ibaking powder eninzi (okanye ibicarbonate of soda).
Xa ndiyikhupha epanini ikeyiki yam iyaqhekeka
Iyakhathaza le nto kuba kaloku ukubhaka akuyonto ilula, kodwa oku kungenziwa kukukhawuleza uyophule ingekabhakeki ngokupheleleyo, okanye usebenzise ibaking powder eninzi.
OKUMNANDI
Funda ukupheka
noNtwenhle Mpanza
ITRADITIONAL BISCUITS
* 1/2 sekomityi (125ml) yecastor sugar
* 1/2 sekomityi (125ml) yemargarina yokubhaka, ithambe
* 1 iqanda
* 1 ikomityi (250ml) yecake flour, isefwe
* 1 itispuni (5ml) yebaking powder
* 1/2 setispuni (2,5ml) yebicarbonate of soda
1. Beka i-onti ku-180Â°C. Zamisela iswekile nemargarina esityeni de umxube ubelafulafu.
2. Galela iqanda, qhuqha ukuze kudibane. Galela izithako eziseleyo. Zamisa wenz' intlama ethambileyo.
3. Songa intlama ngeplastiki okanye iclingwrap, faka efrijini ubuncinane imizuzu engama-30. Oku kuza kuyenza iqine intlama ikwazi ukubumbeka.
4. Yibeke phezu kwebhodi efafazelwe iflawa kancinci, yisike ibezizilayi ezityebe kangange-3mm. Kungenjalo uyendlale, intlama ityebe ngange-3mm. Uyisike ngecookie-cutter.
5. Zibeke kwipani eqatywe amafutha kancinci, efafazwe iflawa, fafazela icastor sugar. Bhaka imizuzu eli-12 de zibe mdaka.
6. Zikhuphele kwirekhi yocingo.
Okunye ongakwenza: Faka icoconut.
Icebo: Xa ufuna iziphumo ezihle, imargarina namaqanda makahlale kubushushu begumbi. [x]
Amacebo eebhisikithi
Xa usenza iibhiskithi, ukuba iresiphi ithi sebenzisa ibhotolo, ukusebenzisa imargarina eyenzelwe ukubhaka kulungile. Qiniseka ukuba ipani iqatywe amafutha kancinci - oku kuya kunqanda iibhiskithi zinganamatheli (kwaye zingaqhekeki).
Ukuba intlama yomile, yifefe ngamanzi abanda kakhulu.
Yenza umxube olungileyo
Enye imfihlo xa ufuna ukuba yincutshe yompheki kukufaka imilinganiselo eyiyo. Izixhobo:
Ikomityi yeti: Yiyona ilungele imilinganiselo yezithako ezomileyo. Khumbula, ikomityi yeti eqhelekileyo enye ingange-250ml.
Amacephe: Ayafuneka xa kugalelwa izithako ezinemilinganiselo emincinane, njengebaking powder, ibicarbonate of soda okanye ivanilla essence. Xa ungenawo amacephe enzelwe ukumetesha, khumbula: itispuni enye (engazalanga kakhulu) ilingana ne-5ml, ngelixa icephe eli-1 liyi-15ml.
Ijagi yokumetesha: Umel' ukuba nayo, kuba kubalulekile ukuyichana imilinganiselo yezithako ezingamanzi.
Amanye amacebo:
Xa usebenzisa icephe ukulinganisa izithako, lilevelishe ngemela xa lizele kakhulu.
Xa umetesha ibhotolo okanye imargarina, sika ngemela ebukhali.
Xa uyisebenzisa le jagi yibeke endaweni engqalileyo.
Ulwimi lokubhaka
Mix: Kukudibanisa okanye ukuzamisa izithako ezimbini nangaphezulu.
Whisk: Ukuqhuqha udibanise izithako (ingakumbi ikhrim namaqanda) ungasebenzisi amandla kodwa uqhuqhe ukhawuleza. Oku kwenzeka kakuhle ngesiqhuqhi (whisk).
Fold: Kukudibanisa amaqanda aqhuqhiweyo kuhle nomxube ojiyileyo usebenzisa icephe okanye icephe lokhuni elinentloko emcaba (spatula).
Chill: Yibeke efrijini de ibande.
Combine: Ukuxuba izithako de umxube uphele izigaqa.
Beat: Kukuqhuqha izithako usebenzisa amandla.
Grease: Kukuqaba ipani yokubhaka ngebhotolo okanye ngemargarina ukuze kunganamatheli okubhakwayo.
Dust: Ukufaka ngaphezulu okubhakwayo isithako esomileyo, ingakumbi iflawa okanye iswekile.
Blend: Ukuzamisa izithako zakho de zidibane kakuhle.
Glaze: Ukuqaba ukutya ngomxube oswiti, usebenzisa ibrashi yokwenza oko.
Cream: Ngumxube apho udibanisa "izithako ezomileyo" - njengeswekile - kunye namafutha afana nebhotolo okanye imargarina. Ukwenza oku xa usenza intlama yekeyiki okanye intlama yeebhiskithi. Izithako ezomileyo zidityaniswa namafutha lawo de umxube ubelula, ubelafulafu de wande ngenxa yamadlu enziwa ngumoya. La madlu anyusa intlama xa ibhakwa.

Ukutheng' imoto neengxaki zayo
Ndatheng' imoto egaraji ndahamba ngayo iiveki ezimbini yafa. Ndafowunela umthengisi wayo egaraji ndamxelela ukuba imoto ifile. Ndambuza ukuba uza kuyilungisa njani na. Wasuka wandihleka wandixelela ukuba le moto ndiyithenge neengxaki zayo ngoko ke uxanduva lokuyilungisa lolwam.
Ndaya kuye ndiye kumcela ukuba ayithathele kuye le moto andibuyisel' imali yam. Wala ukuyithatha imoto nokundibuyisel' imali yam.
Ndithini"
nguJJ, eHumansdorp
Amaxa amaninzi xa abantu bethengiselana iimpahla, umthengisi unyanzelekile ukuba anike umthengi isiqinisekiso sokuba iimpahla ezo zithengiswayo azinangxaki zingaxelwanga.
Esi siqinisekiso akufuneki sichazwe okanye sixelwe kuba kunyanzelekile ukuba sifunyanwe ngumthengi ngokomthetho waseMzantsi Afrika.
Kodwa xa imithetho nemigwaqo yesivumelwano sentengo avumelene ngaso umthengi nomthengisi sichaza ukuba imoto ithengwe neengxaki zayo, esi siqinisekiso asifumaneki.
"Ukutheng' imoto neengxaki zayo kuthetha ukuthi uyithenga injengoko injalo - uyithenga ikwimo ofike ikuyo yaye akukho siqinisekiso usifumanayo xa uyithenge ngolu hlobo.
Phantsi kwale meko ke umthengi wemoto uyibuyisa imoto aze afune imali yakhe kumthengisi kuphela xa imoto ingawenzi umsebenzi ayifunele wona naxa umthengisi eyithengise ihleli ineengxaki waza wazifihla ngabom kumthengi.
Kwimo ekumila kunje, ingxaki yemoto efihlwayo ngumthengi yinto eyonakeleyo apho emotweni ayaziyo umthengisi kodwa ayifihle kumthengi.
Ngoku into ekufuneka uyenze kukuya egaraji uye kufuna ingxelo ebhaliweyo enoluhlu lweengxaki ezisemotweni leyo uyithengileyo kwakunye namaxabiso okuzilungisa ezo ngxaki.
Umntu oza kukubhalela le ngxelo uza kuba lingqina etyaleni oza kube umangalele kulo umthengisi yaye nawe uza kunika obakho ubungqina.
Xa imoto uyithengiselwe ingakulungelanga ukuhamba endleleni okanye ingenayo ilayisensi, loo nto iza kukunceda enkundleni ibe bubungqina bokuba umthengisi ukuthengisele ezazi iingxaki zemoto kodwa wakufihlela.
Xa ukwazi ukuza nobungqina obuza kubonisa ukuba ngenene uzifihlelwe iingxaki zemoto ngaphambi kokuba uyithenge uza kuyibuyiselwa imali yakho oyithenge ngayo.
Xa ugqiba ekubeni uyilungise imoto leyo uze uqhubeke nokuyisebenzisa, ungenza ibango lemali yokuyilungisa imoto.

Kufuneka uwubone umsebenzi wokufama njengeshishini kwaye kuyimfuneko ukuba rhoqo: 

Uphengulule isimo sezemali seshishini lakho liphelele. 

Uqinisekise ukuba kunyanzelekile ukuba iingxelo zezinto eziphathekayo nezemali zonyaka odlulileyo, kubandakanywa iindleko zezityalo eziphelela kakhulu emdeni, iingxelo zengeniso, imiqukuqelo yemali esesandleni kunye namacwecwe okulungelelanisa kufuneka egqityezelwe okanye ehlaziyiwe. 

Iingxelo zengeniso eziziswe ngaphambili, imiqukuqelo yemali esesandleni kunye namacwecwe okulungelelanisa kunye neendleko zohlalutyo lwengeniso eziphelela kakhulu emdeni, zinako ukulungiselelwa ukubonisa iziphumo zomboniso wamaxabiso ombona ahlukahlukileyo. 

Imiqukuqelo yemali esesandleni enganelanga kumaxesha ngamaxesha onyaka iya kunceda ukukubonisa ukuba sesiphi isicwangciso sentengiso esisesona sifanelekileyo onokusilandela.

Ukuseka amanqanaba amaxabiso ekujoliswe kuwo 

Ukuba akunafifi lweendleko ozenze ngesityalo sakho, kunzima ukwazi ukuba yimalini na ekufuneka uyifumene (ngetoni enye) ukuze ukwazi ukufumana inzuzo. Cinga ngokulandelayo: 

Bala isixa esipheleleyo seendleko zemveliso ngehektare nganye nangetoni enye evelisiweyo. 

Thathela ingqalelo iindleko ezingqalileyo â imbewu, isichumiso, i-diesel, izitshabalalisi zokhula, izitshabalalisi zezibulali-zityalo, abasebenzi bamathutyana neinshorensi yesityalo.

Bala icandelwana leendleko ezisisigxina isityalo esingumbona esifanele ukuzithwala kwingqikelelo yesiqabu solungelelwaniso nexabiso lenzuzo ekufuneka lihlangatyeziwe ngentengiso. Iindleko ezisisigxina zibandakanya irhafu, inzala, abasebenzi abasisigxina, umbane (zonke iindleko eziqhubayo nokuba usityalile isityalo okanye akunjalo). 

Isiqabu solungelelwaniso sichazwa njengexabiso apho imiba ejingayo engqalileyo nelungeleleneyo esisigxina ihlangatyezwa khona ukuvelisa inzuzo engenasixa sisalayo. 

Imveliso yombona ikholisa ukuba yinxalenye yesixokelelwano semveliso yefama ethile. Imveliso yemfuyo ebanzi neyenzisiswayo okanye umsebenzi wokucola nokuba ngowokuxuba umbona ukwenzela imixube yesondlo isenokuba ngumbandela oqhubela phambili umsebenzi wokuvelisa umbona. Umbona kananjalo usenokuba sisityalo esibaluleke kakhulu esisetyenziswa kwisicwangciso somjikeleziso wezityalo owenziwa efama. Kubalulekile ke ngoko ukuyikhumbula yonke le mibandela xa kusenziwa izibalo zexabiso âelilelona liphantsiâ â khumbula ukubeka ixabiso ngokunjalo kwezinye izinto eziluncedo ekuveliseni isityalo. 

Ukwishishini kwaye ukuba kufuneka uhlale kwishishini kufuneka wenze inzuzo kuwo nawumphi umsebenzi owenziwa efama. 



Ukuba ngumlimi kunzima kwaye mininzi imibandela ekufuneka igcinwe engqondweni ngesigqibo ngasinye. Kweli banga, umba wenzuzo ngemveliso yokutya okuziinkozo umi ngendlela yokuba abalimi abasaphuhlayo abakwazi kuvelisa nakuphi ukutya okuziinkozo ngendlela yolondolozo. Naxa kunjalo, kwixesha elifutshane, kufuneka sinike inkxaso yemali kubalimi bokutya okuziinkozo ngendlela yobonelelo â mhlawumbi ukwenzela ukuncedisa ngeendleko zegalelo, okanye ngochatha kwiitoni eziveliswayo. Uncedo lwesixokelelwano sikachatha kwiitoni ezivelisiweyo luya kuba kukunika umbulelo kwabo basebenzileyo â le iya kuba yindlela yokuncedisa abo banesakhono nomdla wokuzinikela ekubeni ngabalimi abarhwebayo abapheleleyo. 



Enye ingxaki enkulu abadibana nayo abalimi abasaphuhlayo yimeko yeetrektara nezixhobo zokusebenza â sifuna uhlobo oluthile lwenkxaso yemali ukuze abalimi bakwazi ukuncediswa ekubeni bazigcine zizitsha izixhobo zabo. Aliqela amasebe karhulumente anikela ngeetrektara nezixhobo zokusebenza kumaqela abalimi. Oku kunokuba sisisombululo sethuba elifutshane, naxa kunjalo, luninzi uqeqesho nempumezo efunekayo ukuze abalimi bafunde indlela yokulawula ezi zixhobo. Xa into iyeyeqela kwaye isetyenziswa lilo lonke, akubikho mntu uthwala uxanduva, engekho nonenkathalo â zininzi iziganeko apho isixhobo sokusebenza sithi besisezandleni zamaqela, saza asaphathwa kakuhle de siphelelwe sisakhono kwaphela. Esi asisosenzo solondolozo. 



Abaphathi besolulo kufuneka bephinde baqeqeshwa, baxhotyiswe ngokutsha ngobuchule kwaye bakhuthazwe â baliqela aba bantu besolulo kwaye kufuneka bancedise abalimi emasimini.

Umbhambathiswa sukuba engxame kakhulu engenaxesha lokugqithisela ubuchule kumlimi;

Umbhambathiswa akanaluqeqesho lokuqeqesha nokuxhobisa abanye; kananjalo

Umlimi akenzi nzuzo eyaneleyo ngohlobo lokuba akwazi ukuthenga iitrektara nezixhobo zakhe.



Izinto ezingeloncedo ngokusebenzisa umbhambathiswa 

Ziindleko ezandileyo zomsebenzi wemveliso.

Imali echithwa emsebenzini wobhambathiso inokuchithwa phucukileyo kulondolozo nakunyuso lomgangatho weetrektara nezixhobo zabalimi.

Abalimi ababandakanywa kwinkqubo yokufama kwaye abaxhotyiswanga ngolwazi lokufama bebodwa. 

Kwimo esingqongileyo yethu ebharhileyo, kukholisa ukuba kubekho ithuba elifutshane kakhulu kodwa eliyilingene kakuhle imisebenzi eyahluka-hlukeneyo yokulima. Xa kusetyenziswa umbhambathiswa kwindawo enkulu, kaninzi elo kroba alithathelwa ngqalelo nto leyo enokwenza ilahleko yesityalo kumlimi (ukutyala emva kwexesha, ukutshiza emva kwethuba).

Umbhambathiswa uhlawulwa ngehektare nganye kwaye umvuzo wakhe awuxhomekekanga kumgangatho womsebenzi wakhe awenzileyo â nokuba umlimi ufumene inzuzo okanye akayifumenanga, umbhambathiswa yena ufumana imali yakhe. Ulawulo lomgangatho womsebenzi yinto engekhoyo kakhulu â kwakhona ngenxa yobukhulu. 

Bakhona abalimi abanesakhono abamnyama. Aba balimi bafanele ukukwazi ukuqesha umhlaba kwabanye mhlawumbi abangenamdla okanye abangenasakhono sokuzenzela umsebenzi wasefama. Kweli banga, ubukhulu bomhlaba okhoyo âuyalinywaâ ngamashishini ezolimo ngoko ke awufumaneki kwabanye abalimi abamnyama. Abalimi abanesakhono kufuneka bakwazi ukusebenzisa lo mhlaba ukuze bandise imisebenzi yabo yokufama. 

Malunga nabalimi abangenazixhobo kwaphela, impikiswano isekubeni xa besenzelwa umsebenzi wokufama banako ukuqokelela imali eyinkunzi eyaneleyo yokuzenzela umsebenzi wokufama bebodwa. Akukho bungqina obuxhasa le mpikiswano â imida yenzuzo kwimveliso yokutya okuziinkozo mincinci kakhulu kwaye ukusebenzisa ababhambathiswa kuzicutha ngakumbi iinzuzo. 



Yintoni esikholelwa ukuba inako ukusebenza? 

Bonke abadlali beendima mabasebenze ngengqiqo bazabalazele ukuphuhlisa abalimi â umsebenzi wokulima ubukhulu becala ugxile kubalimi kunokuba uphathelelene nomhlaba. Abalimi bafuna ukuzenzela ngokwabo umsebenzi wokufama âbangalinyelwaâ.

Umlimi makavunyelwe ukuqalisa ngento anayo â isiqalo esincinci emhlabeni omncinci sikhuseleke ngakumbi. (Khumbula ukuba umntu ofuna ukusebenzisa intsimi yakhe ukwazile ukuziphilisa kwada kwalapho ngaloo ngeniso ebeyenza. Xa ke ngoku enokufumana inzuzo encinci ngehektare nganye emhlabeni okhoyo, leyo iya kuba nguchatha wemali abengekhe abe nayo. Ngokuqalisa kancinci kunyinwa imingcipheko, kanti ngokwenza okulungileyo ngendlela elungileyo, umlimi unako ukukhula ngokweentlobo zobuchule nangokuzithemba.) 

Musa ukunyanzela umlimi ukuba asebenzise umbhambathiswa kodwa mncedise umlimi malunga nolondolozo lwezixhobo zakhe, nokulima intwana anako ukuyilima ngokwakhe â kubhetele xa umlimi ewuqeshisa umhlaba angawusebenzisiyo, lo gama esakhula kwishishini. 

Yinto ebalaseleyo ukulandela umlimi ngoqwalaselo â kodwa umcebisi onjalo akafanelanga kuba nguye nawuphi umntu. Umcebisi ngumntu onomdla wenene kuphuhliso lalowo amlandela ngoqwalaselo â umntu ozinika ithuba egqithisela ulwazi nobuchule, umntu onomonde nonika inkxaso. Ubudlelwana phakathi komcebisi/umcetyiswa kufuneka bulunge â busekwe phezu kokuthembana nokuhloniphana, kwaye kubaluleke kakhulu ukuba omabini amaqela akonwabele ukuzibandakanya kobu budlelwana, kuba kaloku buyiyo loo nto â ubudlelwana. 

Bagcine abalimi benolwazi kwaye bezibandakanya ungabenzeli izigqibo eziphathelelene nabo kodwa ube ubashiye ngaphandle. âAkukho nto malunga nathi, ngaphandle kwethuâ yintetho yomnye wemibutho ebhekiselele ebantwini abanokhubazeko, kanti nalapha ifaneleke kangangoko. 

Ncedisa abalimi ngokwenza uhlalutyo olupheleleyo lwefama yabo, iitrektara, izixhobo, oomatshini, imfuyo, amatyala, impahla yexabiso njl.njl. Kufuneka sibancedise abalimi kuyo yonke imiba kanti nabo kufuneka bafumane ingqiqo yako konke. Umzekelo, ingaba umlimi unawaphi amandla ekW, kwaye ingakanani intsimi anako ukuyilawula ngeso sakhono? 

Qinisekisa ukuba umlimi uyinxalenye yenkqubo yoqeqesho nophuhliso. Ukuba ngabalimi abapheleleyo nabaxhotyisiweyo abarhwebayo yinkqubo ende kwaye maninzi amaziko anokuba nenxaxheba kule nkqubo. 

Hlalutya umgangatho woqeqesho olunikwayo. Abanye abaniki-lubonelelo boqeqesho abaqinisekisiweyo abawenzi ngokuncomekayo umsebenzi wabo kuba nabo abanamava awaneleyo ngomsebenzi wokufama (akunakuze uwufunde encwadini kuphela umsebenzi wokufama!) 

Gcina iprojekthi incinci kwaye ilawuleka. Abalimi abaphuhlayo bafuna ixesha nenkxaso, ke ngoko xa umsebenzi usuka ube mkhulu kakhulu, izinto azilungi ukuze ekugqibeleni ingaphumeleli iprojekthi. Iyancomeka into yokuba unike mhlawumbi abalimi abali-15 ukuya kwabangama-20, kwaye loo msebenzi uwuphathe kakuhle. Izicwangciso ezininzi apho abalimi bebengaphezu kwama-50 (ukususela ekuqaleni) zithe zasilela kuba bekungekho bantu balingeneyo bokujikeleza. Yakuba iqalisile iprojekthi, amanani angandiswa ngonyaka ngamnye.

umqhubi onochuku
Amaxesha amaninzi kuba ngabany' abaqhubi abayingozi endleleni ngaphezu kwabaxhwili beemoto! Ukuxabana kwabaqhubi kuseyingxaki enkulu ezindleleni zoMzantsi Afrika. Nanga amacebiso angakunceda ungazifaki engxakini ngenxa yabaqhubi abacing' ukuba indlela yeyabo...
kubhale uNKOSAZANA SITHOLE
kufote uCLIVE THOMPSON
Zama ukungabi namsindo endleleni kuba ukucaphuka kuya kunixabanisa nangakumbi!
NGOBUNY' UBUSUKU uVusi Dlamini olipolisa wayegoduka. Kwabakho isigadla esimqhubisa kakubi endleleni waza wasibethela izibani ezama ukubonisa umqhubi waso ukuba umphazamisile. Eso sigadla sasuka sayilandela imoto yakhe, simxhola ngezibani de waphum' endleleni. Wathi xa ephuma emotweni, umqhubi wesigadla wamdubula wambulala.
"Lo ngumzekelo wokuba abaqhubi bafanele babe nomonde xa besendleleni. Ukuqhuba ezindleleni zeli kuyingozi kakhulu nkqu nasebantwini abafundisiweyo," watsho uMdu Mkhize oligosa lonxibelelwano emapoliseni.
UMargaret Mbatha wathi eqhuba imoto yakhe engena kwindlela eya emzini wakhe wafika kukho imoto eyivalileyo. Wayibethela ihutara kancinane. "Ndiyacinga oko kwamcaphukisa umqhubi wayo kuba wayihlehlisa wazongquba eyam. Emva koko wandityabeka ngezithuko waza wasuka ngesantya wahamba."
Bayanda abaqhubi abanochuku ezindleleni zeli. Ubabona ngokuqhuba ngesantya, ukukulandela kufutshane, ukubetha abaqhubi abaphambi kwabo ngezibani, ukuqhubisa kakubi abanye abaqhubi ngokungena phambi kwabo nokubathuka ngezandla.
Iingcali zamagosa eendlela zithi le ngxaki ibangelwa bubuninzi beemoto ezindleleni - nakukuba abaqhubi bakhuphela umsindo wabo kwabanye abasebenzisi bendlela.
Ingcali yengqondo uGideon Mchunu uthi: "Abaqhubi baye bazixelel' ukuba abaziwa. Oko kubenza bakubonakalise ngokuphandle ukucaphuka kwabo. Umqhubi okuthukayo endleleni ungafumana ukuba ungumntu olulamileyo xa udibana naye epatini."
Ungawanciphisa amathuba okuzifaka engozini "ngokwazi abaqhubi abayingozi nokuba kufanele ubathini," utsho uReggie Ntombela ongumhlohli wabaqhubi.
UNtombela neziny' iingcali zibanike la macebiso abaqhubi.
Abaqhubi abakulandela kufutshane
"Xa ubona imoto isiza ngesantya emva kwakho, nciphisa isantya ukuze kuvuleke isithuba esiphakathi kwakho nemoto ephambi kwakho," ucebisa atsho uNtombela.
"Oko kukunceda xa kufuneka ume ngequbuliso. Yithi chu ngeso santya ukuze imoto ekulandela kufutshane igqithe. Xa ingagqithi, yidedele."
UGideon Mchunu uthi abaqhubi abakulandela kufutshane "ngabantu abathanda ukukhuphisana nababona abanye abaqhubi bevale indlela." Uthi icebo kukuba "umilisel' ingqondo yakho endleleni ungazikhathazi ngomqhubi wemoto ekulandelayo. Ungavumi nidibane ngamehlo nomqhubi onjalo, kodwa ungambonisa ukuba uyambona ngokulungisa isipili semoto yakho esikubonisa into engasemva."
Abaqhubi abangena bephuma
"Xa ubona umqhubi ongena ephuma phakathi kweziny' iimoto, mlindele ukuba angangena nangaphambili kwakho. Nciphisa isantya ukuze uzinike isithuba esaneleyo nabanye abaqhubi," utsho uNtombela.
Kubalulekile ukusoloko ulindele nantoni na endleleni. Jonga izipili zakho rhoqo emva kwemizuzwana emithathu ukuya kweli-10, kuxhomekeka kumthamo weemoto.
Xa utshintsha iileyini zendlela, bonisa nge-indikheyitha ukuze ulumkise abanye abaqhubi.
"Ukungena uphuma phakathi kweziny' iimoto endleleni akukuncedi. Xa ndisiya emsebenzini ndiqhuba ngesantya esingu-70km ngeyure. Ndifika emva kwemizuzu emithathu kumqhubi ongena ephuma endleleni kuba eleqa," utshilo uNtombela.
Ukuxambulisana
Zola yaye ungaxambulisani nabany' abaqhubi. Umzekelo xa omnye umqhubi enyusa isantya xa uzama ukumgqitha, pheph' ingozi ngokumyeka ahambe.
"Ungaze uvume ukuphikisana naye kuba uya kuzibeka esichengeni ungafanelanga. Kungenzeka abe loo mqhubi unxilile, usebenzise iziyobisi okanye kukho into emcaphukisileyo," utsho uSibonelo Hlatshwayo oyingcali yengqondo. Ukanti kungenzeka nokuba uxhobile loo mqhubi.
USimon noRosemary Majola nentombi yabo eneminyaka emithathu babevela epatini yeKrismesi kwiminyaka emibini edlulileyo. USimon wabona kukho imoto emlandela kufutshane, wathi engekafumani ndawo yokuyidedela igqithe umqhubi wayo wamgqitha waza wema walungelana nemoto yakhe baze baqala ukuxambulisana nokuthukana. Emva koko loo mqhubi wabuyela ngasemva kukaSimon.
USimon wacinga ukuba loo nto igqithile suka weva ngezithonga ezithathu zompu kanti enye yezo mbumbulu iza kuchana inkosikazi yakhe entloko yaza yasweleka ngemin' elandelayo.
Abaqhubi abaziphatha okwabazali abangqongqo nabavalela abanye abaqhubi kuba besithi "bafuna ukubafundisa isifundo" baziqhwayela ingxaki.
"Ukwenza loo nto akuncedi yaye kuyingozi," utsho uReggie oyingcali ekufundiseni ukuqhuba. Ubalule isiganeko sebhinqa elalikhalaza emva kweentsuku yenzekile ingozi ngokuba lilo ebelinelungelo lokuhamba kodwa labe lenzakele nemoto yalo ibubutyobo.
Ukuzibona usesangqeni
Kweziny' iimeko ozibona kuzo usengozini, ukuphum' endleleni lelona cebo lihle. UJerome Zondi ukhumbul' ezifumana efakwe esangqeni ngabaqhubi bezithuthuthu.
"Indlela yayincinane yaye ndazibona ndinedyudyu, ngoko ndangena kwivenkile ethile ndatheng' ikomityi yeti. Emva kwemizuzu elishumi basebehambile nezithuthuthu zabo."
Xa usengozini ube ungenandlela yakuphuncula, zola, ume uthathe iinombolo zemoto ekuqhubise kakubi uze ubize amapolisa.
Abaqhubi bokwenene ngabo bangabahoyiyo abaqhubi abaqhway' uchuku endleleni.
U-BJ Shandu obefudula engumlawuli wophando lokhuseleko ezindleleni uzihambela ngesantya esingaphantsi kwesimiselweyo ahambe ebuka iindawo agqitha kuzo.
NoReggie Ntombela uqhuba ngolo hlobo xa esiya emsebenzini. "Icebo kukubayeka bagqithe abaqhubi abangxamileyo. Andimbetheli nehutara umqhubi ondiphazamisayo endleleni. Andikuthandi ukuphazamisa izilwanyana zizilalele"
Bayingozi abaqhubi abacinga ukuba indlela yeyabo nabakhuphisanayo. Ingakukhusela wena nosapho lwakho indlela omphatha ngayo umqhubi onochuku endleni. [x]
